BASE.name: Abby (SSR)
BASE.profile: There once was a lumberjack who had a giant axe. She was friends with a bear who had a giant heart. The lumberjack was very strong, and she could drive away anything that threatened to tear her and the bear apart. But little did she know that friendships do not crack from without so often as they crumble from within...

PROMO.name: Abby (Promo)
PROMO.profile: This young girl travels with a gigantic bear named Bobo. Their adventures together created a special bond and they are now inseparable.

BASE.name: Agielba
BASE.profile: This agent has no equal, and he never fails to fulfill a contract. His employers sing his name unto the heavens. Though he may appear cold-hearted, his heart is filled with warmth when he looks at his beloved daughter.

BASE.name: Aglovale
BASE.profile: The noble Lord of Frost holds aloft his banner to lead his country. Glimmering in his eyes is the image of a mighty state that rules the world. Hidden in his chest is a burning devotion to the public. Hear him proclaim his ideals as he proceeds unflaggingly down the path of domination.

VALENTINE.name: Aglovale (Valentine)
VALENTINE.profile: The ruler of a mighty kingdom stands among a sea of gifts from his many admirers. Delighted by these sparkling tokens of their adoration and affection, his expression brims with confidence and pride.

BASE.name: Airi Totoki
BASE.profile: Guided by the dazzling light, the girls descend to the faraway skies. The sensitive to heat and air-headed idol, naturally doing things at her own pace; a state that is completely unchanged from her original world now completely enjoys the world of skies.
BASE.recruitment: Cinderella Fantasy ~Girls Keep on Dreaming~Cinderella Fantasy ~Piña Hazard~

BASE.name: Alanaan
BASE.profile: This one-of-a-kind priest does good deeds in accordance with the doctrine, aspiring to one day achieve the church's greatest desire—the creation of a paradise. Having received the blessing of the brightly shining sun, he purges the evil lurking in the hearts of people and guides the righteous.

BASE.name: Albert 5★
BASE.profile: This knight is determined to find his friend who has been twisted and consumed by power. He moves like the lightning he controls; appearing with a flash and a roar that turns plains thick with enemies into plains thick with ash.

BASE_4.name: Albert 4★
BASE_4.profile: This knight is determined to find his friend who has been twisted and consumed by power. He moves like the lightning he controls; appearing with a flash and a roar that turns plains thick with enemies into plains thick with ash.

DARK.name: Albert (Dark)
DARK.profile: The Thunderswift Lord never stops battling. He firmly believes the journey he's been on thus far is tied to a glorious future. His burning ambitions scatter dark clouds, bringing sunshine to his homeland.

EVENT.name: Albert (Event)
EVENT.profile: Upon reuniting with his old companions, this knight continues his search for a friend still lost. He clutches his thunder sword that will light his path as he seeks atonement for sins from a dark and distant past.

SUMMER.name: Albert (Summer)
SUMMER.profile: The savior of Levin takes a vacation to discover how tourism can revitalize his homeland. All it takes is one fireworks display to convince Albert it has the power to reinvigorate a kingdom. This is the know-how Levin has been waiting for.

BASE.name: Alec [5★]
BASE.profile: This boy's thunderous power and fiery intensity come naturally. These abilities have twisted his worldview, but not his sense of right and wrong.

BASE_4.name: Alec [4★]
BASE_4.profile: This boy's thunderous power and fiery intensity come naturally. These abilities have twisted his worldview, but not his sense of right and wrong.

BASE.name: Aletheia
BASE.profile: Aletheia won fame in the world after a multi-year journey, with countless legends carved in various lands. Even so, he retains an inquisitive spirit, continuing his journey across the sky. If there's something he can't read, he need only ask his son.

BASE.name: Alexiel (Grand)
BASE.profile: Once a defender of the god-realm, a chance meeting with the primarch of earth led her to become his disciple. She protects the weak and reviles evil. And with her mirror-blades, she brings righteousness and justice to them both.

SUMMER.name: Alexiel (Summer)
SUMMER.profile: Drawn to the azure seas, alabaster sands, and scorching sun, this noble defender of the god-realm descends upon the sandy beach. Slipping on a meticulously chosen piece of swimwear, the divine beauty is ready to revel in her summer reprieve.

BASE.name: Alistair
BASE.profile: A student enrolled in the skydom's most prominent academic institution. His attitude is a bit haughty, as expected of the eldest son of the Alethea, which is a prestigious family of scholars. But his eagerness to restore his father's honor, and to learn, will lead him to the hidden truths of the world.

BASE.name: Aliza
BASE.profile: Having discarded the unnecessary and the ungainly, this princess revels in freedom and new experiences. Dreaming of the day she duels with her beloved, Aliza burns like a searing flame in pursuit of self-improvement.

EVENT.name: Aliza (Event)
EVENT.profile: Aliza found an affluent life to be stifling. It wasn't the life for her, so she cast off her bonds, trained her mind and body, and set off on an adventure.
EVENT.recruitment: The Cowardly Hero and the Captive Princess"Yozora no Shizuku" CD Code Insert

WATER.name: Aliza (Water)
WATER.profile: A young woman sets out on a different path from that of her childhood sweetheart. A martial arts tournament opens her eyes to just how vast the world is, and she sets about training in hopes of reaching new horizons. No matter the challenge, her smile never wavers.

BASE.name: Almeida
BASE.profile: Having led a life surrounded by steel, this mighty miner ventures across the skies to forge the perfect weapon. Although a bit too obsessed with a mysterious masked man and the extraordinary scythe he brandishes, she pushes through hardship in much the same way she digs through walls in the mining tunnels back home.

SUMMER.name: Almeida (Summer)
SUMMER.profile: The woman of the mountain has come down to the shore for a vacation. Not having any experience with such occurrences, she is caught off guard. However, once she finds a project she can take the lead on, she returns to her normal self. Her desire is to make the ideal weapon for that ideal someone.

BASE.name: Altair [5★]
BASE.profile: A peerless young tactician in search of messages from antiquity. By studying the spirit of ages past, he prepares to create his own future.

BASE_4.name: Altair [4★]
BASE_4.profile: A peerless young tactician in search of messages from antiquity. By studying the spirit of ages past, he prepares to create his own future.

BASE.name: Amira [5★]
BASE.profile: This half-demon girl searches for traces of her mother. An unreliable tip points her toward the arctic and so to the arctic she goes. The land she seeks is distant, shrouded in mystery, but she never wavers. After a long, long search, a clue appears before her.

BASE_4.name: Amira [4★]
BASE_4.profile: This half-demon girl searches for traces of her mother. An unreliable tip points her toward the arctic and so to the arctic she goes. The land she seeks is distant, shrouded in mystery, but she never wavers. After a long, long search, a clue appears before her.

PROMO.name: Amira (Promo)
PROMO.profile: This girl traveled here from a distant land in search of her mother. The way she happily (and messily) stuffs her cheeks with food makes her look half her age, but any who witness just how much she can put away is struck dumb with awe.
PROMO.recruitment: RoB: Genesis Blu-ray Serial Code (Expired)RoB: Virgin Soul Blu-ray Vol. 3 Serial CodeSiero's Special Pick TicketLinks Pick Ticket

PROMO_4.name: Amira (Promo)
PROMO_4.profile: This girl traveled here from a distant land in search of her mother. The way she happily (and messily) stuffs her cheeks with food makes her look half her age, but any who witness just how much she can put away is struck dumb with awe.
PROMO_4.recruitment: RoB: Genesis Blu-ray Serial Code (Expired)RoB: Virgin Soul Blu-ray Vol. 3 Serial CodeSiero's Special Pick TicketLinks Pick Ticket

SUMMER.name: Amira (Summer)
SUMMER.profile: Though finding her mother is her number one priority, this girl also treasures the time she spends with friends. Taking a load off on a bright beach, she hopes to one day tell her mother about the fun she’s had alongside her companions.

BASE.name: Anastasia
BASE.profile: Anastasia is a spirited away to a world in the skies, a world beyond any fantasy she's imagined. She becomes a snow princess of pure heart and phantasmic appearance, a star of hope granting dreams to the people of the skies.

BASE.name: Andira
BASE.profile: Guardian of the West-Southwest as one of the Twelve Heavenly Generals. Often seeing dreams of the utopia her ancestors set out for, she departs on a journey herself after a certain fateful encounter. The unwavering resolve of this monkey goddess makes her an invaluable asset to the crew.

BASE_4.name: Andira [4★]
BASE_4.profile: Guardian of the West-Southwest as one of the Twelve Heavenly Generals. Often seeing dreams of the utopia her ancestors set out for, she departs on a journey herself after a certain fateful encounter. The unwavering resolve of this monkey goddess makes her an invaluable asset to the crew.

EVENT.name: Andira (Event)
EVENT.profile: The Queen of Monkeys returns to cast away all worldly desires and restore peace to the sky. Every year she bestows her grace upon the sky, and every year she continues her journey with a smile.

BASE.name: Ange
BASE.profile: With a cocky flourish she sweeps her cape around her, leaping and shouting through the streets of the harvest festival. Although today's guise is a transient one, still she cuts a fine figure—a dashing prince in search of a damsel in distress.

SR.name: Ange
SR.profile: Someday she wants to be like the prince everyone dreams about. Her ideal figure is a prince more wonderful than everyone else. She conducts herself gallantly, but in reality she believes in the dream of a fateful meeting.

SR_4.name: Ange
SR_4.profile: Someday she wants to be like the prince everyone dreams about. Her ideal figure is a prince more wonderful than everyone else. She conducts herself gallantly, but in reality she believes in the dream of a fateful meeting.

BASE.name: Anila
BASE.profile: One of the Twelve Divine Generals, she protects the south-southwest. This gentle lamb of a goddess abhors conflict and prays for world peace. She endured isolation for what seemed like an eternity, but now seeks out new lands, guided by the stars.

BASE_4.name: Anila
BASE_4.profile: One of the Twelve Divine Generals, she protects the south-southwest. This gentle lamb of a goddess abhors conflict and prays for world peace. She endured isolation for what seemed like an eternity, but now seeks out new lands, guided by the stars.

EVENT.name: Anila
EVENT.profile: Free of all worldly distractions, this blooming lamb of a goddess is always seen traveling with the same crew, working to restore peace and order to the world.

SUMMER.name: Anila
SUMMER.profile: The Queen of Sheep has landed on the beach, and she's more than ready to let her hair down in the spirit of summer. With her friends forever by her side, sheepish grins will be a thing of the past.

BASE.name: Anna
BASE.profile: This witch always wanted to chat, but no one would set foot in her dark, mysterious forest. So one day she became best friends with a giant stuffed animal.

SR.name: Anna
SR.profile: This lonely witch of the forest learned much on her travels, vastly improving her skills—magical and social. She hopes to one day become a pillar of human society, just like the eminent witch she idolizes. Day by day, she trains herself to reach that lofty goal.

SUMMER.name: Anna
SUMMER.profile: Bathed in the warm glow of the summer sun the little witch slips into a swimsuit, nervous at showing so much for the first time. Her pale white skin flashes in the light as she frolics among the waves. Even the sunburns are just another happy memory of a lovely day.

BASE.name: Anne
BASE.profile: A princess by birthright, she uses her summons to protect those she loves. Although hailed as a magical prodigy, she strives to treat all others as equals and with respect, earning her the esteem of many an academy student.

BASE.name: Anre
BASE.profile: One of the Eternals—they who stand astride the skies and across the path of any would-be calamity. The only sage of their number, Anre was the one who gathered the Eternals together. He continues to protect the balance of peace, wielding great power in the hopes of one day ridding the world of sadness.

BASE_4.name: Anre
BASE_4.profile: One of the Eternals—they who stand astride the skies and across the path of any would-be calamity. The only sage of their number, Anre was the one who gathered the Eternals together. He continues to protect the balance of peace, wielding great power in the hopes of one day ridding the world of sadness.

BASE_5.name: Anre
BASE_5.profile: One of the Eternals—they who stand astride the skies and across the path of any would-be calamity. The only sage of their number, Anre was the one who gathered the Eternals together. He continues to protect the balance of peace, wielding great power in the hopes of one day ridding the world of sadness.

BASE.name: Anthuria
BASE.profile: Clad in crimson with hair to match, this fiery dancer becomes an inferno that drives all who watch her wild. But her beauty also attracts unwanted suitors like moths to the flame, and so Anthuria flees across the skies. Both to escape... and to find someone worthy of her.

YUKATA.name: Anthuria
YUKATA.profile: A yukata wraps around this maiden's body, concealing the feelings she holds within for the person who has captivated her mind and soul. There is nothing she wouldn't do for her dearest's sake, but what will it take for her feelings to be reciprocated?

BASE.name: Anzu Futaba
BASE.profile: Anzu is a young girl who landed in a sky far away, guided by a dazzling light. Although she seemed unaffected by arriving in a different world, she began to show slight interest in a quest on a garish gambling airship.

BASE_4.name: Anzu Futaba
BASE_4.profile: Anzu is a young girl who landed in a sky far away, guided by a dazzling light. Although she seemed unaffected by arriving in a different world, she began to show slight interest in a quest on a garish gambling airship.

BASE.name: Aoidos
BASE.profile: Strumming an unusual instrument, this young musician holds an ideal that reaches far beyond his spotlight on a brilliant stage. With ambition as his guide, his journey through the sky promises a rediscovery of both mysteriously lost memories and of himself.

BASE_4.name: Aoidos
BASE_4.profile: Strumming an unusual instrument, this young musician holds an ideal that reaches far beyond his spotlight on a brilliant stage. With ambition as his guide, his journey through the sky promises a rediscovery of both mysteriously lost memories and of himself.

BASE.jpname: 津島善子＆国木田花丸＆黒澤ルビィ
BASE.name: Aqours First-Years
BASE.profile: Originally from another world, the girls of Aqours ended up here somehow—but that didn't stop them from putting on a concert to bring smiles to the people. These three close friends' flurried yet charming antics will surely serve to imbue the skies with kindness.

BASE.jpname: 桜内梨子＆高海千歌＆渡辺 曜
BASE.name: Aqours Second-Years
BASE.profile: Originally from another world, the girls of Aqours ended up here somehow—but that didn't stop them from putting on a concert to bring smiles to the people. Their infectious passion spreading far and wide, the bond these three have formed through their mutual support of one another acts to inspire the skydwellers.

BASE_4.jpname: 桜内梨子＆高海千歌＆渡辺 曜
BASE_4.name: Aqours Second-Years
BASE_4.profile: Originally from another world, the girls of Aqours ended up here somehow—but that didn't stop them from putting on a concert to bring smiles to the people. Their infectious passion spreading far and wide, the bond these three have formed through their mutual support of one another acts to inspire the skydwellers.

BASE.jpname: 松浦果南＆黒澤ダイヤ＆小原鞠莉
BASE.name: Aqours Third-Years
BASE.profile: Originally from another world, the girls of Aqours ended up here somehow—but that didn't stop them from putting on a concert to bring smiles to the people. These three shine brightly before the trail they've blazed, spreading sunshine from their hearts to the clamoring crowds before them.

BASE.name: Arisa
BASE.profile: This elf girl eagerly trains every day. She is traveling with the crew to rescue her best friend, who was kidnapped by shades.

BASE.name: Arriet
BASE.profile: The sweet notes of the lyre of the gods' chosen minstrel rise up to heaven itself, and soothe the hearts of all who hear them. The mysterious smile that hovers on her lips can even stop a primal beast in its tracks while hiding her other, more important task

BASE.jpname: ひよこ班 アーサー&モルドレッド
BASE.name: Arthur and Mordred
BASE.profile: The dream that sprang from this pair's youthful hearts has matured within their tightly joined hands. As these two young men stand in the gap between past and future, they vow that their bond will remain strong no matter what lies in store for them.

EVENT.name: Arthur
EVENT.profile: This young aspiring knight embarks on a quest with his dear friend to fulfill a lifelong dream. Underneath his compassionate tears and smile rests the strength of a great dragon within, unbeknownst even to the boy himself.

BASE.name: Arulumaya
BASE.profile: Visions float to the surface of her crystal ball-visions that are always true. She hesitates to speak of what she sees, for she knows the crushing weight of destiny and how it can drive men mad.

BASE_4.name: Arulumaya
BASE_4.profile: Visions float to the surface of her crystal ball-visions that are always true. She hesitates to speak of what she sees, for she knows the crushing weight of destiny and how it can drive men mad.

HOLIDAY.name: Arulumaya
HOLIDAY.profile: Never one to turn down a chance to help others, Arulumaya agrees to assist the casino liner in stopping those who seek to destroy the spirit of their games. In holiday spirit, she dons a special outfit for the crowd.

YUKATA.name: Arulumaya
YUKATA.profile: Arulumaya dons a traditional outfit to enjoy Auguste's summer festival. With her yukata, umbrella, and even the flower in her hair perfectly coordinated, this fortune-teller is the picture of elegance. From a delicious candy apple to the friend she shares it with, the memories of this night will never fade.

BASE.name: Arusha
BASE.profile: She travels the skies as a dignified representative of the Hall of Knowledge. Unwavering in her quest for knowledge, she dreams of journeying beyond the known reaches of the sky. Think of all the new books she might find there!

BASE.name: Aster
BASE.profile: This fragile little girl made a wish; to have the strength to protect another. She knew that knowledge was what she lacked, and she must leave home to find it. Her kindness was the key she needed to open the door to the outside world.

SR.name: Aster
SR.profile: Upon realizing her own shortcomings, this young girl makes up her mind to enter into the apprenticeship of two masters of the trade. Their guidance, along with the earnest footprints she herself has left in her wake, serve to illuminate the path before her.

BASE.name: Athena
BASE.profile: The guardian primal beast of the aegis. Traversing the skies as a patron knight of peace, she strives to protect all who yearn to live free from conflict. Due to her disdain for violence, she prefers to mediate with words. When words fail, as a primal beast she unwillingly lays great flames of vengeance upon wrongdoers.

BASE.name: Augusta
BASE.profile: Cellist of the Sky Philharmonic Orchestra, the musical ensemble with the greatest legacy in all of the skies. She takes great joy in the ephemeral nature of life and performance alike, and the personal touch she puts into her melodies inspires all who listen.
BASE.recruitment: Granblue Fantasy Orchestra ConcertSiero's Special Pick TicketLinks Pick TicketTogether in Song

BASE.name: Ayer
BASE.profile: Born into a happy home, Ayer is driven by his true nature to seek a new world. Although he feels alive in the arena, will he ultimately find true happiness there? Only the skies hold the answer.

BASE_4.name: Ayer
BASE_4.profile: Born into a happy home, Ayer is driven by his true nature to seek a new world. Although he feels alive in the arena, will he ultimately find true happiness there? Only the skies hold the answer.

SUMMER.name: Ayer
SUMMER.profile: A young man bearing a complex psychological situation, he continues honing his body as he travels through the skies. Bereft of a goal or destination, his attempt to reclaim his dignity manifests itself through endless, aimless training. Even a summer jaunt to the beach isn't enough to convince the young man to slow down.

BASE.name: Azazel
BASE.profile: He slices through the dark like a piercing black gale to boldly dispose of humans. Wrapped in bandages, this demon spreads his wings of rebellion in a bid to free his brethren who have fallen into captivity. For that singular purpose he becomes a terrifying tempest of bloodshed.

HALLOWEEN.name: Azazel
HALLOWEEN.profile: Clad in the raiment of a demon, this fallen angel arises from hell to search for the murky well spoken of in local legends. Eager to reunite with his brethren, his interest in the festivities of mortals shines through and draws the attention of the dancing children of the night.

BASE.name: Baal
BASE.profile: Thunder rings out from the storm; the Sky Realm is filled with sonorous but cruel resonance. Possessed of the power to hear and follow such elemental melodies, he seeks out a long-lost piece of himself. Across his capricious journey, his encounters with mortals have caused his heart to reverberate with inspiration renewed.

BASE.name: Bakura
BASE.profile: A stalwart warrior who comes to see how empty the world is with its never-ending wars. He sheds his past to become a wandering monk and travels the islands in search of the forbidden requiems lying in ancient ruins.

BASE.name: Balurga
BASE.profile: Driven by blind conviction, Balurga faced the lord of lawlessness, discarded her humanity, and became a lone wolf instead. Her fearlessness earned her a right hand of steel, but only time will tell what she'll grasp with it.

BASE.name: Baotorda
BASE.profile: Forever pure, forever righteous, the noble holy knight dons a new suit of armor. No matter how sublime the glory he finds, nothing will ever sully his pure heart, which is as clear as the meaning of the sword he wields.

SR.name: Baotorda
SR.profile: This honorable knight abandoned his position as Holy Knight to assist a group of travelers—it was the right thing to do. No matter what obstacles rise to face him, his heart will stay as steadfast and pure as his shining blade.

BASE.name: Barawa
BASE.profile: Sworn to capture his elusive rival, the self-proclaimed great detective trains in secret. While his body is sturdier and healthier than ever, his intellect remains unchanged. Nonetheless, he presses on as any great detective would.
BASE.recruitment: Detective Barawa and the Unfortunate Fortune

R.name: Barawa
R.profile: This military man declared himself a genius detective when he accidentally ran into a legendary thief. He's fit enough to chase anyone down, but his detective work is lacking- in fact, it's atrocious. Fortunately, he's got a sharp assistant by his side and energy to spare. Justice will be served!

SR.name: Barawa
SR.profile: Where there's a dastard, there's a detective. The self-proclaimed "great detective" Barawa works tirelessly to prove the innocence of his clients by gathering evidence from all sorts of places. Whether it be luck or ability, for Barawa the hidden truth prevails.

BASE.name: Beatrix
BASE.profile: Despite being robbed of a promising future, she never despairs and continues to fight on alone. Having crossed paths with a sword that devours causality, she eventually comes into her own as an outstanding swordswoman who never stays down no matter how many times she is knocked out.

EARTH.name: Beatrix
EARTH.profile: Sometimes down but never for the count, this blaze of ultramarine fury finally reclaims her beloved partner. Together, they'll devour the surging karma running rampant throughout the skies.

HALLOWEEN.name: Beatrix
HALLOWEEN.profile: With no knowledge of holiday customs, Beatrix joins in on Halloween for the first time in her life. Her treasured sword changes shape and color, responding in kind to its master's pounding heart as they enjoy the festivities together.

SR.name: Beatrix
SR.profile: Having let go of her causality-devouring blade, Beatrix seeks to find true strength from within. She believes she will be worthy of the Embrasque Sword once more after she's achieved this goal.

SUMMER.name: Beatrix
SUMMER.profile: Beatrix dons a vivid swimsuit to face the many challenges awaiting her in the snowcapped mountains. Her never-ending need for recognition is often the cause of her downfall, but no matter how tough the going gets, Beatrix remains steadfast and adventurous.

BASE.name: Black Knight
BASE.profile: Robbed of the friend that once cured her loneliness, she has devoted her life to seeing her dear friend smile once again. For all the hardships she has had to endure, just when it all seemed to have been for naught, she received a miracle. As she awaits the day of her companion's awakening, she fights to keep the approaching evil at bay.

BASE_4.name: Black Knight
BASE_4.profile: Robbed of the friend that once cured her loneliness, she has devoted her life to seeing her dear friend smile once again. For all the hardships she has had to endure, just when it all seemed to have been for naught, she received a miracle. As she awaits the day of her companion's awakening, she fights to keep the approaching evil at bay.

DUO.jpname: エルステの要 黒騎士&オルキス
DUO.name: Black Knight and Orchis
DUO.profile: To reverse tragedy and reclaim long-lost days, this pair forges a path through cruelty and loneliness. Time passes, and discord arises between the two souls. The smile the knight longs for is buried in the past, while the future holds only a single wish to be fulfilled.
DUO.recruitment: Granblue Fantasy: The Animation BD/DVD Season 2 - Vol. 6

BASE.name: Blazing Teacher Elmott
BASE.profile: The sharp-tongued pyromancer Elmott is spirited away from his journey for a time to take on an unlikely role as a teacher. Despite his seemingly severe demeanor, he soon gains the respect of all his students.

BASE.jpname: ボボボーボ・ボーボボ
BASE.name: Bobobo-bo Bo-bobo
BASE.profile: As far as we could discern, the man of legends appeared without warning in our world. Based on the portraits painted of him, he wore a suit of the most sacred blue and had a head of shining blonde hair, often depicted as a halo. His divine features imply the possibility that he was revered as a figure of worship, especially considering the absurd miracles he was claimed to have been responsible for. Regardless of speculation, it is certain that his god-like deeds of valor earned him the title "Noble Warrior of Love," and that he spent his days battling evil and saving innocents.—An excerpt from The Code of Heroes, The Blonde Hero Clad in Blue (Volume 1)
BASE.recruitment: Wiggin' War in the Sky World‎‎

BASE.jpname: ノーブルナイツ ブリジール＆コーデリア
BASE.name: Bridgette and Cordelia
BASE.profile: Two knights—a praetor who lives in pretense and deceit, and a purehearted knight trying to overcome her short stature through sheer effort. Their deep bond unites them in their aspiration to be forever pure, forever righteous.

R.name: Bridgette
R.profile: Always fighting with all of her might, but with only the strength of a novice, Bridgette yearns to be a warrior that surpasses the barriers of her race. Though she is but a small grunt now, she sharpens her skills with the dream of one day becoming a great hero.

BASE.name: Cagliostro
BASE.profile: This supreme genius and pioneer of alchemy transcended time by making herself into an immaterial being. Awakened from her age-old seal, she is now re-enlightening the world according to her own whims.

BASE_4.name: Cagliostro
BASE_4.profile: This supreme genius and pioneer of alchemy transcended time by making herself into an immaterial being. Awakened from her age-old seal, she is now re-enlightening the world according to her own whims.

DARK.name: Cagliostro
DARK.profile: The founder of alchemy has lived for what seems like an eternity, but she still finds new alchemic tricks up her sleeve. With her rejuvenated body, it is only a matter of time before she unlocks the door to truth in the skies—forever being the envy of all who pursue these secret arts.

EVENT.name: Cagliostro
EVENT.profile: The shadow of death once again encroaches upon the renowned alchemist. She counteracts this threat by passing the truth of alchemy on to a distant blood relative, carving her path toward a long future of ultimate knowledge and ultimate cuteness.

GRAND.name: Cagliostro
GRAND.profile: The founder of alchemy travels the skies as she brings perfection to new heights. Her achievements are certainly fruits of her talent and hard work; however, they are also proof of the support she has received from a nameless ally whose contributions have been omitted from recorded history. Still, the founder continues to harbor gratitude for her friend, never to forget.

HALLOWEEN.name: Cagliostro
HALLOWEEN.profile: This alchemist of singular talent lovingly selected her outfit for a spectral banquet. It was there that she uncovered the hidden truths, and watched over the transformation of the phantasmal king.

SUMMER.name: Cagliostro
SUMMER.profile: The eternally youthful alchemist seizes the tides that flow in the abyss and incorporates their waters into a new improvement for her body. The finished process leaves her with outrageously stunning skin. Amidst the sparkling waves crashing down on the beach, her new form, now lovelier than ever before, fits perfectly into the gorgeous scenery.

BASE.name: Cailana
BASE.profile: This child of the wind and waves loves the singular freedom of the oceans above all else. Led by the scents of the sea and sky, Cailana follows the currents in search of waves to tame.

SR.name: Cailana
SR.profile: This child of water is loved by the sea. She follows her heart and the wild winds that call her, dancing through the waves as she soars to reach new heights. And just like the summers of Auguste, the fire in her eyes never burns out.

BASE.name: Caim
BASE.profile: Better and more beautiful than any other. And thus always alone. This is how a fool is born. But one day, all his fragile mind had ever known was tossed into a forgotten abyss. Whether that has turned out for better or worse is anyone's guess. But when the upside down smile of a certain figure now peers into his eyes, the purity within almost seems to lighten up the skies.

BASE.name: Cain
BASE.profile: An idealist with the good of Nalhegrande and Idelva in mind. Having finally been able to move past losing someone dear to him in the fires of war, he sets his sights on the future ahead. He rises once more, using his intellect to inspire those around him, seeking peace throughout the skies.

SR.name: Cain
SR.profile: A general of Idelva and a man who hides penetrating insight behind a jovially smiling mask. A pacifist by nature, he does his best to secure victory at a minimal cost to allies and foes alike. His approach stems partially from the regret of losing his brother in battle.
SR.recruitment: Chapter 89 Story: Teachings of the Sage

BASE.name: Camieux
BASE.profile: A girl that left her adoring family for one reason: To become stronger. With the love of her family and friends she can depend on, Camieux sets out for adventure in the autumn skies.

R.name: Camieux
R.profile: Raised in a smithy, this little girl vowed that she would overcome her weakness, and journeyed into the clouds. She dreams of becoming a master smith-one that would make even her sister proud.

SUMMER.name: Camieux
SUMMER.profile: Despite being timid and self-conscious, Camieux goes to the beach for some fun with her friends. When she was a child, she was terrified of the sea, but now she no longer fears the waters. With every adventure she takes, Camieux continues to grow ever stronger.

BASE.name: Carmelina
BASE.profile: This alluring acrobat is a maestro of movement—her transcendent techniques enthrall all who see. The pure, joyous smile she flashes her spectators has softened many a heart. She walks from town to town, dancing through the air and spreading happiness wherever she goes.

SR.name: Carmelina
SR.profile: Carmelina shows off her circus act, hoping to teach the crew the fun of performance art. The acrobat and her new lion partner can move the toughest crowd to wild applause. For this consummate performer, there's no better feeling. Now if only she could get her friends on the crew to see things her way...

BASE.name: Carren
BASE.profile: This gorgeous girl, who is full of hopes and dreams, finally fulfills one of her long-awaited desires: heading to the beach. Although she was pulled into a life of adventure by a certain group of skyfarers, it is she who will pull that very same crew into a vacation of fun-filled memories.

SR.name: Carren
SR.profile: She stands tall and proud on the ship's prow, her hair flowing in the wind. Her boundless passion and enthusiasm makes her a handful, often causing trouble for a certain crafty old soldier.

BASE.name: Cassius
BASE.profile: Free from the moon, he returns to the place he can truly call home. The skies are full of discoveries to be made, and with trusted friends by his side, the days ahead are surely filled with illogical, yet fascinating experiences.

EVENT.name: Cassius
EVENT.profile: Logic and rationality are everything to this young man. When he comes in contact with skydwellers—who are ruled by their emotions—he is introduced to a new worldview. No one knows what effect these at-times irrational souls will have on him.

YUKATA.name: Cassius
YUKATA.profile: With a summer festival fast approaching, this young man donned a yukata at the insistence of his friends. In his desire for a life ruled by logic, all he could see was the garment's unsuitability for battle. Soon, however, he would gain new insight into skydwellers' frivolous sartorial proclivities.

BASE.name: Catherine
BASE.profile: This bewitchingly attractive phantom thief disappears into the darkness in a puff of smoke along with her prey. Few know she's a phantom thief from her gentle demeanor, and even fewer know what she's really hiding.

SR.name: Catherine
SR.profile: A thief who hides in plain sight by working in a cafe. She listens to all the complaints of her customers and values her time with them as a respite from a prowler's life.

BASE.name: Catura
BASE.profile: One of the Twelve Divine Generals and guardian of the north-northeast, this Divine Ox loves to look up at the sky as she dreams of romance. The cows raise their voices in unison as their caretaker embarks on her destined journey through the endless skies.

BASE.name: Cecile
BASE.profile: Trumpeter of the Sky Philharmonic Orchestra, the most influential of all the musical ensembles in the sky. Her queenly demeanor commands a powerful presence onstage, and the magnificent grandeur of her melodies captivates all who listen.
BASE.recruitment: Granblue Fantasy Orchestra ConcertSiero's Special Pick TicketLinks Pick TicketTogether in Song

BASE.name: Cerberus
BASE.profile: Out of a forgotten summoning circle she appeared—Cerberus, the three-headed warden of Hades. Staunchly loyal, she doggedly seeks to fulfill her mission. Still, this is a rare chance to have some fun, and there's no rush, right? Might as well take it nice and slow!

BASE.name: Ceylan
BASE.profile: A good appraiser is hard to find, and he's one of the best. His piercing gaze quickly sorts the genuine from the fake and detects any secrets an item might hold. His eyes caress the objects under his care, picking out not just their physical value but their emotional value as well.
BASE.recruitment: Villa de Siero ~Come One, Come All~Unite and Fight

BASE.name: Charioce XVII
BASE.profile: This king marches forward with single-minded determination. Such is the depth of this king's resentment. But violence incurred is violence transferred; and thus his reign is marred by bloodshed and tyranny. Though his country may suffer in the present, he has resolved to sacrifice anything for the promise of future peace.
BASE.recruitment: RoB: Virgin Soul Blu-ray Disc IV Serial CodeSiero's Special Pick TicketLinks Pick Ticket

BASE.name: Charlotta
BASE.profile: This Holy Knight has a sacred pledge in her heart, and an oversized weapon in her hand. As the leader of the highly praised Order of Holy Knights, her character is unimpeachable. Her sole worry is the fact that she is not growing.

BASE_4.name: Charlotta
BASE_4.profile: This Holy Knight has a sacred pledge in her heart, and an oversized weapon in her hand. As the leader of the highly praised Order of Holy Knights, her character is unimpeachable. Her sole worry is the fact that she is not growing.

EVENT.name: Charlotta
EVENT.profile: Captain of an exalted order of holy knights, her height is the seed of all her anxiety. Though she knows her growth is limited by factors beyond her control, she can't help but envy the vertically gifted.
EVENT.recruitment: Little Skyfarer a la Sacre Blumiel!

HALLOWEEN.name: Charlotta
HALLOWEEN.profile: This holy knight girds herself in new armor for the festivities and dances merrily through the dusk. Although she would never deign to beg, somehow her bag has filled with candied treats.

LIGHT.name: Charlotta
LIGHT.profile: O little knight, you who command an order so honorable! May the holy heart in your breast be forever righteous, never turning away from virtue!

SUMMER.name: Charlotta
SUMMER.profile: Charlotta Fenia, captain of the Lumiel Order of Holy Knights. As summer approaches, new threats to her quest for maturity loom on the horizon: sun, sand, and—the most dastardly foe of all—the shallow end of the beach.

BASE.name: Chat Noir
BASE.profile: As an exceptional thief and master of impeccable disguises, he often undertakes fantastical capers to garner the attention of the world. Once his target is set—which he announces with a letter covered in sweet perfume—no treasure is safe.

BASE.name: Chloe
BASE.profile: Lover of freedom and all things cute, Chloe sets out on a journey to become strong enough to protect those important to her. Despite her flashy appearance and bold demeanor, her heart is as pure as the wide blue skies.

SUMMER.name: Chloe
SUMMER.profile: This lover of freedom and all things cute joins her companions for a well-deserved vacation on the beaches of Auguste. The adventure she experiences there does much to mature her.

BASE.name: Christina
BASE.profile: The casino—a place where greed and passion are shuffled together like a deck of cards. This is her kingdom, and she is its empress. Though passionate when it comes to betting, she treats all her subjects fairly. Beloved, a long line of gamblers kneel before her, declaring themselves her willing slaves.

BASE_4.name: Christina
BASE_4.profile: The casino—a place where greed and passion are shuffled together like a deck of cards. This is her kingdom, and she is its empress. Though passionate when it comes to betting, she treats all her subjects fairly. Beloved, a long line of gamblers kneel before her, declaring themselves her willing slaves.

BASE.name: Chun-Li
BASE.profile: To uncover clues into her father's disappearance, Chun-Li became a detective specializing in the criminal syndicate Shadaloo. She has a strong sense of duty and a masculine personality, but also loves sweets.

BASE.name: Clarisse
BASE.profile: This lovely young genius is the heir to an ancient bloodline. Exhausted with the workload, she dropped her studies and headed out into the blue yonder. Knowing how much her family counted on her she sometimes struggles with her choice—but quickly forgets all that stuffy stuff and gets back to enjoying her freedom.

HOLIDAY.name: Clarisse
HOLIDAY.profile: This adorable prodigy dons her delicately stitched outfit for a special holiday performance. As she steps on stage to a sweltering applause, the weariness of careful practice slips away.

LIGHT.name: Clarisse
LIGHT.profile: A young lady who has awoken to her power to disintegrate everything in creation. Donning a new outfit to match her newfound power, she resolves to rebel against her predetermined fate—deviating from a path established in past bloodlines and choosing to go down another without hesitation. Come what may, she will grasp her desired future on her own accord.

VALENTINE.name: Clarisse
VALENTINE.profile: Releasing the feelings from deep within her heart into the form of sweet chocolate on Valentine's Day, this young maiden wants nothing more than to become closer with a special somebody in her life. In order to realize her reveries, she takes her biggest step yet—all under the discerning eye of her master.

BASE.jpname: サーヴァンツ ドロシー＆クラウディア
BASE.name: Dorothy and Claudia
BASE.profile: The two separated maids at long last reunite and embark on their promised journey. Equipped with iron fists to go along with flames of passion, this caretaking duo is sure to overcome any obstacle in the pursuit of their queen.

SR.name: Claudia
SR.profile: This diligent maid never accepts imperfection. Not a single speck will remain of her enemies, be they dust or man. She seems emotionless on the surface, but impure feelings for a sweet young girl roil inside her. A strange smirk twists the corners of her lips upward every time she lays eyes on the blue-haired object of her affection.

BASE.name: Colossus
BASE.profile: An iron giant that bears a burden of deep resentment. Born countless centuries ago from the hands of a subjugated people, it utilizes a bright blade and a suit of the sturdiest armor, all for the sake of opposing the Astrals and eradicating every trace of their existence. After expending an enormous amount of energy, it collapses to its knees and slips into a centuries-long slumber. It awakens to a chance encounter with a mage and his pupil, and in the process gains a new power and role to fulfill.

BASE.name: Conan Edogawa
BASE.profile: Although he appears to be a boy, he's really a man trapped in a small body. He uses his keen powers of observation and astute intuition to solve any mystery. Now he must face new mysteries only found in the sky realm.

BASE.jpname: ノーブルナイツ ブリジール＆コーデリア
BASE.name: Bridgette and Cordelia
BASE.profile: Two knights—a praetor who lives in pretense and deceit, and a purehearted knight trying to overcome her short stature through sheer effort. Their deep bond unites them in their aspiration to be forever pure, forever righteous.

R.name: Cordelia
R.profile: His Eminence entrusts Cordelia to do his bidding, as every swing of her sword is both elegant and uncanny. As the last resort of the Order of Holy Knights' Rangers, Cordelia pursues justice any way she can.

BASE.name: Cucouroux
BASE.profile: After creating the best gun she possibly can, this savvy gunsmith is unsure of where to take things next. As both a gunsmith and a skyfarer, Cucouroux tries to break the boundaries of what's possible.

SR.name: Cucouroux
SR.profile: When she was little, Cucouroux wished for two things: a kind older sister, and an adorable younger one. Now that she has both, she works hard to be a gunsmith and sister they can be proud of.

BASE.jpname: プリキュア キュアブラック＆キュアホワイト
BASE.name: Cure Black and Cure White
BASE.profile: The valiant Cure Black and the magnificent Cure White—a pair of warriors spoken of in legends passed down in the Garden of Light. With the monochrome power of their pure, beautiful hearts, they vanquish the disciples of darkness and free the hearts of those held captive by evil.
BASE.recruitment: Pretty Cure: Memories of the Sky

BASE.jpname: プリキュア キュアブラック＆キュアホワイト
BASE.name: Cure Black and Cure White
BASE.profile: The valiant Cure Black and the magnificent Cure White—a pair of warriors spoken of in legends passed down in the Garden of Light. With the monochrome power of their pure, beautiful hearts, they vanquish the disciples of darkness and free the hearts of those held captive by evil.
BASE.recruitment: Pretty Cure: Memories of the Sky

BASE.name: Daetta
BASE.profile: Daetta thinks being normal is a big problem, so she works hard to be the most unique person around. That quest for eccentricity is what makes her so much fun to be around. Shoulder to shoulder with friends who accept her for who she is, she sets out on a new adventure.

SR.name: Daetta
SR.profile: A girl traveling the sky in search of herself. During the course of her adventures, Daetta hopes to find friends that will understand her and help her overcome her weaknesses. Daetta's strong spirit extends to all she meets, bestowing upon them great courage.

BASE.jpname: ダーント&フライハイト
BASE.name: Dante and Freiheit
BASE.profile: The cat-revering mage watches in awe the ways of an aloof warrior cat. Will learning from this feline wonder lead to the freedom that Dante has always sought, or will it break new ground in his cat-loving ways? Either way, Dante is always ready to give his all in order to learn everything there is to learn from the almighty pets.

R.name: Dante
R.profile: This battlemage refuses to bow to the rules of others. One must follow their own creed, or no creed at all. He takes inspiration from the noble and independent cat, and seeks a life both unfettered and free. His search for true freedom has taken him far across the sky.

SR.name: Dante
SR.profile: This mage, a disciple of his cats, joined the crew to pursue a free spirit. He throws himself tirelessly into his training. But is it for more freedom or more cats? The day he unleashes that spirit may be close at hand.

BASE.name: Danua
BASE.profile: Finally mustering the courage to take matters into her own hands, the girl regains the twin dolls she had grown so attached to. The shining threads affixed to her left arm will pave the way forward not only for her dolls, but also for herself.

HALLOWEEN.name: Danua
HALLOWEEN.profile: A chance encounter with a beautiful member of the Society leads this girl to understand the joy of dressing up. Adorned in her adorable costume and accompanied by her pair of feisty puppets, her heart races with the possibilities of the night's festivities.

SR.name: Danua
SR.profile: When she lost her parents and older brother, Danua also lost her voice. The only thing she has left to remind her of happier days are some dolls. She searches for a way to raise the spirits of her family, as well as get revenge.

SR_4.name: Danua
SR_4.profile: When she lost her parents and older brother, Danua also lost her voice. The only thing she has left to remind her of happier days are some dolls. She searches for a way to raise the spirits of her family, as well as get revenge.

SUMMER.name: Danua
SUMMER.profile: Floating like a jellyfish, without will or purpose, hours pass before she washes ashore near her comrades. She rejoices in the quiet of a summer's respite, but what thoughts of her lost family crossed the girl's mind while she floated aimlessly atop the deep?

BASE.name: De La Fille
BASE.profile: Daughter of a noble, De La Fille prides herself on her near-flawless gem collection. She sets out on the sky in search of the one shimmering gem that slipped through her grasp.

BASE_4.name: De La Fille
BASE_4.profile: Daughter of a noble, De La Fille prides herself on her near-flawless gem collection. She sets out on the sky in search of the one shimmering gem that slipped through her grasp.

EARTH.name: De La Fille
EARTH.profile: For the sake of inspiring a dear friend to fight, this lover-of-gems dons a dazzling dress stitched by her own hands. As a shining symbol of encouragement, the dress sparkles ever more brilliantly with De La Fille's undaunted faith in good friends.

SUMMER.name: De La Fille
SUMMER.profile: The Princess of the Seven Gems dances with joy through the brilliant light of the summer sun. The royal family of the Gem Domain values the sky and sea as highly as any jewel, but she refuses to put them on the same level as her gems. Still, that doesn't mean she can't enjoy them; her preparations for the sea and the sand are flawless.

BASE.name: Deliford
BASE.profile: The day he first picked up a spear is long past, but his honor and pride still shine as brightly as they did on that glorious day. His joints now creak with age, but neither his determination nor lance have dulled over the years.

SR.name: Deliford
SR.profile: This man has given up his dreams for the sake of his wife and parents. He abandons his pride and his traveling crew to return to the imperial army, where he reunites with his former comrades. Deliford's comeback sees the return of the imperial spirit that they once instilled into each other.

BASE.name: Diantha
BASE.profile: A fresh gust of wind picks up five blossoms, carrying them through the skies to a distant land. The soil feels and smells different here, but they must flourish. Pray that their roots take. Pray that their petals bloom along the road that climbs forever, into the future.

PROMO.name: Diantha
PROMO.profile: A maiden who once performed on the altar departs for the skies, guided by divine prophecy. The grand adventure awaiting her is no less exciting than the mini-adventures she had back home. She's often seen writing letters back home and reminiscing about the maidens who once performed beside her.
PROMO.recruitment: Never Ending Fantasy music CD insert codeSiero's Special Pick TicketLinks Pick Ticket

SUMMER.name: Diantha
SUMMER.profile: Led by divine prophecy, the five maidens soar through the skies to a beach in a foreign land. Their beautiful song and dance brighten the mood of all in this new locale. Though not entirely sure why the prophecy has led them here, the maidens put in their best effort to honor their canine friend and the ichnia who in turn worship them.

BASE.jpname: サーヴァンツ ドロシー＆クラウディア
BASE.name: Dorothy and Claudia
BASE.profile: The two separated maids at long last reunite and embark on their promised journey. Equipped with iron fists to go along with flames of passion, this caretaking duo is sure to overcome any obstacle in the pursuit of their queen.

SR.name: Dorothy
SR.profile: When this maid first laid eyes upon the traveler, she knew that they were fated to be together. Her passion burns bright; warming her master one moment, reducing her enemies to ash the next. No fuel is needed to stoke this flame; it will continue to light her master's path.

BASE.name: Drang
BASE.profile: Would a famed mercenary in one skydom be nothing more than a common foot soldier in another? Not this particular sellsword. His exceptional skills carry him through thick and thin, bringing him great renown wherever he goes.

GRAND.name: Drang
GRAND.profile: It's hard to say whether this man is a jokester or a fighter due to his tendency to shrug off the realities of the world. Who knows what lurks beneath his unwavering facade of a smile; making sense of his elusiveness is like trying to catch running water.

BASE.name: Drusilla
BASE.profile: Drusilla is a young girl in search of her pet bird. She's never fully experienced the world, but her pride prevents her from admitting it. The enigmatic shape on top of her hat is a mystery to all.

BASE.name: Eahta
BASE.profile: One of the Eternals—they who stand astride the skies and across the path of any would-be calamity. This undefeated swordmaster always seeks to improve his skills. His sword does not discriminate between good and evil, but he will never cut down the weak. The powerless watch as he brings down the most fearsome of monsters; to them, he appears as a champion of justice.

BASE_4.name: Eahta
BASE_4.profile: One of the Eternals—they who stand astride the skies and across the path of any would-be calamity. This undefeated swordmaster always seeks to improve his skills. His sword does not discriminate between good and evil, but he will never cut down the weak. The powerless watch as he brings down the most fearsome of monsters; to them, he appears as a champion of justice.

BASE.name: Ejaeli
BASE.profile: This beautiful singer's incredible voice won her fame, but also resentment. Her enemies cursed her, robbing her of speech and song. Only able to grunt, she wallowed in quiet despair for years until someone appeared who could understand her. Her heart leapt with joy as she departed on a new journey with the little band of travelers.

BASE_4.name: Ejaeli
BASE_4.profile: This beautiful singer's incredible voice won her fame, but also resentment. Her enemies cursed her, robbing her of speech and song. Only able to grunt, she wallowed in quiet despair for years until someone appeared who could understand her. Her heart leapt with joy as she departed on a new journey with the little band of travelers.

BASE.name: Elize Lutus
BASE.profile: Likes cute things, but loves Teepo in particular. Though somewhat shy and easily frightened, what she found waiting for her at the end of her mysterious adventure was the company of new friends. The courage and warmth she received from them is irreplaceable.

BASE.name: Elmelaura
BASE.profile: This gregarious little chef has mastered the hidden art of the giant kitchen knife. She seasons as her heart wills, and every scrumptious bite is a glimpse into her state of mind. She's skilled, but never boasts; humility is the true pride of a chef.

BASE.name: Elmott
BASE.profile: This young man is so entranced by flame, he will burn everything he can see. He doesn't try to make excuses for his ways and at heart is a pure and caring guy.

SUMMER.name: Elmott
SUMMER.profile: The Lord of the Galley whispers softly to the fresh meat. With a sudden motion, he thrusts it into the hellflame, searing it to trap the savory juices within. The wafting scent of roasting meat ensnares passersby, and soon they form a long line as his door; a thousand tounges wagging in the air in anticipation of his ghastly feast. He smiles--hellfire BBQ, grilled to perfection.

BASE.name: Elta
BASE.profile: Inspired by a song close to his heart, this minstrel brings music with him wherever he goes. His joyous melodies resound across the skies, serving as a beacon of light for those in their darkest hour.

SR.name: Elta
SR.profile: Hoping with all his heart that his neighbor could find happiness, this minstrel left for the skies with only the echo of a song to guide him. He knows he still has a lot to learn, but he's got just enough courage to change his tune.

BASE.jpname: エリカ・フォンティーヌ
BASE.name: Erica Fontaine
BASE.profile: Alighting from the skies is Erica; a timid, pious nun who entertains audiences as a cabaret dancer for the Chattes Noires from Paris. When danger draws near, she dons her true form, and bravely dashes toward the enemy with guns in hand, ready to serve justice.

BASE.name: Erin
BASE.profile: The crystal maiden takes an interest in the outside world. She breaks free of the shackles of her heart and takes a small step forward. That small step leads to a bigger step, and before long she finds herself adventuring through the skies. What lies before her are endless possibilities.

BASE.name: Eso
BASE.profile: This mighty warrior will take on any challenge to prove his courage, relying on his great axe to hew a path forward even when his way is unclear. He fights for what is right, but obstacles always rise to bar the path of a good man trying to make a difference.

SR.name: Eso
SR.profile: Having attained true strength, this warrior proudly returned to his homeland, but all that awaited him was scorched earth. Bearing the hero's robe bestowed to him by his people, Eso sets forth once more to lands unknown.

BASE.name: Estarriola
BASE.profile: Once an outstanding sorcerer, this man reached for forbidden cups in an attempt to flee from his personal demons. Not knowing that his deeds would be appraised, his life fell under temperance, in which he lost his emotions and rejected society. These cups runneth over with magic beyond comprehension—beyond what any living sorcerer can fathom.

BASE.name: Eugen
BASE.profile: This crafty musketeer finally shares the regret he's kept to himself all these years. The very girl intertwined with all this would feel indignant for her mother. Yet he continues to wait in high hopes.

SR.name: Eugen
SR.profile: Eugen is a crafty old soldier, yet he is filled with a kind of remorse that is rare even at his age. Nevertheless he has a good demeanor, and his skills and knowledge make him a powerful ally.

SR_4.name: Eugen
SR_4.profile: Eugen is a crafty old soldier, yet he is filled with a kind of remorse that is rare even at his age. Nevertheless he has a good demeanor, and his skills and knowledge make him a powerful ally.

SUMMER.name: Eugen
SUMMER.profile: This grizzled yet handsome old soldier turns his face to the bright summer sun, letting his thoughts drift back to his youth. His skill has not deteriorated with age; he slides smooth and steady under the arcing waves of the rough summer sea.

BASE.name: Europa
BASE.profile: The maiden blessed by water descends to the sky realm. While setting out to fulfill a mission assigned to her by a dear primarch and to satisfy her own inner desires, Europa has an epiphany—that those who dwell in the mortal world possess a most charming luminosity about them. This remarkable discovery piques her curiosity regarding all things mortal and reinforces her desire to gaze upon further beauty.

SUMMER.name: Europa
SUMMER.profile: The young maiden of water descends upon a boundless blue oceanfront, the bouquet in her hands both a gift and a symbol of deep affection from the mortal she travels with. Discerning unmatched beauty in the flowers and clutching them close, she swears to continue her journey with renewed spirit.

BASE.name: Eustace
BASE.profile: Having lost the only place where he belonged, this lone wolf roams the skydom unafraid to bear his teeth at the beasts who threaten peace. Although soft spoken, his quietly burning passion resonates in the thunderous roar of his trusty rifle.

DARK.name: Eustace
DARK.profile: The cool lone wolf has found a tranquil calm worth protecting. Safeguarding the torch that has thawed his frozen heart, he grits his teeth as he brushes off the heavy dew that stains his path.

DARK_4.name: Eustace
DARK_4.profile: The cool lone wolf has found a tranquil calm worth protecting. Safeguarding the torch that has thawed his frozen heart, he grits his teeth as he brushes off the heavy dew that stains his path.

HALLOWEEN.name: Eustace
HALLOWEEN.profile: Cloaked all in black, he roams the dark, autumnal nights. The thunder of his weapon echoes through the shadows, crying out to the crimson moon. In this journey he continues to search for his serenity in the din.

EVENT.name: Ezecrain (Event)
EVENT.profile: This soothsayer travels the skies in search of vengeance. Although darkness follows him wherever he goes, he is guided by the light of his amethysts. At times he saves others, but only when it will further his own interests.

BASE.name: Ezecrain
BASE.profile: Filled with both rage and resolve, this young man fights to win back peace for his people. The gleaming gem he carries urges him to seek bloody vengeance. Although he often gives the wealth he plunders from evildoers to the poor, it's not out of kindness—it's just to lighten his load.

EVENT.name: Farrah
EVENT.profile: She does everything she can to earn the affections of her beloved superior. Her young heart never falters, and she never thinks for a second longer than necessary. She set out for the skies immediately following an unexpected reunion on an island filled with water.
EVENT.recruitment: The Girl Who Leapt Through Mountains

R.name: Farrah
R.profile: She does everything she can to earn the affections of her beloved superior. Her young heart never falters, and she never thinks for a second longer than necessary. She set out for the skies immediately following an unexpected reunion on an island filled with water.

BASE.name: Farrah
BASE.profile: She stands at a crossroads, a look of consternation on her face. There are no signs here, the way featureless far into the horizon. Still, her path is clear. It's never changed. She'll follow the one she admires to the end, and that very conviction will guide her to incredible heights.

SUMMER.name: Farrah
SUMMER.profile: The much-anticipated seaside vacation has finally come for this young girl, but in order to spend it with Katalina, she must overcome a challenge. She battles through the baking heat, pushing her body through trials of swimming and running to arrive at a newfound... friendship? Or is it a renewed rivalry?

BASE.jpname: 同期組 ファラ＆ユーリ
BASE.name: Farrah and Juri
BASE.profile: Two soldiers find themselves in a future they never could have imagined during their training days in the Erste Empire. Though they will soon face dangerous, unknown foes, their sense of justice remains unyielding—sturdy as the new armor they wear.

BASE.name: Feather
BASE.profile: After a chance meeting with the martial artist he reveres, the wielder of blue lightning travels the skies seeking out strong opponents who make his blood rush and his soul sing. The only thing on his mind: pushing himself past his own limits to reach new heights.

HALLOWEEN.name: Feather
HALLOWEEN.profile: The man whose fists fly wreathed in blue lightning cloaks himself in a skeleton-themed costume. Tasked with making the Grandcypher's Halloween party the best in the skies, his passion boils over. With his partners in party-planning, this bone-bedecked brawler will show the crew the most haunted Halloween they've ever seen!

R.name: Feather
R.profile: His soul dances to the beats created by fighting fists. He's got a dream burned into the back of his brain, and he's going headlong after it with his hot-headed friend. He'll never give up telling reckless and funny stories with his fists.

SR.name: Feather
SR.profile: Blue lightning crackles across this fighter's furious fists, but his physical strength pales in comparison to the strength of his will. He raises clenched fists to the heavens, vowing to wind and sky that he'll one day surpass his rival.

SR_4.name: Feather
SR_4.profile: Blue lightning crackles across this fighter's furious fists, but his physical strength pales in comparison to the strength of his will. He raises clenched fists to the heavens, vowing to wind and sky that he'll one day surpass his rival.

BASE.name: Feena
BASE.profile: This globe-trotting agent just cannot contain the inquisitiveness that bubbles and boils within her. Her name strikes fear into the hearts of her enemies- even the terrible alien beings quiver in terror. Soon, that name will reverberate across all the skydom!

EVENT.name: Feena
EVENT.profile: In a futile quest to satisfy her insatiable curiosity, she travels hither and thither. Somewhere along the way she gained fame as Feena, the invincible agent. Now her name rings out in taverns 'round the world, and she absolutely loves basking in the accolades.

HOLIDAY.name: Feena
HOLIDAY.profile: She made a promise, And forgot it twice, Gonna find out she's both naughty and nice. Feena Claus is coming to town.

BASE.name: Feower
BASE.profile: One of the Eternals—they who stand astride the skies and across the path of any would-be calamity. Feower leads Stardust Town with his twin sister. The poise and dignity with which he carries himself belies a ferocious desire to defend those he cares about. He flaunts his fearsome power so that none dare insult him or his family.

BASE_4.name: Feower
BASE_4.profile: One of the Eternals—they who stand astride the skies and across the path of any would-be calamity. Feower leads Stardust Town with his twin sister. The poise and dignity with which he carries himself belies a ferocious desire to defend those he cares about. He flaunts his fearsome power so that none dare insult him or his family.

BASE_5.name: Feower
BASE_5.profile: One of the Eternals—they who stand astride the skies and across the path of any would-be calamity. Feower leads Stardust Town with his twin sister. The poise and dignity with which he carries himself belies a ferocious desire to defend those he cares about. He flaunts his fearsome power so that none dare insult him or his family.

BASE.name: Ferry
BASE.profile: Given a mission from the verdant nature, this young girl sets out on a journey where she crosses paths with an evil spirit. Having lost even its spiritual form, she recalls the time she lost her own way and responds to the evil spirit's howls of despair, giving it a name.

GRAND.name: Ferry
GRAND.profile: Time had stayed frozen for this Erune for far too long, but she is finally ready to move on. Having learned and come to terms with the fate of her beloved little sister, Ferry's solemn grief turns to hopeful prayer as she takes a step forward, confident that she will eventually reunite with her family at journey's end.

HALLOWEEN.name: Ferry
HALLOWEEN.profile: When young souls journey from their misty isles to the outer realm, I watch over them. Apparitions existing between the realms of life and death soar the sky, beckoned by friendly souls. Drifting in the wind, the loneliness they once bore scatters away across the deep blue.

SR.name: Ferry
SR.profile: Nearly hidden by the swirling mists of her tiny island, Ferry offers up a lonely prayer. Please grant the lost souls of this place eternal rest. Please grant your blessings to the courageous yet weak life that departs this island for an uncertain future.

SUMMER.name: Ferry
SUMMER.profile: Pets by her side, one girl eagerly departs on a summer vacation. She runs into friends from the same skydom by chance and spends time enjoying their company, savoring frozen treats all the while. At the end of their gathering, they promise to one day meet again for more good times together.

BASE.name: Fif
BASE.profile: One of the Eternals—they who stand astride the skies and across the path of any would-be calamity. This child prodigy possesses near infinite reserves of magical power, but her splendid smile and youthful exuberance do almost as much as her magic to heal the hearts of her charges.

BASE_4.name: Fif
BASE_4.profile: One of the Eternals—they who stand astride the skies and across the path of any would-be calamity. This child prodigy possesses near infinite reserves of magical power, but her splendid smile and youthful exuberance do almost as much as her magic to heal the hearts of her charges.

BASE_5.name: Fif
BASE_5.profile: One of the Eternals—they who stand astride the skies and across the path of any would-be calamity. This child prodigy possesses near infinite reserves of magical power, but her splendid smile and youthful exuberance do almost as much as her magic to heal the hearts of her charges.

BASE.name: Filene
BASE.profile: A withdrawn girl who only knew of a solemn fate bestowed upon her. Over the years her heart has grown cold, imprisoned in perpetual solitude. In her frigid, barren world, a hand reaches out to her. Drawn by its warmth, she breaks free from her cage of white to take on the skies of blue.

BASE.name: Fiorito
BASE.profile: A young fighter devotes herself to training her muscles in hopes that her own strength will blossom and grow. Though her spectacular abilities prove valuable on the crew's journey, the darkness she harbors has yet to show itself, festering inside her slowly but dangerously.

BASE.name: Flesselles
BASE.profile: An archer descended from an Erune hunting society in the mountains. After becoming an adult, Flesselles left his home and began living as a hunter on his own in accordance with the laws of the land. However, he was never really suited for a life of such loneliness.

BASE.name: Florence
BASE.profile: This vigilant woman follows in her parents' footsteps, ready to defend her home at a moment's notice. None shall trespass into Dalmore on her watch.

BASE.name: Forte
BASE.profile: A champion of great repute and wielder of immense, dragon-subjugating power. She spends her days honing and tempering her combat skills, searching for a worthy opponent.

BASE.name: Fraux
BASE.profile: Power too great, strength too great—her destiny was altered by the whisper of a demon who snuck in using dark sentiments and the departure of a friend. But in the end, the brilliant power which at last fled from restraints is sure to illuminate the way of the path.

BASE.name: Freezie
BASE.profile: Listen, dude. Freezie's, like, my goddess. Sure she looks mean, but that heavenly smile of hers... dude. It totally stole my heart away. When I think of her, I feel a throbbing... Wait, that sounds kinda dirty. I meant a throbbing in my heart, okay! My heart! Anyway, my chest feels like it's gonna burst! I'm tellin' you, she's gonna be the end of me, man! Ah, I'd give anything to hold her in my arms right now! Aight, I'm done.

BASE.jpname: ダーント&フライハイト
BASE.name: Dante and Freiheit
BASE.profile: The cat-revering mage watches in awe the ways of an aloof warrior cat. Will learning from this feline wonder lead to the freedom that Dante has always sought, or will it break new ground in his cat-loving ways? Either way, Dante is always ready to give his all in order to learn everything there is to learn from the almighty pets.

BASE.name: Friday
BASE.profile: Workplace innovator Friday heads to the beach to study vacationers' relaxation strategies and promote Premium Friday—a tradition of her own invention. With her beloved mechanical FRIED SHRIMP under her arm, Friday sets out to research the ideal conditions for rest and relaxation.

BASE.name: Gachapin
BASE.profile: This kid dinosaur hailing from the southern lands is always brimming with curiosity as he heads out into the blue yonder. Never one to back away from a challenge, he inspires hope, bravery, and positivity in all. Along with his trusty red sidekick, this adventurer is set to leave his mark on the skies.
BASE.recruitment: Gachapin, Mukku, and the Azure Adventure

BASE.name: Galadar
BASE.profile: Stout though the Draph might be, they are skilled craftsmen. Galadar is a master of numerous disciplines, and his hands have shaped many an exquisite item. He can even breathe new life into a shattered sword.

SR.name: Galadar
SR.profile: Galadar is the practical sort. He never believed in theory, preferring to place his faith in his arm and his experience. Following the hard-learned laws of steel and iron, he hammers glowing metal, forging his path forward.

BASE.name: Garma
BASE.profile: Abandoned as a child, he was forced to live his life in the shadows. For years, he stole to live and lived to steal. What saved him from the cesspit of his existence was the radiant smile of the girl in blue.

BASE.name: Gawain
BASE.profile: Gawain trusted in his own strength a little too much and drew his blade on an incredibly powerful opponent. In order to remove the resulting curse, he must perform several good deeds. But it seems the meaning of these deeds is lost on him—it does not appear the curse will lift anytime soon.

BASE_4.name: Gawain
BASE_4.profile: Gawain trusted in his own strength a little too much and drew his blade on an incredibly powerful opponent. In order to remove the resulting curse, he must perform several good deeds. But it seems the meaning of these deeds is lost on him—it does not appear the curse will lift anytime soon.

LIGHT.name: Gawain
LIGHT.profile: The hubristic side of this man is dead, replaced by a selfless knight who leaps to his country's aid. Reformed through his travels with caring friends, he wins back the trust of his homeland citizens, and walks the path of true heroism.

BASE.name: Gayne
BASE.profile: This woman puts on bewitching blade dances that are dreamlike in their beauty, earning the fascination of many. Contrary to appearances, she herself is incredibly shy, though her humility is the secret to her popularity.

BASE_4.name: Gayne
BASE_4.profile: This woman puts on bewitching blade dances that are dreamlike in their beauty, earning the fascination of many. Contrary to appearances, she herself is incredibly shy, though her humility is the secret to her popularity.

BASE.name: Geisenborger
BASE.profile: Feared as the raging Chariot who tramples over all on the battlefield, a turn of fate with the stars has convinced this trueborn warrior to purge the skies of The World. It will not be an easy path, but he marches onward in full swing.

BASE.jpname: ジェミニ・サンライズ
BASE.name: Gemini Sunrise
BASE.profile: Alighting from the skies is Gemini; one part actress bathing in the limelight of the stage, one part justice-wielding samurai. Clutching the teachings of her late master close to her heart and her beloved katana, Red Sun, close to her side, she strikes down evil with extreme efficiency.

BASE.name: Ghandagoza
BASE.profile: It's been decades since Ghandagoza left home dreaming of becoming the world's greatest warrior— and his journey continues! But know this! One day, his name will go down in history as the greatest brawler that ever lived!

BASE_4.name: Ghandagoza
BASE_4.profile: It's been decades since Ghandagoza left home dreaming of becoming the world's greatest warrior— and his journey continues! But know this! One day, his name will go down in history as the greatest brawler that ever lived!

SUMMER.name: Ghandagoza
SUMMER.profile: The unrivaled fighter's meandering path at last brings him to the sea. He dons an unfamiliar swimsuit, but he finds it suits him just fine, thank you very much. Dare you laugh at a paramount warrior as he continues his beach-bound trek toward martial enlightenment?

BASE.name: Goblin Mage
BASE.profile: This goblin girl became attached to a human agent who showed her kindness. She pursued the agent over mountain and dale-even across the borders of goblin land. Her affection will lead her into the sky and beyond.

BASE.name: Golden Knight
BASE.profile: This knight once strived to be a magnificent piece in her father's arsenal, but she was forced to hang up her armor in despair. Although embers of her pride still glowed, it would take the arrival of heroic travelers to reignite her flame. Donning her armor once more, its golden luster lights the path she herself chooses to take.

BASE.name: Grea
BASE.profile: A dragoness with power that transcends her human half. After overcoming a calamitous event, she vows to never break a promise made with a newfound friend. She pursues ever stronger sources of strength in a bid to protect everything she holds dear.

EVENT.name: Grea
EVENT.profile: A young girl who harbors the power of a dragon within herself wishes to be left alone. She's afraid of that power—a power that could wound others, as well as her own heart. But then a chance meeting with another girl shows her a new path. It's a path fraught with obstacles, but one Grea believes she can surpass with the help of her new friendship.

SUMMER.name: Grea
SUMMER.profile: A once lonesome young woman sets foot on the beach with her companions. Clad in swimwear selected by her friends, she experiences these blissful hours as a dream made real. In days past it would have seemed impossible to her, a person neither fully dragon nor fully human. Reveling in this bliss, she smiles softly and makes a wish: may this moment of joy last an eternity.

BASE.name: Grimnir
BASE.profile: The eyes of this tempest god giltter at the sight of the singularity—the one exemplified by steel mind and noble spirit. This commander of great winds has appeared to fulfill his mission of saving the world.

VALENTINE.name: Grimnir
VALENTINE.profile: The God of War and Tempest Incarnate undertakes a new challenge, prepared to brave a storm of the unknown and face numerous trials in order to convey his true feelings. For the one he holds dear in his heart, failure is not an option.

BASE.name: Haaselia
BASE.profile: The resourceful and ingenious High Priestess wears an elegant smile, shrouding the clever deceit she keeps inside. She reached the breaking point of her patience when tragedy struck, transforming her festering enmity into a desire for revenge. Her heart now stained black, Haaselia is prepared to do whatever it takes to accomplish her goal—even if it means deceiving those close to her.

BASE.name: Hallessena
BASE.profile: After spending most of her childhood being picked on, this little lady's finally decided to turn the tables. Although she desires ease and peace of mind for all deep down, her abrasiveness has earned her the nickname "The Walking Wraith."

BASE_4.name: Hallessena
BASE_4.profile: After spending most of her childhood being picked on, this little lady's finally decided to turn the tables. Although she desires ease and peace of mind for all deep down, her abrasiveness has earned her the nickname "The Walking Wraith."

HALLOWEEN.name: Hallessena
HALLOWEEN.profile: The loud and frenzied revving of a chain saw welcomes in All Hallows' Eve. Splattering her lethal weapon with a brilliant array of colors, this little lady steps into the night, ready to trick or treat like there's no tomorrow.

BASE.jpname: ハールート・マールート
BASE.name: Halluel and Malluel
BASE.profile: These twins resume their roles as archangels of instruction, deciding for themselves which paths they wish to take. They are committed to working as the newly-formed Archangel Parcel Service, but that doesn’t mean there’s no time for play. With shiny beach pails swinging in their hands, the twins are excited to make plenty of summer memories.

BASE.name: Haohmaru
BASE.profile: An openhearted seeker of strength, this free-spirited samurai follows the way of the sword, walking the path of a warrior even after attaining mastery in his art. What awaits him at the end of his journey?

BASE.name: Hazen
BASE.profile: He has chosen a fist that is as hard as steel. Why? Because it's more effective than any sermon, and strikes fear into the hearts of people and ferocious beasts alike.

SR.name: Hazen
SR.profile: This priest long wrestled with his shortcomings as a community leader. One day, he decided that enough was enough and left his flock to seek enlightenment. His kind smile never fades, but his benevolent fists of rage always set troubled hearts back on the right path.

BASE.jpname: ヘレル・ベン・シャレム
BASE.name: Helel ben Shalem
BASE.profile: A divine servant not seen since antiquity reawakens in a world which to her is the future. She journeys across the skies, determined to fill in the blank spaces that dot her memories.

BASE.name: Heles
BASE.profile: When she learned that it was her father's foolishness that brought ruin to her homeland, this princess began to doubt the need for a throne. She smashed the old systems of rule for the sake of her people, letting them choose their own path. The former princess looks out onto the wide blue sky, overwhelmed by the extent of her newfound freedom.

SUMMER.name: Heles
