SUMMER.profile: This princess travels afar in hopes of enriching her royal subjects. When she and her allies make merry on the beaches of Auguste, an unexpected fortune presents itself to her.

WIND.name: Heles
WIND.profile: A malicious true dragon delivers a deep blow to an island protected by a true dragon of benevolence. In the aftermath of destruction, a champion rises—the former princess. Now she must lead her people away from their darkest despair toward a brighter tomorrow.

BASE.name: Helnar
BASE.profile: A free-spirited man whose conduct tends toward the inappropriate. Though he's easily excited, Helnar quiets down when scolded by the dancer he travels with.

BASE_4.name: Helnar
BASE_4.profile: A free-spirited man whose conduct tends toward the inappropriate. Though he's easily excited, Helnar quiets down when scolded by the dancer he travels with.

SUMMER.name: Helnar
SUMMER.profile: Underneath the bright summer sun, he chases beautiful girls through the froth of the lapping waves. The rush of the sea and the voices of the fairer gender convince him to change into something beach-appropriate, and into a pair of trunks he goes.

BASE.name: Herja
BASE.profile: The young leader of the Iron Spear mercenaries sometimes flounders under the weight of the decisions she faces. But once she makes up her mind, her conviction can break through any wall.

R.name: Herja
R.profile: This agent captain appears as stark and cold as the blade she wields, but underneath that gruff exterior she's just as emotional as anyone else. Whenever she finds herself falling in love, she throws herself into her training, hammering it out with every blow of her sword.

SR.name: Herja
SR.profile: Plagued with wanton thoughts, Herja aims to rid herself of these worldly desires once and for all by embracing love head on. With love blooming in her heart, her life begins to move in unexpected directions.

BASE.name: Hiro Ryugasaki
BASE.profile: He's just a kid, a world away from home and making his way through unfamiliar skies. But he's got good friends, youthful energy, and an indomitable heart. With these tools, there's no bridge he can't build, no chasm he can't cross.

BASE.name: Illnott
BASE.profile: A shadowy figure known only as the King of the Night. She travels by moonlight, bringing with her cultural revolution and leaving behind her towns drenched in criminal color. Nothing amuses her more than to watch souls drown in the craze inspired by her creations.

BASE.name: Ilsa
BASE.profile: In order to teach the skills necessary to survive on the battlefield, this woman has hardened her heart to an almost demonic degree. But behind her harsh insults lies the determination of a drill sergeant who wants to see her cadets thrive. The only thing scarier to her than being hated is the fear of her comrades needlessly dying—so she spares no anger when she shouts at her platoon.

LIGHT.name: Ilsa
LIGHT.profile: Pursued by an unseen enemy, this drill sergeant moves from island to island with her cadets in tow. She calls upon a steely resolve to protect herself, her beloved seal weapon, and the students who have nowhere else to call home.

SUMMER.name: Ilsa
SUMMER.profile: Weary from her duties, this drill instructor procures a swimsuit of the first water for a long-awaited day of fun under the sun. White as the sandy shores of Auguste, her ensemble flaunts an aura of distinction with its golden accents. Never one to keep her guns out of reach, a mantle artfully conceals Nybeth by her side as she steps into the balmy sea for her beach debut.

BASE.jpname: 竈門炭治郎＆竈門禰豆子＆我妻善逸＆嘴平伊之助
BASE.name: Tanjiro, Nezuko, Zenitsu, and Inosuke
BASE.profile: Even in another world, these young Demon Slayers continue to swing their mighty blades—for the things they wish to protect, as well as the obstacles they seek to overcome. An unrelenting spirit burns within their eyes, never dying out.
BASE.recruitment: Scent of Fate at Sky's End

BASE.name: Io
BASE.profile: As she criss-crosses the sky, this apprentice mage recollects her master's words. She is coming into herself like a bud bursting into flower.

BASE_4.name: Io
BASE_4.profile: As she criss-crosses the sky, this apprentice mage recollects her master's words. She is coming into herself like a bud bursting into flower.

SR.name: Io
SR.profile: A young girl of Valtz. Her immaturities stand out, however her resolve to find a new magic master after her former abandoned her is inspiring.
SR.recruitment: Chapter 6 Story: The Veil Is Lifted

SR_4.name: Io
SR_4.profile: A young girl of Valtz. Her immaturities stand out, however her resolve to find a new magic master after her former abandoned her is inspiring.
SR_4.recruitment: Chapter 6 Story: The Veil Is Lifted

SUMMER.name: Io
SUMMER.profile: Like the fiery flowers that burst in the evening sky, she blazes with colors appropriate for the season. She sheds the weight of her traveler's pack and leaps into the waves; heart soaring with the laughter of friends. Soon she dozes peacefully, an innocent smile on her face.

BASE.name: Ippatsu
BASE.profile: After a particularly fragrant helping of noodles, this gourmet was inspired to search far and wide for the ultimate bowl. Any who dare get in between him and his lunch is sure to meet a quick end.

SR.name: Ippatsu
SR.profile: This ramen lover extraordinaire yearns to share his fancy for exotic noodles far across the skies. To that end he is willing to explore the depths of the world for the perfect method—an endeavor in which his experience in consuming countless bowls of ramen will surely come in handy.

SUMMER.name: Ippatsu
SUMMER.profile: Ramen. His love for the dish birthed the question, how does one spread the joy of ramen to all? Answering this very question has become his life's purpose.

BASE.name: Isaac
BASE.profile: A skydweller who inherited from his distant ancestors his pride as an engineer, the love of his neighbors, and the goal of reaching the beautiful moon that sparkles every starry night. Intertwined with the fates of so many, sweat beads down his forehead as he grips his trusty tools, ready to build his own path to the future.

BASE.name: Izmir
BASE.profile: An ice queen formerly devoted to a life of solitude and sacrifice. Upon meeting skyfaring adventurers, she decides to give up her old life and pursue a new life in the skies.

BASE_4.name: Izmir
BASE_4.profile: An ice queen formerly devoted to a life of solitude and sacrifice. Upon meeting skyfaring adventurers, she decides to give up her old life and pursue a new life in the skies.

SUMMER.name: Izmir
SUMMER.profile: A young woman of ice, she sticks out like a sore thumb upon the crew's arrival at a resort in perpetual summer. Accepting that her fate will soon catch up to her, she holds onto the precious moments spent with her fellow skyfarers while anticipating their eventual parting.

BASE.name: Izuminokami Kanesada
BASE.profile: This self-assured swordsman unleashes a fierce torrent of pain upon his enemies with each strike of his blade. The unwavering pride and conviction he feels—as symbolized by his light-blue haori—define the entirety of his very being.

BASE.name: J.J.
BASE.profile: This unusual troubadour blasts his unique lyrics and stylish rhythms across the sky. His frank manner, sick beats, and habit of never backing down have made him the hero of feisty kids all over Phantagrande. You can find his name painted in bright colors in streets and alleyways all across the skydom.

SUMMER.name: J.J.
SUMMER.profile: With his hot beats and cool lyrics, J.J. invented Phantagrande hip-hop to become an overnight sensation. Down by the beach, if you listen carefully, you can hear him as he cooks up some noodles with his newest melodies.

BASE.name: Jamil
BASE.profile: This descendant of an extinct clan vows to exact revenge on those who brought about the ruin of his family, parting ways with his current master to do so. Stuck at a crossroads between loyalty and revenge, will Jamil ultimately choose the light leading to a brighter tomorrow, or will he continue down the dark path of revenge?

SR.name: Jamil
SR.profile: A descendant of a legendary clan which has since fallen, he travels the skies to seek revenge against those who wronged him. He uses mysterious techniques to cut a path through enemies, but what lies in the eyes of this honor-bound man, light or darkness?

BASE.name: Jasmine
BASE.profile: Born and raised in the forest, this girl is always carrying on with the flora and fauna. She's as gentle as the land while she keeps watch, and occasionally has intuition beyond that of the average person.

SR.name: Jasmine
SR.profile: A gentle, compassionate girl that writes down everything she knows, Jasmine freely shares her knowledge with the world. Seeking no honors or rewards, she desires only to heal the suffering people of the world and scribble down a few notes in the process.

BASE.name: Jeanne d'Arc
BASE.profile: The girl who had received a revelation senses the shadow of a great one from the small dragon that adorably flies about. The determination of this girl impassioned by her mission inspires her comrades, guiding the world and its people towards peace and harmony.

BASE_4.name: Jeanne d'Arc
BASE_4.profile: The girl who had received a revelation senses the shadow of a great one from the small dragon that adorably flies about. The determination of this girl impassioned by her mission inspires her comrades, guiding the world and its people towards peace and harmony.

DARK.name: Jeanne d'Arc
DARK.profile: A young girl who, upon receiving a revelation, attempted a journey for the salvation of the world. But her path was paved in blood and still echoes with the grudges of the departed. Despite this, she is determined to see the world's deliverance, even as she is swallowed by the darkness.

GRAND.name: Jeanne d'Arc
GRAND.profile: This maiden dons a cloak of falsehoods, her memories warped and twisted by an Otherworldly being that invades her dreams. Luckily the voices of those she swore to protect reawaken her to the mission she was entrusted with. Gripping her new sword in one hand and her spear in the other, she slays the conniving intruder in a burst of light.

SR.name: Jeanne d'Arc
SR.profile: True to Orleans custom, this local maiden trains in the way of the sword. Though she does not yet know of the revelation to come, the purity in her heart shines bright with the hope to one day save all people.

SUMMER.name: Jeanne d'Arc
SUMMER.profile: A young woman, pure of heart, questions her new attire as she dips her toe into the water. Having removed herself from incessant battles, the enjoyment she shares with her allies is as clear as the stream flowing past her feet. But guilt also seeps into her heart—will those yet to be saved grant her even this brief moment of release?

BASE.name: Jessica
BASE.profile: This yukata is now Jessica's treasure, filled with precious memories from when she chose it together with those closest to her—the captain, Lyria, Vyrn, and Ayer. Even after summer ends, these memories are sure to come flooding back whenever she takes the yukata into her hands.

EVENT.name: Jessica
EVENT.profile: Determined to bring her kidnapped brother home, Jessica continues to travel around the skydom. She is a soft spoken girl whose determination is visible in her over-the-top weapon choice. She sometimes meddles in the affairs of her friends, just like she used to do to her brother.
EVENT.recruitment: The Cowardly Hero and the Captive Princess

SR.name: Jessica
SR.profile: After a long and arduous journey, Jessica reunites with her long lost brother. Despite his troubles, worries, and flaws, she accepts him as he is. Standing by his side, she continues to move forward and search for happiness.

SUMMER.name: Jessica
SUMMER.profile: Wrapped in a bathing suit for an unexpected mission, the bashful smile of this beautiful lass captivates all who glimpse it. She grips her weapon tight, her trigger finger ready. If she hears a cry for help, she'll fly into action; felling the enemy with one well-placed shot.

BASE.name: Jin
BASE.profile: This righteous swordsman's chance encounter with the person he has admired since his youth leaves him questioning the gap between ideal and reality. No longer certain of what he's believed all his life, what conclusion will he reach at contemplation's end?

EVENT.name: Jin
EVENT.profile: A wandering swordsman who took up arms to save his sand-blasted country. However, his pure intentions are being used for evil. His blade represents an overwhelming threat to the priestess, in whose path it now stands.

RONIN.name: Jin
RONIN.profile: Buffeted by the hardships of the secular world, this man began to stray from the path of righteousness. That is until he saw the light of justice flash in the eye of a certain skyfarer. Now, no storm of self-doubt will again shake his renewed faith. He takes off for the skies, seeking to do good.

SUMMER.name: Jin
SUMMER.profile: Once a wanderer in search of a just way of life, Jin now believes the skyfarers' journey to be the one true path. Free from doubt, he continues his travels fighting to protect those he holds dear.

WIND.name: Jin
WIND.profile: After much disillusionment searching for the road to justice, Jin comes across a heroic skyfarer who will lead him down the right path. Seeing Jin's determination to follow his captain to the end, the men of the sea grant their blessings in the form of a pure, white garment.

BASE.name: Joel
BASE.profile: His heart will always be by the shining sea of his home, but he hears the call of the great ocean that lies far beneath the clouds. His friends laugh at him for believing in such tales, but he longs to swim through those mythic waters.

SR.name: Joel
SR.profile: He spent his youth dreaming of an endless ocean at the bottom of the sky. However, all he finds there is desolation. But with the precious companions he made on the way, he is ready to set his sights on new goals. Whether it be exploring the depths of the world or traveling to other skydoms, his journey has only just begun.

BASE.name: Johann
BASE.profile: For all his usual calm, it's impossible to get him to sit down and stop talking when it comes to myth and legend. He spends his days wandering the world in search of relics of a bygone age, led only by his staff and insatiable curiosity. With a quiet smile on his lips, he traces forgotten characters on timeworn stone.

SR.name: Johann
SR.profile: After visiting the ruins of the Astrals, this starry-eyed folklorist sets his sights on other skydoms, with a thirst for the truth as boundless as the azure sky itself. Having settled in aboard the Grandcypher, there's nowhere this curious spirit won't go.

BASE.name: Joker
BASE.profile: A teenager who was forced to move from his hometown after an influential public figure accused him of a crime he didn't commit. On the surface he appears to be a common high schooler, but below that is the leader of the Phantom Thieves of Hearts. Blessed with the power to utilize a multitude of Personas, it's fitting that this Wild Card is also the ace in the hole for the Phantom Thieves.

BASE.name: Joy
BASE.profile: This innocent little bell was called into being to take on the mighty task of banishing Kleshas. Beloved rolling pin in hand, it marches along its chosen path, tolling loud and proud for all to hear.

BASE.name: Juliet
BASE.profile: Juliet is the princess and only daughter of Lord Capulet. Once a weak and delicate girl, she has matured remarkably as heir to the Capulet throne. Her undying love is the light of salvation for all.

WATER.name: Juliet
WATER.profile: After overcoming countless tragedies, this maiden pledges her undying love to Romeo. Clad in a pure white dress, her smile is as radiant as the summer sun.

BASE.jpname: 同期組 ファラ＆ユーリ
BASE.name: Farrah and Juri
BASE.profile: Two soldiers find themselves in a future they never could have imagined during their training days in the Erste Empire. Though they will soon face dangerous, unknown foes, their sense of justice remains unyielding—sturdy as the new armor they wear.

EVENT.name: Juri
EVENT.profile: This young soldier's spirit burns with conviction, but a stray emotion grew until it filled his heart with another sort of fire. When his feelings led him to come face to face with an unpleasant truth, he had no choice but to set out on a new path.

SR.name: Juri
SR.profile: His heart filled with lofty aspirations, this brave young soldier undergoes his first mission. His inexperience brings about a grave crisis, but he learns much about the imperial spirit within himself in overcoming the challenge.

BASE.name: Kaede Takagaki
BASE.profile: A cozy dream whisks this mature and mysterious idol to the distant world of the skies. Her clear, beautiful singing voice reaches the welkin, stirring the hearts of all who reside under it.
BASE.recruitment: Cinderella Fantasy: To the Skies Once More

BASE.name: Kallen Kouzuki
BASE.profile: Fully devoting herself to the Black Knights, this young woman puts everything on the line in order to liberate Japan from the Holy Britannian Empire. Personally assigned by Zero to pilot the Guren Mk-II, she holds a deep admiration for her commander and takes great pride in fighting for his cause as captain of the Zero Squad.
BASE.recruitment: Code Geass: Lelouch of the RebellionThe Blue Reckoning

BASE.name: Kanako Mimura
BASE.profile: Kanako is a young girl who followed a wandering soul and became lost in a sky far away. She brings peace and happiness to sky dwellers with a gentle smile and delicious treats.
BASE.recruitment: Cinderella Fantasy ~Peace for Lost Souls~Cinderella Fantasy ~Piña Hazard~

BASE.name: Kaoru Sakuraba
BASE.profile: Summoned to this world by a powerful light, Kaoru is a knight vested in blue with an ice cold gaze. He operates with precision and calm, in crisp movements too quick to leave even a trace of pain.
BASE.recruitment: SideM Fantasy: To the Sky Realm for Some Reasons

BASE.name: Karin
BASE.profile: The leader of the Kanzuki family and the head of the Kanzuki Zaibatsu. With her family motto of "All you need is victory!", Karin considers winning to be a requirement and never misses an opportunity to train. Though she speaks in a way that offends most people, Karin would gladly rush into harm's way to save anyone she considers to be worthy.

BASE.name: Karteira
BASE.profile: She gathers rumors from every market and merchant under the sky, ears twitching toward each whisper on the wind. Coins jingle wherever she goes—even the invisible hand of commerce dances to her tune.

SR.name: Karteira
SR.profile: Equipped with an abacus in her right hand, a giant fan in her left, and a large drum on her back, this gentle soul follows the winds from island to island. No matter where she treads, she leaves abundant happiness and blossoming markets in her wake.

BASE.name: Karva
BASE.profile: This treasure hunter lives for the thrill she gets from dancing on the precipice of danger. She accepts hundred of risky jobs, and often gets cheated out of her share in the end. Still, she just keeps going, disarming traps with ease and grabbing the loot. Word has it she's looking for someone to team up with.

SR.name: Karva
SR.profile: This treasure hunter and her friends delve into uncharted ruins, where deadly traps and pitfalls surely await. However, these hazards only add to the thrill that she thirsts for on her expeditions, for the treasure found at the end of a perilous road is one that holds true value—at least according to her.

BASE.name: Karyl
BASE.profile: A member of the Gourmet Guild hailing from the continent of Astraea, Karyl is a talented magic user both on and off the battlefield. Her sharp tongue can give people a harsh impression of her, but those who know her best recognize how kind and considerate she is beneath the bluster.
BASE.recruitment: Princess Connect! Re:DiveDinner at the Turned Table

BASE.name: Katalina
BASE.profile: This knight has left the Empire behind her, and now stands opposed to everything she once stood for. Bidding farewell to former allies, she dons the armor of her new role—knight protector. She raises her face to the sky, and swears that she will show her charge that great wide world.

BASE_4.name: Katalina
BASE_4.profile: This knight has left the Empire behind her, and now stands opposed to everything she once stood for. Bidding farewell to former allies, she dons the armor of her new role—knight protector. She raises her face to the sky, and swears that she will show her charge that great wide world.

PROMO.name: Katalina
PROMO.profile: This upstanding officer of the empire deserted it all to free a girl who was once a weapon. Even if it means being disparaged as a betrayer, her chivalrous volition is unwavering.
PROMO.recruitment: Granblue Fantasy: The Animation BD/DVD Vol. 1Siero's Special Pick TicketLinks Pick Ticket

SR.name: Katalina
SR.profile: Lyria's bodyguard, and a girl with a mysterious past. She has let fly a banner of rebellion against the Empire, and is by turn Lyria's loyal retainer and her loving older sister.

SR_4.name: Katalina
SR_4.profile: Lyria's bodyguard, and a girl with a mysterious past. She has let fly a banner of rebellion against the Empire, and is by turn Lyria's loyal retainer and her loving older sister.

SUMMER.name: Katalina
SUMMER.profile: Even this stalwart knight sheds her armor underneath the blazing heat of the summer sun. Many heads turn at the sight of her, but her cheeks flare red as she scowls back. This knight will not lay down her sword today.

BASE.name: Katzelia
BASE.profile: He rules over the impoverished as their king while hiding his bloodstained past. Gone are his glory days as an orchestra conductor, the peace of his empire lost to deception. From the day he obtained mighty gales of judging winds, everything he does is for the reclamation of his homeland.

BASE.name: Keehar
BASE.profile: This seasoned skyfarer once worked as a guardsman for a legendary order of minstrels. His skill has not deteriorated with age; every shot from his bow will find its way to a monster's heart. Bored by retirement he returns to the skies, seeking adventure once more.

BASE.name: Kokkoro
BASE.profile: This girl from Astraea is a core member of the Gourmet Guild. She will brave any danger and bear any hardship for her lord's sake. Though she calls herself his faithful guide, her comprehensive coddling is more like that of an overprotective mother.
BASE.recruitment: Princess Connect! Re:DiveDinner at the Turned Table

BASE.name: Kolulu
BASE.profile: This girl has always known the sting of poverty. She's forced into vagrancy after her home island burns to the ground. Her steel-like body and a spear scavenged from a trash heap helps her earn enough money to survive from day to day. The best thing in life, at least in her mind, is satisfying an empty stomach.

SUMMER.name: Kolulu
SUMMER.profile: The young girl with an iron stomach resolves to gorge herself on the gourmet flavors of the deep blue sea. But whether her wish leads her to joy or tragedy, her experiences in Auguste will stir her heart and blossom into beautiful memories.

BASE.name: Korwa
BASE.profile: A fashion designer who is as good at weaving stories as she is elegant dresses. Seeing her first wedding dress is her most treasured memory. She sometimes plays pranks, but she always ensures that the story ends happily ever after.

SR.name: Korwa
SR.profile: A glimpse into a past that might or might not have happened. A time full of puppy love, shared secrets, and glittering hopes for the future.

SUMMER.name: Korwa
SUMMER.profile: Korwa wishes a beautiful conclusion for all who cross her path, but what of her own happy ending? A summer vacation spent soul-searching on the beach and observing other blissful tales allows this remarkable fashion designer to see that she is already living the happy ending of her dreams.

BASE.name: Kou
BASE.profile: This boy, so connected to the distant past, could never have imagined the trials waiting at the end of his journey of atonement. The love and kindness of others has helped him grow. Now he is determined to become a man who can protect his loved ones in return.

BASE.name: Koume Shirasaka
BASE.profile: Koume is a young girl who followed a wandering soul and became lost in a sky far away. Her unconditional kindness surpasses the boundaries of this world and the afterlife to reach even the most faded of hearts.
BASE.recruitment: Cinderella Fantasy ~Peace for Lost Souls~Cinderella Fantasy ~Piña Hazard~

BASE.name: Krugne
BASE.profile: This traveler walks the world, tossing his handmade dice lightly from palm to palm. His laugh is dry, but underneath his veneer of self-deprecation lies a firm resolve.

SR.name: Krugne
SR.profile: In hopes of someday creating true rune dice, he continues his journey through the skies, believing that at the end of his path lies something attainable through his power alone.

BASE.name: Kumbhira
BASE.profile: One of the Twelve Divine Generals, she guards the north-northwest. Unlike the divine boars before her, she doesn't possess the blessed might of her ilk, but still she ventures into the skies to prove herself worthy. Little does she know that her sincerity and ambition do more for those around her than any amount of strength ever could.

EVENT.name: Kumbhira
EVENT.profile: It is the task of a divine boar to drive away base desires and restore peace to the skies. For years, this young general has struggled to fill the shoes her predecessors left behind. But this year, she is ready to charge forth with the support of her friends and leave her own footprints on the world.

BASE.name: Kyojuro Rengoku
BASE.profile: Here is a hero. Strength courses through him; in his hand flares a sword like an incandescent torch. Shadows fly before him; evil cannot abide him. To the untold lives he has saved, he is a symbol—of pride, of vitality, and of hope rekindled from the ashes of despair.
BASE.recruitment: Scent of Fate at Sky's End

BASE.name: La Coiffe
BASE.profile: Born into a nature-loving family of master gardeners, La Coiffe was taught the importance of coexisting with the natural world from an early age. Now, after years of study, the techniques she's learned are finally bearing fruit.

SR.name: La Coiffe
SR.profile: Wishing for the peaceful coexistence of nature and people, this organic stylist struggles to find new ways to ply her skills. Realizing that she must break out of her comfort zone to grow as a person, she overcomes the obstacles in front of her and incites herself to take on further challenges as the bridge linking nature and mankind.

BASE.name: Ladiva
BASE.profile: Hoping to tie up loose ends, this duelist announces she's leaving her old home and fans behind. But the love and connections she's made prompt her to promise a reunion before departing. Onward to the other side of the sky, propelled by infinite love!

HOLIDAY.name: Ladiva
HOLIDAY.profile: Dressed for Christmas Eve, her warm affections protect family friends, and all else in the skydom from the chilly winter. People naturally respond to her all-embracing love with a gentle, loving smile.

SR.name: Ladiva
SR.profile: The real strength of this burly duelist comes not from her unrivaled brawn, but from her tender heart. She's just bursting with affection for all living things, and she never stops cherishing each and every creature within arms' reach.

BASE.name: Lady Grey
BASE.profile: When death stole her true love, Lady Grey didn't wallow in grief. Instead she learned how to control the spirits of the deceased. She smiles serenely, having grown closer to her beloved than ever.

BASE_4.name: Lady Grey
BASE_4.profile: When death stole her true love, Lady Grey didn't wallow in grief. Instead she learned how to control the spirits of the deceased. She smiles serenely, having grown closer to her beloved than ever.

HALLOWEEN.name: Lady Grey
HALLOWEEN.profile: At her husband's urging, Lady Gray dons a particularly adorable Halloween costume. While she seems a bit ill at ease, a smile hovers at the corners of her lips. Caught up in the festive spirit, she puts on an impromptu "magic" show, gets tipsy on wine, and teases the crew. Lady Gray's hidden playful side only adds to her considerable charm.

BASE.jpname: キャタピラとヴィーラ
BASE.name: Lady Katapillar and Vira
BASE.profile: Vira transforms Katalina into Lady Katapillar, an ancient and magnificent tool of destruction. A slave to Vira's will, she has been sent on a path to extinguish all life from the sky.*This is a work of fiction. All names, characters, and referenced incidents are products of the collective imaginations of Lowain and Bros. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.

BASE.name: Laguna
BASE.profile: A traveling soldier with plenty of combat experience, Laguna delights in the harshest of battles and the most varied of cultures. Everywhere she ventures, Laguna gains fond memories and delightful souvenirs, which she uses to fill her room and cover her walls.

BASE.name: Lamretta
BASE.profile: This nun is ready to abstain from alcohol and regain her former lifestyle of clean living. She's even made the decision to reconcile with her past and her parents. Will that reunion bring redemption or punishment? The answer lies at the bottom of a bottle.

R.name: Lamretta
R.profile: Lamretta is a nun that loves to have a banquet, and she has made some new friends through her hobby. Lamretta lives her days like she's always in the middle of a feast.

SR.name: Lamretta
SR.profile: Lamretta's favorite form of charity is passing around a bottle. For her there's no better way to connect with others than through the sweet, sweet taste of wine.

WATER.name: Lamretta
WATER.profile: As cherry blossoms flutter in the breeze, this wine lover enjoys a picnic by indulging in her favorite passion. But no matter how much Lamretta drinks, she's always ready to help those in need.

BASE.name: Lancelot
BASE.profile: Noble and strong, this youth leads the Order of the White Dragons. He risks his life to save his motherland from the crises that beset it, and his bravery and skill have earned the love of his men. His valor and his twin swords will carve a future for his homeland.

BASE_4.name: Lancelot
BASE_4.profile: Noble and strong, this youth leads the Order of the White Dragons. He risks his life to save his motherland from the crises that beset it, and his bravery and skill have earned the love of his men. His valor and his twin swords will carve a future for his homeland.

DUO.jpname: 白竜の双騎士 ランスロット＆ヴェイン
DUO.name: Lancelot and Vane
DUO.profile: As the two knights enjoy their vacation and look out at the ocean they had once dreamed of, memories of their childhood come flooding back. Even if time passes and circumstances change, their friendship and respect for each other will always remain in their hearts.

EVENT.name: Lancelot
EVENT.profile: Battered and beaten, the once captive knight could do little in retaliation. But now with his newfound allies, Lancelot prepares to take back the capital.
EVENT.recruitment: Four Knights of a Fallen Land

WIND.name: Lancelot
WIND.profile: This noble captain aspires to bring everlasting glory to his homeland. Brimming with resolve and sworn to his swords, he stands resolute in the face of adversity for his king and country. Perhaps he will one day harness the winds of change with ambition resting within him.

BASE.name: Lecia
BASE.profile: After leaving her friends and returning to where she belongs, Lecia is assigned a grand responsibility by her father. Though plagued with doubt and wracked with worry, it proves to be an experience of profound personal growth. May this white-winged defender of the skies fly ever onward.

SR.name: Lecia
SR.profile: The girl who swore an oath to protect the skies now takes her first step on a journey with new friends. Her dreams set her at odds with her father, but that conflict will be the key that lets her spread her wings across the sky.

SUMMER.name: Lecia
SUMMER.profile: At first bewildered by the unexpected respite, she soon stretches, sighs, and readies herself for battle. At the boundary between sea and sand, a fierce contest breaks out. Blood pounds, fierce shouts ring in the air, and a ball spikes hard into the white sand.

WATER.name: Lecia
WATER.profile: Dedicated to keeping the peace in the Sky Realm, this young woman is tormented by the difficulty of maintaining her ideals in the face of harsh reality. She walks the path she believes is right with determination stronger than even she realized. May white wings sprout from her back to speed her on her way.

BASE.jpname: ルルーシュ・ランペルージ
BASE.name: Lelouch Lamperouge
BASE.profile: Secretly a former prince of the Holy Britannian Empire, this brilliant young man now serves as student council vice-president at Ashford Academy. Upon obtaining the power of Geass, he donned the mask of Zero with two goals in mind—to create a peaceful world for his sister, and to uncover the truth behind his mother's death. Despite being a pragmatist for whom the ends justify the means, he still possesses a fair amount of empathy for others.
BASE.recruitment: Code Geass: Lelouch of the RebellionThe Blue Reckoning

BASE.name: Lennah
BASE.profile: This noble girl bears a heavy burden from her childhood. She's chosen the path of anger, sadness, and pain—the path that will end with a smile. Watching the flowers bloom, she offers a prayer to the petals: "To you who I do not know, please find happiness."

BASE_4.name: Lennah
BASE_4.profile: This noble girl bears a heavy burden from her childhood. She's chosen the path of anger, sadness, and pain—the path that will end with a smile. Watching the flowers bloom, she offers a prayer to the petals: "To you who I do not know, please find happiness."

BASE.name: Leona
BASE.profile: After enacting her vengeance, this lioness accepts a forbidden power in order to atone for her sins. Even should she bleed till rivers run red with her blood, her resolve to protect those dear to her will never falter.

SR.name: Leona
SR.profile: A grief-stricken lioness, she saw through her tears to discover new allies. Their companionship gives her the strength to stand on her own and the resolve to protect those she loves.

YUKATA.name: Leona
YUKATA.profile: What lingers on a summer night? The fleeting end of a festival? Sadness once the fireworks have scattered like petals in the wind? Shaken by recollections of the past, a lioness stalks through the night alone. And though she may try and drive her companions away, their efforts to assuage her loneliness remain steadfast.

BASE.name: Leonora
BASE.profile: This girl's trusting nature is her worst enemy. Still, no matter how many times she's tricked or lied to, she just laughs it off. After all, she's got a friend by her side who will never betray her.

BASE.name: Levi
BASE.profile: Captain Levi is a soldier who is as strong as an entire brigade and is known as the strongest soldier alive. He was once a notorious thug in the city's underground market, but he has since joined the Survey Corps under the lead of Commander Erwin.

BASE.jpname: レヴィオン姉妹 マイム＆ミイム＆メイム
BASE.name: Levin Sisters
BASE.profile: Strengthened by their sisterly bonds, these three valiant Sky Knights are steadfast in their duty to protect the Kingdom of Levin. With their intimate knowledge of each other's strengths and weaknesses, their teamwork can overcome any crisis.

BASE.name: Lilele
BASE.profile: From the day she first heard Kimi to Boku no Mirai, this young lady dreamed of performing. She swore to keep brightening the sky with song and dance, and eventually overtake her favorites as the sky's number one idol.

SUMMER.name: Lilele
SUMMER.profile: An adorable young girl stands on sandy beach. Her purest wish is to become the number one idol in all the skies. Her charming summer smile and voice brings joy to all those who come out to see her.

BASE.name: Lily
BASE.profile: On a perpetually white land, this young princess pledges to keep praying for peace so long as she lives. She doesn't allow her sadness to surface, but deep down Lily harbors envy for the ephemeral flowers in bloom.

BASE_4.name: Lily
BASE_4.profile: On a perpetually white land, this young princess pledges to keep praying for peace so long as she lives. She doesn't allow her sadness to surface, but deep down Lily harbors envy for the ephemeral flowers in bloom.

EVENT.name: Lily
EVENT.profile: This Crystalia princess carries a heavy burden as she makes her return to the Ice Crystal Palace. The vicissitudes of fate force her through numerous trials and tribulations, but her kindheartedness shines through as she brings hope to all.

HOLIDAY.name: Lily
HOLIDAY.profile: Having undertaken a mission to spread holiday cheer to all, this young princess realizes her task is not a trial to face alone, but a challenge to overcome with her friends. The undying sense of hope residing within her tiny form brings smiles to everyone around her.

BASE.name: Lina
BASE.profile: A mage famed for her ability to sneak by anything, even dragons. Lina may appear to be a cute little girl, but she has become notorius throughout the land for her unparalleled demon-like powers and relentless cruelty towards evil-doers. Nevertheless, she doesn't heed much thought to the rumors, and instead continues to fight evil with a smile.

BASE.name: Lobelia
BASE.profile: In his youngest days this magician found happiness in the sound of destruction. A natural genius turned natural disaster, he used his power to lay low other people and lands, trapping the sounds that result. In the aftermath, he discovers true happiness. Born to destruction and living within it, the magician is satisfied by the happy sound of his own destruction, which rings out with a tune of eternal torment.

BASE.name: Lowain
BASE.profile: Day after day, this free-spirited trio shoots the breeze. Their only goals are to have fun, and to get the attention of their favorite knight. They might be a bit rowdy, but that's all part of the charm.

BASE_4.name: Lowain
BASE_4.profile: Day after day, this free-spirited trio shoots the breeze. Their only goals are to have fun, and to get the attention of their favorite knight. They might be a bit rowdy, but that's all part of the charm.

R.name: Lowain
R.profile: This free-spirited youth had a run-in with fate, and her name was Katalina. With Cupid's arrow firmly lodged in his heart and his two best buddies by his side, he set off after her. The troublesome trio are certainly boisterous, but there's never a dull moment when they're around.

SUMMER.name: Lowain
SUMMER.profile: WARNING: Fireworks are fun, but they can be dangerous. Do not hold fireworks after the fuse is lit. Doing so may cause burns and severe injuries.

BASE.name: Lucio
BASE.profile: Distressed by an imminent crisis facing the world, this young man is compelled to reveal the truth about the Crimson Horizon. His true identity, including his background as a former actor, leaves much to doubt. But what is clear is that his radiant looks will charm any crowd.

SUMMER.name: Lucio
SUMMER.profile: A handsome young man shrouded in mystery stands on the shore awaiting the dawn. His expression tinged with sorrow, he prays a silent prayer to his master. Though he possesses the power to make miracles, the trial he has been given cannot be so easily overcome.

BASE.name: Lucius
BASE.profile: Teaching children how to wield the blade was supposed to be this swordsman's new calling. But fate does not let him go so kindly. His resentment and unquenchable thirst for revenge once again drive him to seek the eradication of goblins. For his cause, he will bet life and limb to strike at the heart of evil.

FIRE.name: Lucius
FIRE.profile: His spirit has been lost after chasing retribution for so long. He cuts ties to his friends in order to protect those very same people he holds dear and to find meaning in his own existence. With nothing more than his sword at his side, Lucius begins a lonesome new journey.

SR.name: Lucius
SR.profile: Driven by his unquenchable hatred, Lucius transformed himself into a weapon of retribution. With chipped sword in hand, he will fell the evil beasts that murdered his mother. Those who glimpse his face in battle, twisted in rage, will doubt that he is even human.

SR_4.name: Lucius
SR_4.profile: Driven by his unquenchable hatred, Lucius transformed himself into a weapon of retribution. With chipped sword in hand, he will fell the evil beasts that murdered his mother. Those who glimpse his face in battle, twisted in rage, will doubt that he is even human.

BASE.name: Ludmila
BASE.profile: A girl morphed by the effects of poisonous mushrooms, she sets off on a journey to feed her craving for fine fungi. She is most tempted by unknown mushrooms, even trading her health for a taste. Be that as it may, she's determined to continue moving forward, her devotion to mushrooms unwavering and her laughter unending.

BASE.name: Luna
BASE.profile: A young girl who lives in a gloomy, secluded mansion. She has set out on an adventure with her parents.

BASE.name: Lunalu
BASE.profile: The artist finally stands upon the ultimate stage and unveils her romantic storybook to the world. But in her mind, she has only taken the first step. She continues her journey through the skies in order to further pursue her artistic studies and improve upon her trade.

R.name: Lunalu
R.profile: An artist of outstanding ability can create images so real they horrify those who witness them. However, the path Lunalu chose allows her to create a beautiful world from her endless imagination. Like the wings of a bird, her wings of imagination will stretch on throughout the sky.

SUMMER.name: Lunalu
SUMMER.profile: Thirsty for inspiration to depict the world of romance, this artist dips her feet into the water. Although hesitant to get her body wet at first, the experience greatly stimulates her imagination, and sparks of creativity soon begin to fly.

BASE.name: Lyria
BASE.profile: The young girl who could only sit by and watch her friends has awoken. She is no longer the protected, but the protector. Her heart calls forth grand miracles to the azure skies.

BASE.name: Macula Marius
BASE.profile: This maiden swore to protect all forms of nature's beauty—exacting icy retribution on those who would tarnish its splendor. Yet it pains her greatly to punish those who she swore to protect and love. For whenever she is compelled to use her powers against the skydwellers, another crevasse forms within her gentle heart, more vulnerable than a morning frost beneath the rising sun's rays.

BASE.name: Magisa
BASE.profile: An alluring witch who dreams about the unknown. One night in a dream, she sought out the girl in blue. Their encounter at the end of the sky would be filled with possibilities that not even the witch could see...

BASE_4.name: Magisa
BASE_4.profile: An alluring witch who dreams about the unknown. One night in a dream, she sought out the girl in blue. Their encounter at the end of the sky would be filled with possibilities that not even the witch could see...

HOLIDAY.name: Magisa
HOLIDAY.profile: A witch has a premonition of a terrible tragedy. With the fate of a loved one in her hands, she sets off to prevent this nightmare from becoming reality. Beyond the fog of the unknown, surely a heartening future awaits.

BASE.name: Mahira
BASE.profile: One of the Twelve Divine Generals, Mahira is the Queen of the Roosters. Though she lacks the wings befitting of such a title, her small frame houses great power and creative genius. Someday she will lead the people of the sky all the way up to the heavens.

BASE_4.name: Mahira
BASE_4.profile: One of the Twelve Divine Generals, Mahira is the Queen of the Roosters. Though she lacks the wings befitting of such a title, her small frame houses great power and creative genius. Someday she will lead the people of the sky all the way up to the heavens.

EVENT.name: Mahira
EVENT.profile: The Queen of the Roosters cleanses the skies of worldly desires, restoring peace to all. Year after year, she takes the problems of the blue yonder in her stride, a convention bound to repeat this year.
EVENT.recruitment: Auld Lang Syne 2017Auld Lang Syne 2018Auld Lanxiety

BASE.jpname: 飛竜と吸血姫 ヴァンピィ＆ベス
BASE.name: Vania and Malinda
BASE.profile: A vampire princess and her dragon friend embark on a journey across the skies despite cries of disapproval. As they step into a new world together, their experiences and encounters make them braver and their relationship stronger.

EVENT.name: Malinda
EVENT.profile: This young dragon was scorned, its very existence treated as heresy-until a sweet young girl who dances in the darkness came to save it. Now the little dragon has slipped into a new form; its fearsome roar shakes the earth and rattles the clouds. The power of its ancient blood, bound by a pact, has been awakened.

BASE.jpname: ハールート・マールート
BASE.name: Halluel and Malluel
BASE.profile: These twins resume their roles as archangels of instruction, deciding for themselves which paths they wish to take. They are committed to working as the newly-formed Archangel Parcel Service, but that doesn’t mean there’s no time for play. With shiny beach pails swinging in their hands, the twins are excited to make plenty of summer memories.

BASE.name: Maria Theresa
BASE.profile: Having sworn to uphold justice by righting the wrongs in her life, this indignant empress treads through seas of blood and mountains of corpses to reclaim her place on the throne. For the future of her people, she will stop at nothing to achieve that goal.

BASE.name: Mariah
BASE.profile: The past pulls a blanket over her eyes, dragging her down an unexpected path. She's lost her way, but a stranger appears to offer a helping hand. Hesitantly, she takes it, and finds it a warm one.

BASE.name: Marquiares
BASE.profile: Marquiares long ago learned to listen to the stars, eventually throwing open the doors to the supernal: grand source of all wisdom. The process transformed him into a grand sage with the ability to draw limitless magical energy from beyond the stars.

BASE.name: Mary
BASE.profile: Freed from the chains that bound her heart, this girl moves forward in order to enjoy a festive winter night surrounded by dear friends. The sight of smiles and blissful laughter plays like a scene from her dreams of the perfect holiday. And off in the distance, high above, the unmistakable baritone of Santa's laugh echoes throughout.

R.name: Mary
R.profile: Mary packs her bags full of curiosity as she jumps from place to place. She expects all manner of traps and hurdles, but what she's really after is the wonder of the ancient ruins... HAH, nope! She wants the treasure, baby!

SR.name: Mary
SR.profile: The karmic chains that bound her heart crumble to dust after a chance encounter with her past. Now, the light of hope twinkles in her eye. With one hand, she grips a pistol; with the other, she squeezes the hand of a friend. Together, they step forward into the waiting sky and adventure.

SUMMER.name: Mary
SUMMER.profile: Bright sunlight sparkles in the ocean spray, but only one thing shines in the eyes of this treasure hunter-pearls! Eager to lay her hands on one, she slips into a swimsuit and readies herself for a submarine sortie.

BASE.name: Medusa
BASE.profile: Although she'd be the last to admit it, this primal beast savors her time with her primal pals. However, an unexpected encounter with a young girl takes her down unexpected paths—is there room in this primal beast's heart to grow from a new experience?

PROMO.name: Medusa
PROMO.profile: A mighty sorceress with an accursed petrifying gaze has landed, bearing the form of a sweet young girl. She comes with both great magical power and pride befitting a primal beast, but what will she impose on the people? Trials, destruction, or merely a bit of fun?
PROMO.recruitment: Logic Links PromotionSiero's Special Pick Ticket

VALENTINE.name: Medusa
VALENTINE.profile: This proud primal beast, with her petrifying glare, has found new amusement in the mortal domain. The fluttering of her bewitching skirt is sure to captivate fans worldwide.

BASE.name: Meg
BASE.profile: Once a typical girl like any other, a series of trials and tribulations in Auguste awakened in her a new power and a new calling in life. She and her shark companion, Ursula, always stand ready to protect the isles of her childhood dreams.

BASE.name: Melissabelle
BASE.profile: She was the miraculous princess that her tiny kingdom of corn farmers had always hoped for. Now she's about to loose herself upon the skies in search of destiny, in search of the reason she was born—and in search of a reason to be.

VALENTINE.name: Melissabelle
VALENTINE.profile: Love, respect, and gratitude all blend into one wondrously sweet princess. With her warm embrace and support, anyone can be a hero.

BASE.name: Melleau
BASE.profile: Riding on the back of a masked friend, this little girl strolls around to the beat of her own drum. The two never speak, however the time they've spent together proves their bond more than any words.

BASE_4.name: Melleau
BASE_4.profile: Riding on the back of a masked friend, this little girl strolls around to the beat of her own drum. The two never speak, however the time they've spent together proves their bond more than any words.

BASE.name: Meteon
BASE.profile: This young skyracing idol is invited to perform in a holiday aerobatics display. To put a smile on every spectator's face, the pilot and his trusty speedship will seed the clouds with snow and gifts.

EVENT.name: Meteon
EVENT.profile: This fledgling superstar pushes the sound barrier in his speedship, the Blue Orbit. As he races toward the radiant sky, a soul-blazing trail of azure is left in his wake, a cobalt comet searing itself into the memories of onlookers everywhere.

EVENT_4.name: Meteon
EVENT_4.profile: This fledgling superstar pushes the sound barrier in his speedship, the Blue Orbit. As he races toward the radiant sky, a soul-blazing trail of azure is left in his wake, a cobalt comet searing itself into the memories of onlookers everywhere.

BASE.name: Metera
BASE.profile: She flits through the sky; her erratic nature evident in her sudden swoops and frenzied whirls. Her magic bow and powers of flight could not be bottled up within her village, so she dashed off into the vast sky in search of excitement and color.

BASE_4.name: Metera
BASE_4.profile: She flits through the sky; her erratic nature evident in her sudden swoops and frenzied whirls. Her magic bow and powers of flight could not be bottled up within her village, so she dashed off into the vast sky in search of excitement and color.

FIRE.name: Metera
FIRE.profile: The exquisitely charming archer is full of excitement in this bustling town. Finding it unbearable to see her little sister with such poor fashion sense, she quietly coordinates a new outfit for her. This enchantingly beautiful flower of an archer soars the skies with her sister.

HOLIDAY.name: Metera
HOLIDAY.profile: The genius slacker helps out a dress designer friend in need by taking on the job of fashion model. Metera's stunningly beautiful dress wears her as much as she wears it.

BASE.name: Mika Jougasaki
BASE.profile: Mika is a young girl who landed in a sky far away, guided by a dazzling light. Despite being a bit flustered by a world so different from her own, she easily brightens up all who are near.
BASE.recruitment: Cinderella Fantasy ~Keep Dreaming in the Sky~ Cinderella Fantasy ~Piña Hazard~

BASE_4.name: Mika Jougasaki
BASE_4.profile: Mika is a young girl who landed in a sky far away, guided by a dazzling light. Despite being a bit flustered by a world so different from her own, she easily brightens up all who are near.
BASE_4.recruitment: Cinderella Fantasy ~Keep Dreaming in the Sky~ Cinderella Fantasy ~Piña Hazard~

BASE.name: Mikasa
BASE.profile: She graduated at the top of the 104th Training Corps and became part of the Survey Corps. Her aptitude for warfare and impressive combat skills are the equivalent of 100 normal soldiers. She is strongly attached to her longtime friend, Eren, and is willing to dedicate her heart to protect him if necessary.

BASE.name: Mikazuki Munechika
BASE.profile: This charming swordsman from a distant land never breaks his graceful smile even as he cuts down foes. What lies beneath his peaceful exterior and the crescent moons in his eyes is as deep and immeasurable as the night sky.

BASE.name: Miku Maekawa
BASE.profile: Miku is a young girl who landed in a sky far away, guided by a dazzling light. Her faith is unyielding in this new unimaginable world. But it seems she is unable to overcome a weakness for vacant glances.

BASE.name: Milla Maxwell
BASE.profile: Whether by fate or by happenstance, the Lord of the Spirits is summoned across worlds and into the blue sky. But her path does not change. Even in another world, she stays devoted to her principles to carry out her duty.

BASE.jpname: 阿吽の破弓 ミラオル＆ザーリリャオー
BASE.name: Milleore and Sahli Lao
BASE.profile: These two sharpshooters, once considered the backbone of their local military, now reunite as mercenaries on the job. Despite the time they spent apart, they are still able to dart about and coordinate their attacks in perfect sync on the battlefield, demonstrating the strength of their everlasting bond.

SR.name: Milleore
SR.profile: Her sharp eyes never miss a thing as she darts about the battlefield, searching for the perfect moment to unleash a barrage of bolts. Her face is impassive as allies heap praise on her, but hidden beneath the blue folds of her cloak, her ears blush rosy-red.

BASE.name: Mimlemel
BASE.profile: At long last, this girl of many mysteries decides to take a dive of faith into distant waters. There on the shores of Auguste, she encounters an elder turtle who comes to her aid, acting as her sea legs. Having been granted a second chance at life, his eyes are suddenly opened to the infinite possibilities that lay before him.

DUO.jpname: ミムルメモル＆パンプキン
DUO.name: Mimlemel and Pun-Kin
DUO.profile: This girl of many mysteries harvests a new crop on one fine autumn day. It happens to be a pumpkin that is an exhilarating joy to ride. Though technically just a mere plant, Pun-Kin adores Mimlemel like a princess and jumps at the chance to venture forth in this beautiful world.

SR.name: Mimlemel
SR.profile: Merry sounds dance playfully through Wayward Forest. This mysterious girl barely speaks, but her melodies convey her feelings more eloquently than words.

BASE.name: Mimori Amamiya
BASE.profile: A special girl who regards herself as all too regular, steps into the Sky Realm with a host of fairies by her side. Her kindness and her bravery will surely brighten the crew's journey.

BASE.name: Mina
BASE.profile: Serving as vice leader of the Sky Knights, Mina is the one and only water-user in their order. When their leader left, she took command and truly earned their respect. But she hasn't seemed to have noticed how much charm her uniform tends to command.

BASE.name: Minami Nitta
BASE.profile: Guided by a brilliant light, two girls find themselves in a faraway sky. Though this new world is strange indeed, Minami strives to learn from the experience and to face every challenge with courage.

BASE.name: Mio Honda
BASE.profile: Mio is a young girl who landed in a sky far away, guided by a dazzling light. While the everyday surprises of the Sky Realm keep her on her toes, her determination to stay bright under every circumstance shines through her smile, charming all those around her.
BASE.recruitment: Cinderella Fantasy ~Keep Dreaming in the Sky~,  Cinderella Fantasy ~Girls Keep on Dreaming~,Cinderella Fantasy ~Piña Hazard~

BASE_4.name: Mio Honda
BASE_4.profile: Mio is a young girl who landed in a sky far away, guided by a dazzling light. While the everyday surprises of the Sky Realm keep her on her toes, her determination to stay bright under every circumstance shines through her smile, charming all those around her.
BASE_4.recruitment: Cinderella Fantasy ~Keep Dreaming in the Sky~,  Cinderella Fantasy ~Girls Keep on Dreaming~,Cinderella Fantasy ~Piña Hazard~

BASE.name: Mireille and Risette
BASE.profile: The frail girl had but one wish—to lead a normal life just like anyone else. That wish helped her natural talent to blossom, giving her a "tool" that would go on to become her family. Though she bears the sin of sacrificing countless people, she and the one family member she has left just want to be happy. Is that, in itself, a sin?

BASE.name: Miria Akagi
BASE.profile: Miria is spirited away to a world in the skies, a world beyond any fantasy she's imagined. Miria is a perfect balance of childlike innocence and courteous maturity. Even in these unknown skies, she fearlessly brings joy and laughter to all those she meets.

BASE.name: Mirin
BASE.profile: To combat the bitter cold, this young woman dons a winter outfit beloved since ancient times. Even as her nose turns crimson from the frigid scent reminiscent of her distant homeland, she dozes off in the gentle warmth like a mother's embrace.

LIGHT.name: Mirin
LIGHT.profile: Clad in a breathtaking kimono, this blonde-haired, blue-eyed young woman resembles a camellia blossom blooming in the snow. After enjoying a brief, relaxing dip in a hot spring, she continues along her path of the samurai.

SR.name: Mirin
SR.profile: A girl born and raised on an island far to the east, she loves samurai culture. She leaves home to expand her horizons, leaving traces of her smile and unique swordplay wherever she wanders.

SR_4.name: Mirin
SR_4.profile: A girl born and raised on an island far to the east, she loves samurai culture. She leaves home to expand her horizons, leaving traces of her smile and unique swordplay wherever she wanders.

BASE.name: Mishra
BASE.profile: This magician's exceptional charm is composed of many things: beautification tonics made with a little sacrifice, patient temperance in polishing her findings to their full potential, and most of all, a constant and unquenchable passion for the refined. Her eyes sparkle like the stars in the sky as she continues pursuing beauty to her heart's desire.

SR.name: Mishra
SR.profile: Mishra is a magician who knows all, and has grown tired of this world. She is intrigued by the ancient magic runes the Astrals left behind. She continues striking out into the unknown to overturn the death of black magic she has proven to exist.

BASE.name: Mizuki Kawashima
BASE.profile: Mizuki is a young girl who landed in a sky far away, guided by a dazzling light. Drawn toward adventure, she travels through the sky with her gentleness as legendary as her sorcery.

BASE.name: Monika
BASE.profile: This envoy of order takes up her sword to fight for her convictions. Undaunted by the endless troubles caused by her youthful appearance, she relentlessly demonstrates her capability as a protector of the skies.

GRAND.name: Monika
GRAND.profile: The devoted Enforcer invites her protege for a restful day out on the town. Committed fully to relaxing, she takes off her Enforcer uniform in favor of something a little more casual. They spend the afternoon laughing, shopping, and forgetting the stress of their normal responsibilities.

VALENTINE.name: Monika
VALENTINE.profile: This proud defender of order dons a one-of-a-kind costume, transforming into a girl most magical if not only for a brief role. Upon seeing the sparkling eyes of the children as they marvel at her in awe, she vows to set aside her embarrassment—if only until the curtain falls.

BASE.jpname: ひよこ班 アーサー&モルドレッド
BASE.name: Arthur and Mordred
BASE.profile: The dream that sprang from this pair's youthful hearts has matured within their tightly joined hands. As these two young men stand in the gap between past and future, they vow that their bond will remain strong no matter what lies in store for them.

BASE.name: Morphe and Phoebe
BASE.profile: Drowning in their pasts, their old wounds sought to spread out and lay a curse on the land. However, somewhere deep in that endless nightmare, they encounter a final, shining ray of light. Hand in hand, they move forward with hope in their hearts.

BASE.name: Morrigna
BASE.profile: A unity of three goddesses that seek valor on the battlefield and bestow martial glory on the worthy. This is both their role and reason for existing. However, several hundred years after a fateful episode with a former charge, they began to feel something they had never felt before. This revelation made them question why they guide their beloved warriors to inevitable death.

BASE.name: Mugen
BASE.profile: Despite this Draph's imposing, steely body, his heart is as pure and innocent as that of a young child's. Long abandoned and possibly the last of his line, the sky has much to teach him. Who will he use his indomitable strength for?

BASE.name: Naga
BASE.profile: A mage of beauty with black hair, always dressed in very strange clothing. Wherever she appears, she brings with her destruction and boisterous laughter. Naga possesses exceptional magic powers that allegedly surpass even the masters, but her inherent ineptitude brings about unintended calamity. Though she is antagonizing to her allies, she is far more interesting when taking on opponents.

BASE.name: Nakoruru
BASE.profile: This kindhearted shrine maiden from the village of Kamuikotan rises up to protect Mother Nature from evil. Burdened with a responsibility known only to those who can hear the voice of the natural world, she offers an ephemeral prayer to the skies.

BASE.name: Naoise
BASE.profile: This upstanding knight embarked on a long voyage of atonement. It has broadened his mind and his perceptions of right and wrong. He has earned the title of hero, just as his father once did. May he and his companions stride forth with the true dragon's blessing, unsullied by the blood spilled all around them.

EVENT.name: Naoise
EVENT.profile: His pilgrimage over, this knight returns home. The friends he made on his travels helped him come to terms with his failures, and he's a stronger man for it. Despite his remorse, he knows that he must fight for his people's future. His heroism will restore their hope, and lead them to a better tomorrow.

EVENT_4.name: Naoise
EVENT_4.profile: His pilgrimage over, this knight returns home. The friends he made on his travels helped him come to terms with his failures, and he's a stronger man for it. Despite his remorse, he knows that he must fight for his people's future. His heroism will restore their hope, and lead them to a better tomorrow.

PROMO.name: Naoise
PROMO.profile: Naoise believes in a knightly ideal, though the king's jealousy foretold the end of his days in his country. Having lost his way, Naoise began a pilgrimage in memory of those who lost their lives.

SUMMER.name: Naoise
SUMMER.profile: Although the crown prince and princess have given up the throne, Naoise still does what he can for the people of Irestill. He descends upon the beaches of Auguste to safeguard Seruel and Heles for a mission, stripping off his armor as a symbol of trust. Although the True Dragon Deirdre and others in the crew often tease him, it is all in good jest for a fun-filled time at the summer beach.

BASE.name: Narmaya
BASE.profile: This well-forged blader advances toward ultimate strength with a single-minded, half-maniacal determination. But the distant ruler of the heavens has yet to pay her heed.

BASE_4.name: Narmaya
BASE_4.profile: This well-forged blader advances toward ultimate strength with a single-minded, half-maniacal determination. But the distant ruler of the heavens has yet to pay her heed.

GRAND.name: Narmaya (Grand)
GRAND.profile: This sword master returns to her roots in an attempt to break through the wall that hinders her progress. Each restored memory of her past encounters becomes a stepping stone, allowing her to ascend to greater heights.

HOLIDAY.name: Narmaya
HOLIDAY.profile: Having attained peerless skill in both swordplay and confectionery, this sword master helps a friend in need for the upcoming holidays. However, things go awry when she tries a little too hard.

SUMMER.name: Narmaya
SUMMER.profile: Time spent with dear friends has unbound the chains around this blader's heart. Now free, Narmaya's heart begins to flutter at the sight of the azure waves in front of her.

VALENTINE.name: Narmaya
VALENTINE.profile: A sword master of great renown, she now seeks to master a new art: chocolate confection. Having dedicated her heart, mind, and body to creating the perfect chocolate cake, she'll do anything to see the smiles of those she cares for. For love knows no bounds—and neither does she.

BASE.name: Nectar
BASE.profile: Was his primordial form that of a spirit, an animal, or a man? The only thing certain is that this once powerful being has since been reduced to a failed primal beast. At the end of countless cycles, he met a girl who mattered more than anything else. He now devotes his life to protecting her and ensuring her safe passage to Peach Spring Valley—even if he does not make it there himself.

BASE.name: Nemone
BASE.profile: Like the white clouds against the azure sky, this girl drifts along without a care in the world. However, her carefree facade belies a mind capable of incredible foresight, something she'll deny with a gentle smile.

HOLIDAY.name: Nemone
HOLIDAY.profile: Harboring a wish to give a present to not just her sisters and friends in the crew, but to everyone in the skies, this carefree girl lightly treads through the holy night. If it should come to light what a loving person she is at heart, she will no doubt turn as red as the holiday garments on her body.

BASE.name: Nene
BASE.profile: Nene is a lively and daring woman hailing from a small island in the far west. Accompanied by her beloved daughter Yae, she travels the islands in the hopes of one day finding her husband who had suddenly disappeared.

BASE.jpname: 渋谷凛＆島村卯月＆本田未央
BASE.name: New Generations
BASE.profile: The classic trio join hands and continue to perform in the Sky Realm, hoping to put a smile on the face of everyone everywhere.
BASE.recruitment: Cinderella Fantasy: To the Skies Once More

BASE.name: Nezahualpilli
BASE.profile: The winged king wanders the sky, searching for an unknown power to bring a new dawn to a doomed people. He is a reliable and energetic man, but he has a deadly weakness shared by all in the Family of Feathers.

BASE_4.name: Nezahualpilli
BASE_4.profile: The winged king wanders the sky, searching for an unknown power to bring a new dawn to a doomed people. He is a reliable and energetic man, but he has a deadly weakness shared by all in the Family of Feathers.

SR.name: Nezahualpilli
SR.profile: The Eagle King returns to his clan with newfound determination to lead them to a better future. It's then that he encounters the danger that threatens them all. But he is their leader, a true chief, and he shall keep his people safe no matter the cost.

BASE.name: Nezha
BASE.profile: A war god of unparalleled strength who freely takes to the skies. While his razor-sharp vision allows him to pursue any target, it also helps him to observe what daily life is like for the common mortal.

BASE.name: Nicholas
BASE.profile: Though his life be forfeit, though his hands be soaked in blood, the heart of the warrior does not falter. The warrior is firm, unmoving; in his breast burns an undying flame of justice. For it is for our future he fights.

EVENT.name: Nicholas
EVENT.profile: Ensconced in steel, a flame of justice smolders within this fearless youth. He'll fight until the end of time, but what does he yearn to protect?

LIGHT.name: Nicholas
LIGHT.profile: A miraculous steel giant appears, born of the steadfast hearts of warriors and a single wish made by one neither man nor abomination. The light of its steel spirit will continue to shine, even in the deepest darkness, illuminating the path to a bright future.

BASE.name: Nier
BASE.profile: A young woman who had her existence denied at every turn, thus leading to an overwhelming desire for love and acceptance which gradually warped the very fabric of her being. As her sense of morality began to wane, she came upon the Arcarum grim reaper who grants death to all. The two now stand together like lovers, hell-bent on creating a new world that will fully acknowledge them.

BASE.name: Nina Drango
BASE.profile: Despite her cheery, outgoing personality, herculean strength, and sure-footedness, Nina easily gets flustered in the presence of young, attractive men. When overly bothered, this purehearted maiden involuntarily transforms into a raging dragon—something she fears more than anything else.
BASE.recruitment: RoB: Virgin Soul Blu-ray Serial CodeSiero's Special Pick TicketLinks Pick Ticket

BASE.name: Niyon
BASE.profile: One of the Eternals—they who stand astride the skies and across the path of any would-be calamity. Niyon reads the music of all things, spinning them into an ethereal melody. When her little fingers pluck a string, she seizes her listeners' hearts and manipulates their emotions.

BASE_4.name: Niyon
BASE_4.profile: One of the Eternals—they who stand astride the skies and across the path of any would-be calamity. Niyon reads the music of all things, spinning them into an ethereal melody. When her little fingers pluck a string, she seizes her listeners' hearts and manipulates their emotions.

BASE.name: Noa
BASE.profile: This primal beast of shipbuilding makes a decision to continue shaping the world together with people. Though their destination is yet unknown, a promising wind carries the ship forward on its journey.

SR.name: Noa
SR.profile: Finally able to fulfill the promise he made as a boy, this helmsman of the stars rows out into the sky, hiding many sorrows behind a small smile. His thoughts are always with the young travelers, and he prays that they will find happiness.

SR_4.name: Noa
SR_4.profile: Finally able to fulfill the promise he made as a boy, this helmsman of the stars rows out into the sky, hiding many sorrows behind a small smile. His thoughts are always with the young travelers, and he prays that they will find happiness.

BASE.name: Norcel
BASE.profile: Hailing from a snowy land far away, this young boy searches for a cure for his bedridden mother. He augments his superhuman strength with the mysterious power of his books and fights tirelessly for the sake of his mother and his friends.

BASE.name: Novei
BASE.profile: Violinist of the Sky Philharmonic Orchestra, the musical ensemble with the greatest legacy in all of the skies. Hoping to deliver the same emotional impact that first got her into music, she performs to bring heartwarming smiles to all.
BASE.recruitment: Granblue Fantasy Orchestra ConcertSiero's Special Pick TicketLinks Pick TicketTogether in Song

BASE.name: Olivia
BASE.profile: An archangel who wields the powers of dusk, she was sealed at the bottom of the sky after defying her lords and their Creator. But her ambition for rebellion remains ever-sharp, honed by the hands of mighty figures who gave her a second chance to roam the sky realms. Hiding eclipsed behind the singularity, she keeps watch for the supreme primarch in the hopes of reviving her brethren.

EVENT.name: Olivia
EVENT.profile: In hopes of reviving her brethren, the fallen archangel of dusk studies the ways of those who inhabit the Sky Realm. During the hottest month, a child of man teaches her about cherished summer customs. Despite her perceptive nature, she has yet to notice these new experiences broadening her horizons and opening her heart.

BASE.name: Orchid
BASE.profile: A being that never expected to be, Orchid was given life by pure miracle and has questioned why ever since. On her quest for answers, she continues alone through the skies, vowing to one day reunite with those most dear to her.

BASE_4.name: Orchid
BASE_4.profile: A being that never expected to be, Orchid was given life by pure miracle and has questioned why ever since. On her quest for answers, she continues alone through the skies, vowing to one day reunite with those most dear to her.

BASE.jpname: エルステの要 黒騎士&オルキス
BASE.name: Black Knight and Orchis
BASE.profile: To reverse tragedy and reclaim long-lost days, this pair forges a path through cruelty and loneliness. Time passes, and discord arises between the two souls. The smile the knight longs for is buried in the past, while the future holds only a single wish to be fulfilled.
BASE.recruitment: Granblue Fantasy: The Animation BD/DVD Season 2 - Vol. 6

BASE.name: Owen
BASE.profile: A young knight who acts as both a princess's bodyguard and a student of Mysteria Academy. He protects his charge with steadfast diligence and frank honesty—this is a mission entrusted to him of which his entire being is devoted to.

BASE.name: Pamela
BASE.profile: Flutist of the Sky Philharmonic Orchestra, the most influential of all the musical ensembles in the sky. With a shy yet dignified mien, her delicate, graceful melodies provide comfort to all who listen.
BASE.recruitment: Granblue Fantasy Orchestra ConcertSiero's Special Pick TicketLinks Pick TicketTogether in Song

BASE.name: Paris
BASE.profile: The young count of a nation allied with the Capulets, he works to reconstruct war-torn Verona. During the reignited war between the Capulets and Montagues, he served as the commander of the Capulet forces. His incorruptible personality earns him trust from the citizens and soldiers, and it is hoped that he will shoulder the future of the Capulets.

BASE.name: Pavidus
BASE.profile: This giant of a man lives deep in the mountains. Pure of heart and weak of spirit, he spends his days running errands for his forest friends. He might seem like an easy target, but the entire forest will rise to protect its own.

BASE.name: Pecorine
BASE.profile: Pecorine is the founder of the Gourmet Guild and a native of Astraea. She's always hungry and always ready for action. Her policy on eating is crystal clear: If she can nom on it, she won't waste a bite. Pecorine pays respect to all life taken by never leaving a scrap behind.
BASE.recruitment: Princess Connect! Re:DiveDinner at the Turned Table

BASE.name: Pengy
BASE.profile: Years ago, a crying girl dried her tears and picked up a wrench. Why? Because a hero has to smile to bring joy to others. Now as she works on a giant suit of armor, she sees that the power to stand strong is in her own hands, no matter what the world may throw at her. She travels the sky in hopes of sharing that bravery and to prove anybody can be their own hero—because with a little bit of courage, anything is possible.

EVENT.name: Pengy
EVENT.profile: Every day this rotund little hero of justice leaps into the sky to protect the dreams of children and reward good deeds. That adorable little metal-clad body never retreats, suffering any scrape to continue fighting for what's right.
EVENT.recruitment: Villa de Siero ~Come One, Come All~Unite and Fight

SR.name: Pengy
SR.profile: Allies of justice don't go on summer vacation. Wherever evil lurks, the black tuxedo flightlessly flies into action. But even the often unseen pilot inside has been lured out by the summer rays... Just don't expect it every day.

BASE.name: Percival
BASE.profile: This young emperor of flame burns with a quiet intensity as he pursues the utopia he dreams of—a land without war, where the weak can find succor. He crosses the skies in search of allies who share his noble dream.

BASE_4.name: Percival
BASE_4.profile: This young emperor of flame burns with a quiet intensity as he pursues the utopia he dreams of—a land without war, where the weak can find succor. He crosses the skies in search of allies who share his noble dream.

EVENT.name: Percival
EVENT.profile: En route to his homeland, the Lord of Flames dresses down to avoid recognition. He may appear more graceful and composed as he dispatches his enemies, but the blaze in his heart rages still, fueled by nostalgic memories of brotherhood.

LIGHT.name: Percival
LIGHT.profile: A young lord is called home from errantry to the land of Wales. There, he attends a grand ceremony, dressed in new regalia⁠—magnificent as a great fire, but refined as new-fallen snow⁠. He bears himself with the majesty of a king. Long will his image be etched into the hearts of his people.

SUMMER.name: Percival
SUMMER.profile: This young noble is ablaze with passionate ideals and comes with his own midsummer heat. His vacation plans may have gone awry, but his heroic deeds on patrol are becoming a resort attraction. Surely this summer experience will prove useful for when he leads his future dream utopia.

BASE.name: Petra
BASE.profile: This girl who walks with the winds learned her mother's secret, and with it a new determination blossomed within her. Skillfully commanding the very skies, she sets off in pursuit of her mother.

R.name: Petra
R.profile: A wind shaman who prays to and lives alongside the wind. She worries that the old shamanistic teachings are too rigid. She chooses to live as a true wind shaman does-as free as the wind.

BASE.name: Philosophia
BASE.profile: This foolish seeker of knowledge twists logic, touting theorems both irrational and bizzare. She spins her top while she questions accepted truths — to a philosopher, the only thing more boring than death is a perfect answer.

SR.name: Philosophia
SR.profile: She is a philosopher who finds no topic too silly to ponder. Her new friend is a capable soldier. How did they hit it off? Because they both possess mysterious relics. And so the pair engages in rounds of rousing philosophy, served with milk and cookies.

BASE.name: Morphe and Phoebe
BASE.profile: Drowning in their pasts, their old wounds sought to spread out and lay a curse on the land. However, somewhere deep in that endless nightmare, they encounter a final, shining ray of light. Hand in hand, they move forward with hope in their hearts.

BASE.name: Pholia
BASE.profile: A young woman who achieved a false sense of freedom by committing transgressions in the past. After much soul-searching and atonement, she has finally won true freedom for herself. No longer feeling crushed by the weight of the sky, the vast blue expanse offers limitless possibilities. She rides on the back of her noble, white primal beast into new frontiers.

BASE.name: Predator
BASE.profile: The girl who embraced vengeance sharpens her claws in silence, her lifelong grudge burning within. Though the moment to fulfill her desire will soon arrive, her wait is still an impatient one.

SR.name: Predator
SR.profile: A rustic girl who lost her family at a young age. She has since sealed away her emotions and steeled her heart to become an assassin, focusing solely on vengeance for her family.

BASE.jpname: ミムルメモル＆パンプキン
BASE.name: Mimlemel and Pun-Kin
BASE.profile: This girl of many mysteries harvests a new crop on one fine autumn day. It happens to be a pumpkin that is an exhilarating joy to ride. Though technically just a mere plant, Pun-Kin adores Mimlemel like a princess and jumps at the chance to venture forth in this beautiful world.

BASE.name: Rackam
BASE.profile: The hotshot helmsman girds himself in a new suit of armor as he prepares to guide the young skyfarers on the next leg of their journey. No one loves the ship more than he, and no one is more resolute in their determination to protect their friends.

BASE_4.name: Rackam
