BASE_4.profile: The hotshot helmsman girds himself in a new suit of armor as he prepares to guide the young skyfarers on the next leg of their journey. No one loves the ship more than he, and no one is more resolute in their determination to protect their friends.

HOLIDAY.name: Rackam
HOLIDAY.profile: One holy night, the helmsman embraced a new purpose. Dressed in the guise of a character from legend, he takes up a jolly mission as his own. Soaring across the wintry night sky, he brings miracles to the good people of town.

SR.name: Rackam
SR.profile: The smoking go-getter of a helmsman at Port Breeze. His shooting abilities are as impressive as his ability to control an airship. He's very blunt, but incredibly helpful and well-liked.

SR_4.name: Rackam
SR_4.profile: The smoking go-getter of a helmsman at Port Breeze. His shooting abilities are as impressive as his ability to control an airship. He's very blunt, but incredibly helpful and well-liked.

BASE.name: Randall
BASE.profile: After leaving his home behind to settle the score with a fated foe, this arrogant fighter spends every day in search of powerful opponents. It's taken some time, but Randall's eyes are finally beginning to open up to the wide world around him.

SR.name: Randall
SR.profile: A young man who seeks powerful opponents to forge the strongest legs. When he hit a wall in his progress, someone else's conviction reignited his own, and he takes that new spark to heart. Everything he does is to topple a longtime rival.

BASE.name: Ranko Kanzaki
BASE.profile: Ranko is a young girl who landed in a sky far away, guided by a dazzling light. As the demon ruler with ebony wings and crimson eyes, she soars through the skies aboard the promised ship. (Having attained her long-sought wings and magic, she sings the praises of the skies.)

BASE.name: Rashid
BASE.profile: A fighter with incredible speed and the power to control the wind, Rashid bears the courage needed to stand against evil forces in search of his lost friend. With a cheerful attitude and a passion for justice, Rashid searches the skies for his long-lost companion.

BASE.name: Razia
BASE.profile: Scorching hatred and resentment drove her to take up arms; dark thoughts of vengeance fuel the rage concealed in her heart. She prays no one else has to experience the sorrow she suffers and sets off for a journey into the endless sky. She knows the cure for her pain lies out there... somewhere.

SR.name: Razia
SR.profile: Heart filled with the desire for revenge, this young woman infiltrates a Va'hen sect shrine in search of information about their clandestine activities... and the fates of her missing father and sister. The truth she uncovers shines a ray of light into her storm-tossed soul and renews her determination to bring down the curtain on her family's tragedy.

BASE.name: Redluck
BASE.profile: This man is both a monk and an all-time grand champion in competitive eating. From appearance to manner of speaking to appetite—everything about him is so dynamic drawing attention from all over. Is there something more to this voracious eater of a monk than meets the eye...? He never dredges up his past, only screaming for the next victory to come.

BASE.name: Rei
BASE.profile: With omniscient, all-seeing eyes that can command obedience, this eternal youth uses her powers to cleanse the world of impurities and lead its children to a brighter future.

BASE.name: Reinhardtzar
BASE.profile: The heritor of a fearsome power passed down for generations in a dead kingdom. Through ruthless self-discipline, he mastered his power at the risk of his own life. Fists clenched, he forges ahead, seeking the true meaning of his existence.

SR.name: Reinhardtzar
SR.profile: An acting officer for the Idelva Kingdom, Reinhardtzar intends to serve up justice with every swing of his fists. He values honor above all else, so much so that his former subordinates from before his old unit was wiped out still look up to him. His outlook on life has changed ever since the Torhid incident, and he continues to search for the ideal path that sovereigns and their accompanying kingdoms should take.

BASE.name: Wulf and Renie
BASE.profile: A reclusive wolf and a lonely girl meet. In their safe haven, they turn a blind eye to their affection for one another and pretend their relationship is one of mutual protection. At sky's end what will these two face?

BASE.name: Wulf and Renie
BASE.profile: The world has much to show to a lone werewolf and a little girl on their journey through a boundless sky. As the girl's narrow perspective broadens, her proud lupine guardian will always be there to protect her.

BASE.name: Richard
BASE.profile: He dreams of the night he'll get to go out on the town in a flashy outfit and roll the dice. He always believes in tomorrow's luck, and fears nothing- though he'll always take the dog-free street on his way home.

SR.name: Richard
SR.profile: Lady Luck smiles upon this gifted gambler who challenges the odds every day of his life. In the microcosm of cards, games, and dice, for every spectacular victory, there is a brilliant fall.

BASE.name: Rika Jougasaki
BASE.profile: Rika is a young girl who followed a wandering soul and became lost in a sky far away. As she freely runs about the fields on her bear, her innocent smiling face fills her comrades with energy.
BASE.recruitment: Cinderella Fantasy ~Peace for Lost Souls~Cinderella Fantasy ~Piña Hazard~

BASE_4.name: Rika Jougasaki
BASE_4.profile: Rika is a young girl who followed a wandering soul and became lost in a sky far away. As she freely runs about the fields on her bear, her innocent smiling face fills her comrades with energy.
BASE_4.recruitment: Cinderella Fantasy ~Peace for Lost Souls~Cinderella Fantasy ~Piña Hazard~

BASE.name: Rin Shibuya
BASE.profile: Rin is a young girl who landed in a sky far away, guided by a dazzling light. Despite her bewilderment, she does not lose herself and holds fast as her song, filled with hope, resounds throughout the bustling night sky.
BASE.recruitment: Cinderella Fantasy ~Girls on a Quest~Cinderella Fantasy ~Girls Keep on Dreaming~Cinderella Fantasy ~Piña Hazard~

BASE_4.name: Rin Shibuya
BASE_4.profile: Rin is a young girl who landed in a sky far away, guided by a dazzling light. Despite her bewilderment, she does not lose herself and holds fast as her song, filled with hope, resounds throughout the bustling night sky.
BASE_4.recruitment: Cinderella Fantasy ~Girls on a Quest~Cinderella Fantasy ~Girls Keep on Dreaming~Cinderella Fantasy ~Piña Hazard~

BASE.name: Mireille and Risette
BASE.profile: The frail girl had but one wish—to lead a normal life just like anyone else. That wish helped her natural talent to blossom, giving her a "tool" that would go on to become her family. Though she bears the sin of sacrificing countless people, she and the one family member she has left just want to be happy. Is that, in itself, a sin?

BASE.name: Rita
BASE.profile: Her skin as pale as death, this little girl roams the boundless skies in search of an old ally. Untroubled by the fear and suspicion that greets her wherever she goes, she continues on her gloomy journey to find the man with the terrible haircut.
BASE.recruitment: RoB: Genesis BD/DVD Serial Code (Expired)RoB: Virgin Soul Disc II Blu-ray Serial CodeSiero's Special Pick TicketLinks Pick Ticket

BASE_4.name: Rita
BASE_4.profile: Her skin as pale as death, this little girl roams the boundless skies in search of an old ally. Untroubled by the fear and suspicion that greets her wherever she goes, she continues on her gloomy journey to find the man with the terrible haircut.
BASE_4.recruitment: RoB: Genesis BD/DVD Serial Code (Expired)RoB: Virgin Soul Disc II Blu-ray Serial CodeSiero's Special Pick TicketLinks Pick Ticket

BASE.name: Robertina
BASE.profile: Tubist of the Sky Philharmonic Orchestra, the musical ensemble with the greatest legacy in all of the skies. She lends an ear to the tuba god and becomes one with her instrument. Her mystical melody cleanses the souls of all who listen.
BASE.recruitment: Granblue Fantasy Orchestra ConcertSiero's Special Pick TicketLinks Pick TicketTogether in Song

BASE.name: Robomi
BASE.profile: This steel warrior was once scattered to the light, but the voices of those who love her restart her gears of justice. With love and bravery burning brightly within her steel body, she stands against a new wave of danger.

EVENT.name: Robomi
EVENT.profile: Weapons of war have no need for emotions. This steel warrior's metal heart never quivers as she unleashes devastating barrages of artillery fire. But as cold and dispassionate as she is, the fire of justice burns deep within her breast; a gift given to her in ages long past.

BASE.name: Romeo
BASE.profile: Once the former lord of Montague who offered his life in order to protect his citizens, he now lurks quietly in the shadows of Verona; the nostalgic memories of the one he loves are buried in his heart but not forgotten. Although his heart is heavy and his outlook obscured, his will remains unbroken.

BASE_4.name: Romeo
BASE_4.profile: Once the former lord of Montague who offered his life in order to protect his citizens, he now lurks quietly in the shadows of Verona; the nostalgic memories of the one he loves are buried in his heart but not forgotten. Although his heart is heavy and his outlook obscured, his will remains unbroken.

EVENT.name: Romeo
EVENT.profile: Oh woe is me! My heart beat for country 'til it was pierced by the arrow of Cupid-ah! My love! Thoughts of you rage within me! I cannot bear it any longer! 'Tis time to bring an end to the storms that beset my tempestuous heart; time to drop the curtain on this tragedy!
EVENT.recruitment: So Close and Yet So Far

BASE.name: Rosamia
BASE.profile: A warrior with unparalleled skill at manipulating talismans, Rosamia's desire for revenge brings her dangerously in sync with the cursed mask she loathes. Whether or not she succumbs to the mask's temptation remains to be seen.

R.name: Rosamia
R.profile: The fealty she once swore to the Erste Empire shattered when she learned the Empire's definition of justice. Already fit for battle, she wanders the world hidden behind a mask.

SR.name: Rosamia
SR.profile: The Air Brigade that sheltered her. To she who had continued to fight all alone, the atmosphere there she felt there was terribly carefree. Before long, her locked-away memories---What has become now is tied to the words she received from those detested days, becoming her strength anew.

YUKATA.name: Rosamia
YUKATA.profile: Concealing her cursed mask beneath one more festive, this young woman chances a night of summer amusements. Blessed with warm memories of summertime with her family, she feels right at home at any festival.

BASE.name: Rosetta
BASE.profile: Rosetta smiles cryptically on her journey through the skyways. For each land through which this uniter of past and present passes, the future is made a little brighter.

HALLOWEEN.name: Rosetta
HALLOWEEN.profile: An elegant rose that blooms in the dark of night. Never failing to mesmerize even in the midst of chaos, her bewitching smile and alluring beauty captivate even those from another world.

HOLIDAY.name: Rosetta
HOLIDAY.profile: The defender swathes herself in scarlet, a bright burst of color in the snowy night. The scent of roses tinges the air in her wake. She truly looks the part—or is this her true form?

SR.name: Rosetta
SR.profile: Rosetta hides the world's lies, as if covering a scent with perfume. Those in her vicinity may get hints as to the truth, but she herself will never tell, instead saying she hopes for a miracle, like any other person.

SUMMER.name: Rosetta
SUMMER.profile: A bewitching rose blooms on a midsummer night's shore. The grace with which she walks suggests that she alone rules the water's edge. If eyes even flicker upon her, they are taken prisoner, enslaved by the beauty that be.

BASE.name: Rosine
BASE.profile: When things aren't going your way and life's getting you down, Rosine's always there. She has a warmth like the sun, and if one partakes of her rice crackers, made with all her love, they shall live to fight another day.

SR.name: Rosine
SR.profile: When rain clouds hang over the heart, in what better place to take solace than a grandmother's knowing hands? Reach out and let those sun-warmed fingers scented by senbei comfort you from the gray skies of worry.

BASE.name: Ryan
BASE.profile: Once again, this rustic warrior hefts his axe to his shoulder and strides forth to battle. He fights for his little sister, but he longs to return to the tranquility of pastoral life. Peace he seeks, but his talent with the axe destines him for war.

SR.name: Ryan
SR.profile: Having come back from the verge of death too many times to count, this kind yet boorish warrior has awakened his true potential. Even this revered hero who storms across the battlefield with the ferocity and sensibilities of a beast and slayed thousands of foes is no match for his little sister.

BASE.name: Ryu
BASE.profile: This lone street fighter spends his days in training. This way of life has captivated many other fighters, as has his strength. He came to the sky realm seeking mighty opponents, and there learned of the primal beasts. Since then he has traversed the sky with the goal of battling one.

BASE.name: Sachiko Koshimizu
BASE.profile: Sachiko is a young girl who landed in a sky far away, guided by a dazzling light. This self-proclaimed "Cutest Girl in All the Sky" is vigorously making her way through the skydom, gaining friendships as she goes, until the day her title is no longer "self-proclaimed."
BASE.recruitment: Cinderella Fantasy ~Girls Keep on Dreaming~Cinderella Fantasy ~Piña Hazard~

BASE.jpname: 阿吽の破弓 ミラオル＆ザーリリャオー
BASE.name: Milleore and Sahli Lao
BASE.profile: These two sharpshooters, once considered the backbone of their local military, now reunite as mercenaries on the job. Despite the time they spent apart, they are still able to dart about and coordinate their attacks in perfect sync on the battlefield, demonstrating the strength of their everlasting bond.

SR.name: Sahli Lao
SR.profile: This little soldier quakes with fear in battle. Deciding that this most certainly would not do, she sets out on a journey to hone her skills and her spirit. Drawing courage from the memory of a steadfast friend who once walked by her side, she continues to work hard to toughen up.

BASE.name: Sakura Kinomoto
BASE.profile: An energetic fifth grader that goes to Tomoeda Elementary. After the beast of the seal, Cerberus, chose her to be a Cardcaptor, she began gathering the scattered Clow Cards.
BASE.recruitment: Cardcaptor Sakura: Sakura and the Mysterious Sky Journey

BASE.name: Sakura Shinguji
BASE.profile: Alighting from the skies is Sakura; dazzling actress of the Great Imperial Theater in Ginza and swordswoman of the people. She continues her crusade against evil with a blade handed down to her from her father, the Reiken-Arataka.

BASE.name: Sandalphon
BASE.profile: Despite seething for two thousand years, the roiling emotions haunting his soul continue to burn without any signs of stopping. He will not rest until he gets revenge on the mentor he once revered.

EVENT.name: Sandalphon
EVENT.profile: Having arisen from a deep, long slumber, this archangel has inherited the will of the supreme primarch, Lucifer. Though Sandalphon previously had no role to play, he now bears the burden of carrying out vengeance in hopes of fulfilling a promise.
EVENT.recruitment: What Makes the Sky Blue II: Paradise LostWhat Makes the Sky Blue III: 000

EVENT_4.name: Sandalphon
EVENT_4.profile: Having arisen from a deep, long slumber, this archangel has inherited the will of the supreme primarch, Lucifer. Though Sandalphon previously had no role to play, he now bears the burden of carrying out vengeance in hopes of fulfilling a promise.
EVENT_4.recruitment: What Makes the Sky Blue II: Paradise LostWhat Makes the Sky Blue III: 000

SUMMER.name: Sandalphon
SUMMER.profile: Having embarked on a new path, the supreme primarch descends upon a sandy beach, gaining insight into the hearts of mortals. A soft light illuminates his chromatic wings as he dedicates himself to his task, deepening his compassion for others along the way.

BASE.name: Sara
BASE.profile: This young priestess saved her country from disaster, but was rewarded with insults and hatred. Dismayed, her heart began to sink into the darkness; but before she could be consumed by it, old friends stepped forward to save her. Now determined to face her own weakness, she sets out on a new journey.

EVENT.name: Sara
EVENT.profile: Sara came into this world as the turning point of a campaign to save her small country. Heavy rain led to a natural disaster, and she realized her destiny. She hides this painful realization behind her smile, and sets out with a cadre of knights.

LIGHT.name: Sara
LIGHT.profile: Bonds which once sustained an island now tie its people down. A single girl ends a chain of sacrifices and teaches the people that they must free themselves from their shackles. She sets off from the island, flying beyond clouds of sand to a brighter tomorrow.

SUMMER.name: Sara
SUMMER.profile: By banishing the primal beast of rain from her country, this petite priestess freed herself from the shackles of fate and set out for the boundless skies. When she discovers sand-covered lands reminiscent of her homeland, she is struck with both awe and excitement. With a new world before her, she stands gazing upon the vast seas that stretch out across the Auguste Isles.

BASE.name: Sarunan
BASE.profile: This young man was sought after by a fickle spirit, on which he placed a curse without hesitation. This spirit cannot be seen by ordinary people, but Sarunan sees it everywhere he goes.

BASE_4.name: Sarunan
BASE_4.profile: This young man was sought after by a fickle spirit, on which he placed a curse without hesitation. This spirit cannot be seen by ordinary people, but Sarunan sees it everywhere he goes.

DARK.name: Sarunan
DARK.profile: Sacrificing himself for love, he dims the fire of his own life to give it to a passing dream. While the shadow of death slowly eats away at his heart, he prays that his beloved will continue to shine bright.

BASE.name: Sarya
BASE.profile: Only one man has ever managed to corner the legendary thief—her idol, the genius detective Barawa! She snagged her dream job as his assistant, and her brilliant insight and intuition have solved countless cases for her not-so-sharp boss. As she tries to keep up with the dashing detective, she dreams of the day when they'll catch the elusive thief—together.
BASE.recruitment: Detective Barawa and the Jewel Resort Incident

SR.name: Sarya
SR.profile: As the right hand of everyone's favorite detective, she figures her boss has his reasons for sending her off on a sudden vacation. She keeps her instinctive sleuthing habits in check to enjoy a well-deserved reprieve with close friends, but the temptation of a good mystery quickly draws her back in.

BASE.name: Satyr
BASE.profile: A primal beast filled with warmth and compassion who's always down for a good heart-to-heart. She travels the sky seeking to connect with others and knows nothing is impossible when the power of love and friendship is by her side.

BASE.name: Scathacha
BASE.profile: She is the true dragon of Alster Island who formed a pact with mortals to oppose the Astrals during the War. For a dragon who potentially faced eternal solitude, interacting with the people of the island brought new meaning to her life. The time has come for her to open her untamable heart.

BASE_4.name: Scathacha
BASE_4.profile: She is the true dragon of Alster Island who formed a pact with mortals to oppose the Astrals during the War. For a dragon who potentially faced eternal solitude, interacting with the people of the island brought new meaning to her life. The time has come for her to open her untamable heart.

VALENTINE.name: Scathacha
VALENTINE.profile: This true dragon, fascinated by human customs, happens upon skydwellers celebrating Valentine's Day. Intrigued by the charming concept that expressing one's feelings requires sweetness, she sets out to Chocolae Island for some hands-on experience.

BASE.name: Selfira
BASE.profile: While delighted to discover the impact her adventures have had on her growth as a musician, she is subsequently faced with a difficult decision. But the light that lies beyond this trial holds the promise of even kinder, stronger, and more vivid performances.

EVENT.name: Selfira
EVENT.profile: This young girl takes pride in the melodies that have been passed down to her, but she is fated to spend her life in the village of the serpent god. Nevertheless, she listens to the old skyfarers tell their tales with shining eyes, and dreams of adventure in the skies.

EVENT_4.name: Selfira
EVENT_4.profile: This young girl takes pride in the melodies that have been passed down to her, but she is fated to spend her life in the village of the serpent god. Nevertheless, she listens to the old skyfarers tell their tales with shining eyes, and dreams of adventure in the skies.

BASE.name: Sen
BASE.profile: This girl has left behind her mountain home for a journey of happiness, hardship, and fateful encounters. Though she still grapples with the vastness of the sky, her enduring and ingenuous enthusiasm are sure to lead her to new vistas.

HOLIDAY.name: Sen
HOLIDAY.profile: In this corner is a polite girl who grew up deep in the mountains. She's still wet behind the ears, but those claws aren't just for show, ladies and gentlemen. Her ferocious fighting style is ready for a night of dazzling duels, but can this young warrior pull off a winter miracle?

SR.name: Sen
SR.profile: Her nimble body lets her run through the trees and climb boulders at top speed with ease. She is friendly and eager to please, but she can also be impulsive, leaving her companions smiling in bemusement. Having spent all her life in the closed off mountains, she longs to traverse the open skies.

BASE.name: Seofon
BASE.profile: One of the Eternals—they who stand astride the skies and across the path of any would-be calamity. Seofon seems rather carefree for the leader of the Eternals, but he's actually a proud and driven man. The fearsome powers he commands could shake the very heavens, but he wields them only to right the world's wrongs. He's also frighteningly fond of swords.

BASE_4.name: Seofon
BASE_4.profile: One of the Eternals—they who stand astride the skies and across the path of any would-be calamity. Seofon seems rather carefree for the leader of the Eternals, but he's actually a proud and driven man. The fearsome powers he commands could shake the very heavens, but he wields them only to right the world's wrongs. He's also frighteningly fond of swords.

BASE.name: Seox
BASE.profile: One of the Eternals—they who stand astride the skies and across the path of any would-be calamity. Seox's power is unrivaled, for he bears the mark of destiny. His emotional instability is just part of his mask—his love is hidden deeper. He seeks to reach beyond the sky, where the one he holds dear travels.

BASE_4.name: Seox
BASE_4.profile: One of the Eternals—they who stand astride the skies and across the path of any would-be calamity. Seox's power is unrivaled, for he bears the mark of destiny. His emotional instability is just part of his mask—his love is hidden deeper. He seeks to reach beyond the sky, where the one he holds dear travels.

BASE_5.name: Seox
BASE_5.profile: One of the Eternals—they who stand astride the skies and across the path of any would-be calamity. Seox's power is unrivaled, for he bears the mark of destiny. His emotional instability is just part of his mask—his love is hidden deeper. He seeks to reach beyond the sky, where the one he holds dear travels.

EVENT.name: Seox
EVENT.profile: The lonely silver wolf who suffers in the abyss of darkness reaches for the light of his own accord. He forges ahead to do what must be done, while his vow of atonement burns as brightly as the stars in the night sky.

BASE.name: Seruel
BASE.profile: After a long and bitter struggle, this prince's kingdom is on the mend—but the man he thought of as a brother has been accused of causing the calamity. Now the prince embarks on a quest to clear his friend's name, so that they might once again embrace as brothers.

BASE_4.name: Seruel
BASE_4.profile: After a long and bitter struggle, this prince's kingdom is on the mend—but the man he thought of as a brother has been accused of causing the calamity. Now the prince embarks on a quest to clear his friend's name, so that they might once again embrace as brothers.

HOLIDAY.name: Seruel
HOLIDAY.profile: A crownless protector has returned home. His island has just overcome a great calamity, but remains deeply scarred. Even still, the island's children bear their suffering with valor, and their courage reminds him of a happy moment in his childhood. He swears then to make these children as happy as he once was.

BASE.name: Sevastien
BASE.profile: A courteous old gentleman who lives by an aloof brand of justice. A kindness was afforded to him long ago, one he aims to repay by becoming a clandestine shadow capable of protecting the small light in his life. Once he's received an order, he answers it with both years of experience and an azure sword.

BASE.name: Sevilbarra
BASE.profile: Revenge had become Sevilbarra's life goal ever since a certain tragic incident, and he's finally tracked down a lead. Soul-crushing grief and righteous indignation ever present in his heart, the Harvin vows to destroy all manner of demon blades which only seek to bring misfortune upon the world.

SR.name: Sevilbarra
SR.profile: He meant to see off his little sister with a smile, but watched in utter shock her final moments. The heartrending pain and anger never leaves him as he grabs his katana in search of both the legendary blade spoken of in tribal legend and his sister's murderer. His single biggest regret is not having the means to stop his little brother's madness - which also stemmed from the very same incident.

BASE.name: Shao
BASE.profile: A wandering merchant of medicine. As a healer with a special talent for remedies, his skills are as mysterious as his speech, often disguising a deeper meaning in his aloof words. Like a fine line between poison and cure, his true character, whether good or evil, lies hidden beneath his gentle smile.

BASE_4.name: Shao
BASE_4.profile: A wandering merchant of medicine. As a healer with a special talent for remedies, his skills are as mysterious as his speech, often disguising a deeper meaning in his aloof words. Like a fine line between poison and cure, his true character, whether good or evil, lies hidden beneath his gentle smile.

BASE.name: Shiki Ichinose
BASE.profile: In the farthest reaches of their dreams, two girls find themselves in a distant sky. This scent-loving girl uses her natural gift and vast wealth of knowledge to put a stop to the olfactory threat upsetting the skies.

BASE.name: Shinobu Kocho
BASE.profile: Though incapable of severing a demon's head due to her small frame, this Demon Slayer was able to create a poison that kills from the inside. The rage behind her calm smile fuels the poison as it permeates the bodies of her enemies, gradually eating away at them until their life is no more.
BASE.recruitment: Scent of Fate at Sky's End

BASE.name: Shion
BASE.profile: A young woman born in the far east but raised elsewhere. Having once abandoned her samurai roots, she takes up the katana once more at a certain point in her life. Though she considers herself a sham, her skill with the blade is true and will undoubtedly serve the crew well in their travels.

BASE.name: Shitori
BASE.profile: An Astral woman saved and raised this girl, becoming her beloved mother despite their differences. So deep was the girl's love, however, that she chose to betray her mother in a desperate bid to save the woman's life. Her treachery was supposed to result in the pair's eternal slumber, but even eternity cannot stand against the fate that comes to claim them.

BASE.name: Shiva
BASE.profile: A fierce war god and arbiter of salvation watches over mortal affairs, manifesting before the stronghearted. He prays thus: "May the children of man who weave this world return to the proper path."

BASE.name: Shura
BASE.profile: A serious and upright military strategist who desperately wishes for the strength to protect those dear to her. Kind yet prone to an unwitting arrogance, she is strict both with others and herself, never ceasing to reflect on her own decisions for the sake of her country and its people.

BASE.name: Siegfried
BASE.profile: This hero saved his country from great peril, but soon found himself the subject of intrigue and conspiracy. Now reviled by many, he's become a loyal knight of the state in the hopes that he can fulfill a promise he made to the former king.

BASE_4.name: Siegfried
BASE_4.profile: This hero saved his country from great peril, but soon found himself the subject of intrigue and conspiracy. Now reviled by many, he's become a loyal knight of the state in the hopes that he can fulfill a promise he made to the former king.

FIRE.name: Siegfried
FIRE.profile: A loyal knight known to many as a hero. He marches his way forward after finding himself imbued with a dreadful power. Should he prove to be the harbinger of destruction as a result, he is prepared to end his own life before harm befalls anybody.

YUKATA.name: Siegfried
YUKATA.profile: This swift swordsman floated in on a breeze. His form as he slashes through foes is vivid, like a firework bursting in the night sky and twinkling in descent. May these tranquil days forever linger, light as the air in the wake of his blade.

BASE.name: Sig
BASE.profile: A ship slides softly through the rolling waves of the great blue sea, manned by a hand-picked crew. Any who try to interfere in their hunt will become no more than a stain on Sig's scimitar; a memory left behind as she disappears over the horizon.
BASE.recruitment: Dark Giant of the Blue Sea

SR.name: Sig
SR.profile: The leader of a group of fisherman still in search of prey. Sig's group is determined to find new fishing grounds in the sky, and with them, new challenges. Her harpoon has seen some rough seas, but it emits a powerful light that pierces through anything in its path.

BASE.name: Silva
BASE.profile: This distinguished sniper possesses a rare talent, but she never forgets to polish her technique. She hopes that one day her name will echo through the skies like a gunshot, so that even the people in her sealed off hometown might hear.

BASE_4.name: Silva
BASE_4.profile: This distinguished sniper possesses a rare talent, but she never forgets to polish her technique. She hopes that one day her name will echo through the skies like a gunshot, so that even the people in her sealed off hometown might hear.

LIGHT.name: Silva
LIGHT.profile: This sharpshooter, renowned throughout the skies, puts her finger on the trigger to protect her comrades. With every shot fired, the piercing cry of a sniper round is heard, etching her name in history.

SUMMER.name: Silva
SUMMER.profile: This hardworking, prodigious sniper enjoys her holiday at a resort with her sisters and friends. She's delighted to see that her foster uncle has become a reliable man. Despite the troubles that crop up, she won't let anything ruin her summer fun.

BASE.name: Skull
BASE.profile: Raised on a continent of snow, the small boy Skull yearns to become a man and attain freedom. He prepares himself now in order to become truly free someday.

SR.name: Skull
SR.profile: With the love of freedom in his heart, this boy sets out across the skies with his trusted partner by his side. When he and his dog are racing through snowy fields, at one with the wind, he feels like the freedom he has always sought is just within reach.

BASE.name: Societte
BASE.profile: Heir to a thousand years of lost history, she travels the sky in search of many things. She works hard to find what she is looking for, but freezes up whenever she has to ask for help. Unable to vocalize her thoughts, her tail swishes nervously while her contacts impatiently tap their feet. Eventually, they all get fed up and walk away. She watches them go, head hanging in quiet shame.

BASE_4.name: Societte
BASE_4.profile: Heir to a thousand years of lost history, she travels the sky in search of many things. She works hard to find what she is looking for, but freezes up whenever she has to ask for help. Unable to vocalize her thoughts, her tail swishes nervously while her contacts impatiently tap their feet. Eventually, they all get fed up and walk away. She watches them go, head hanging in quiet shame.

FIRE.name: Societte
FIRE.profile: She chases the remnants of a lost millennium and awakens the power of flames immemorial. With trusted allies in tow, she skirts the edge of an ancient truth. If only she knew of the cruel journey she would soon embark upon...

WIND.name: Societte
WIND.profile: The pure-hearted Erune shouldering a thousand years of history puts on her late mother's sacred robes to mend the wounds of those dear to her. Exuding all the grace and poise of a ballerina in her refined steps, she lights the spark of hope in her companions' hearts.

BASE.name: Sophia
BASE.profile: Hoping to follow in the footsteps of the high priest, this pilgrim travels from Astral Ruin to Astral Ruin. She extends her aid to all those in need; her journey will be long and arduous.

SR.name: Sophia
SR.profile: A young woman set to inherit a position of great responsibility within her faith. She hears of the whereabouts of what could possibly be the map she lost so long ago.

BASE.name: Sophie
BASE.profile: Asleep in the tiny island's floral garden, the girl dreamed of a distant world. She would take to the skies in search of lost memories, and swing her fists to save her friends in the sky.

BASE.name: Soriz
BASE.profile: Soriz has always lived as he wishes, never doubting himself. His entire worldview is thrown into question by another man who lives by his fists. Asked what he will leave behind to the next generation, Soriz sets out to discover the answer. In the end, he decides to bring others as much happiness as he can, in hopes the spreading ripples of his actions will outlast him.

BASE_4.name: Soriz
BASE_4.profile: Soriz has always lived as he wishes, never doubting himself. His entire worldview is thrown into question by another man who lives by his fists. Asked what he will leave behind to the next generation, Soriz sets out to discover the answer. In the end, he decides to bring others as much happiness as he can, in hopes the spreading ripples of his actions will outlast him.

EVENT.name: Soriz
EVENT.profile: An aged but passionate agent, Soriz has seen the ice-covered earth and quests for the unseen paradise beyond the clouds. Neither frozen skies nor malevolent ships could ever deter him.

SR.name: Soriz
SR.profile: Soriz, after half a century of work, came to believe that the only weapon to be trusted is the body. In between harsh, rock-smashing training sessions, he can see paradise extend before him.

SR_4.name: Soriz
SR_4.profile: Soriz, after half a century of work, came to believe that the only weapon to be trusted is the body. In between harsh, rock-smashing training sessions, he can see paradise extend before him.

BASE.name: Spinnah
BASE.profile: Having discovered the beauty and infinite possibilities present in every revolution of a spin blade, this young man tours the skies hoping to jumpstart another spin blade craze. On one particularly holy night, his legerdemain captures the hearts and minds of all who watch, promoting great interest in the spin.

R.name: Spinnah
R.profile: The spin blade is now a thing of the past: a toy that no one plays with anymore. But one young man wants to change all that. He travels across the skies on a mission to spin the world and bring spin blades back into the limelight.

BASE.name: Stahn Aileron
BASE.profile: This youth came from a different world with his trusted sword at his hip. Honest and good-natured to a fault, his kindness and optimism are a source of constant inspiration for his comrades. With blue skies reflected in his clear eyes, one can only wonder to what heights this young man will soar.

BASE.jpname: 勇者と姫君 スタン＆アリーザ
BASE.name: Stan and Aliza
BASE.profile: After countless trials, the two paths meet and intertwine once more. The strength of their hearts and the depth of their bond will determine if this is destiny, or simply a waypoint for the two adventurers.

EVENT.name: Stan
EVENT.profile: By suffering affliction and hardship, Stan realized his own weaknesses and gained focus. With the golden flower lingering in his heart, he sets out to become a man worthy of the one he loves.

R.name: Stan
R.profile: Stan set out into the great wide world, cursing his shaking legs. He wants to run back home on occasion, but always manages to keep pushing forward. He holds his ground even when the enemies frighten him, to become a man capable of protecting those he loves.

BASE.name: Mimlemel and Stumpeye
BASE.profile: A young lady of many mysteries, she's lost her horn which allows her to speak from the heart. When she becomes despondent and loses the will to continue on, her trusted stump embarks on an adventure to save her.

BASE.name: Sturm
BASE.profile: After years of forging her path with steel, this mercenary finds herself sailing the skies on a journey of discovery. As she gazes silently ahead, the fire burning in her eyes begins slowly to shift its hue.

GRAND.name: Sturm
GRAND.profile: She is a masterful swordswoman with a long, illustrious career in battle. As an agent, there are only two constants she trusts: the contract and the payout. Yet behind her taciturn expression lies a hidden flame burning steady and hot.

BASE.name: Suframare
BASE.profile: This wandering scholar was so deliriously happy when she magicked up her first snowball, she decided to teach the skill to everyone. Although her specialty is ice magic, she has a burning passion for education. The first lesson she gives to eager disciples is "There's no such thing as talent."

SUMMER.name: Suframare
SUMMER.profile: An educator's purpose is to guide her flock; even on this watery playground, Suframare swings the cane. Although there might be a rough edge in her voice, her eyes are soft as she watches over her charges. Her motto is, "Learn with your students, play with your students." The sunbrella she brought today will soon become a treasured memento of a blissful summer day.

BASE.name: Sutera
BASE.profile: While the sister she loves and respects soars freely with levitation magic and a natural talent for the magic bow, the girl herself chooses a more traditional route forward. Despite the obstacles that litter her path, she steadfastly pushes past each trial and unknowingly garners the love and respect of those who observe her growth.

EVENT.name: Sutera
EVENT.profile: A graceful and gorgeous young lady clad in navy hues. With her fierce sister pushing her along like a strong tailwind, the two sisters head into a woman's battlefield.

FIRE.name: Sutera
FIRE.profile: A girl that has done away with girly things, Sutera focuses her efforts on her archery skills, but she is easily overwhelmed by the sight of pretty clothes. With the influence of her free-spirited and sparkly sister, Sutera has still managed to become a beautiful lady. Like a flower dancing in the wind, she travels the sky, accompanied by her adoring sister.

SR.name: Sutera
SR.profile: Thinking of her sister and her family, this palace guardian left her village. Perplexed by the freshness of everything she sees, she carries a lot of uncertainty with her as she pursues her sister.

SR_4.name: Sutera
SR_4.profile: Thinking of her sister and her family, this palace guardian left her village. Perplexed by the freshness of everything she sees, she carries a lot of uncertainty with her as she pursues her sister.

BASE.name: Suzaku Kururugi
BASE.profile: Resolute in his conviction that gaining results through dishonest means will only leave one empty, this young man opposes Zero as the pilot of the Lancelot, the world's first seventh-generation Knightmare Frame. Despite aligning himself with Britannia, he shares a bond with Lelouch and Nunnally from their shared childhoods in Japan.
BASE.recruitment: Code Geass: Lelouch of the RebellionThe Blue Reckoning

BASE.name: Syr
BASE.profile: This small boy's eyes are fixed straight ahead as he runs full-speed through the skies in pursuit of a big dream. His occasional bouts of recklessness are a result of his kind and naive heart.

BASE.name: Tabina
BASE.profile: The purehearted daughter of a tycoon soars off into the distant skies in search of her one true love. The passion running deep within her heart is unwavering and burns brighter than any Valtz steel. Her positive and charismatic personality will surely add warmth to the crew's journey.

BASE.jpname: 竈門炭治郎＆竈門禰豆子＆我妻善逸＆嘴平伊之助
BASE.name: Tanjiro, Nezuko, Zenitsu, and Inosuke
BASE.profile: Even in another world, these young Demon Slayers continue to swing their mighty blades—for the things they wish to protect, as well as the obstacles they seek to overcome. An unrelenting spirit burns within their eyes, never dying out.
BASE.recruitment: Scent of Fate at Sky's End

BASE.name: Tanya
BASE.profile: A glimmering knife in her grip, Tanya never stopped fighting in the shadows. Even as heartrending sorrow, solitude, and despair threatened to crush her very spirit, she would always recall her late father's teachings and look ahead to the future. What was once mere bravado quickly became true strength.

R.name: Tanya
R.profile: Stammered words fade quickly in the dim light, their true intent lost. Unable to connect with others, Tanya suffers her solitude in silence. She cradles a dagger, a memento of another, as if it could ease her loneliness. The cold steel is little comfort.

SR.name: Tanya
SR.profile: The silent knife-wielder Tanya one day becomes enthralled with a beautiful dress, which she then receives as a gift from a good friend. Excited but dignified she dons the dress before stepping foot into a night where unknown dangers await her.

SUMMER.name: Tanya
SUMMER.profile: She who dwells in the shadows now dons cool attire and descends upon a sunny paradise. Absorbing every shred of laughter and friendly shout, her heart begins to fill with a warm, happy glow.

BASE.name: Tear Grants
BASE.profile: After finding herself in a world of endless skies, she continues to keep up appearances, hiding the innocence of youth under a veil of composure. The sound of her voice echoing across the heavens overflows with passion and kindness, protecting and healing all who hear it.

BASE.name: Teena
BASE.profile: The idealist within her never wavering, this mage goes out of her way to help troubled children. Learning alongside the next generation as well as guiding them forward, she begins to realize that becoming a teacher may not be a far-fetched goal for her future.

SR.name: Teena
SR.profile: Deep within the swirling flames of her magic, she sees the face of her dead mother. She vows to become stronger, but cannot force herself to cruelty to gain the strength she seeks. Her brother, hungry for revenge, has no such qualms. Standing together, they challenge a bitter enemy.

SR_4.name: Teena
SR_4.profile: Deep within the swirling flames of her magic, she sees the face of her dead mother. She vows to become stronger, but cannot force herself to cruelty to gain the strength she seeks. Her brother, hungry for revenge, has no such qualms. Standing together, they challenge a bitter enemy.

VALENTINE.name: Teena
VALENTINE.profile: For Valentine's Day, she prepares decadent chocolates for the one she cherishes, each batch hand-mixed with deep feelings of gratitude. For her brother, in search of a new path, she is an anchor of support that will always be by his side—perhaps one day she can share the joys of making chocolates with him.

BASE.name: Teru Tendo
BASE.profile: Summoned to this world by a powerful light, Teru is a knight decked in red with a strong sense of justice in his heart. He wields his sword with unwavering will, as the fire flowing through his veins erupts into strength to incinerate evil.
BASE.recruitment: SideM Fantasy: To the Sky Realm for Some Reasons

BASE.name: The Lowain Bros
BASE.profile: As frivolous as the brosome bros may be, there comes a time when they must confront their inner selves. For friendship and for love, the bros strive to become better versions of themselves, all the while humming "playboys gonna playboy."

BASE.name: Thelonim
BASE.profile: This small fighter's steadfast belief in a lie changed his life, and when he pierces his foes with valiant sincerity, fate smiles on him, turning his lies into truth. Thus is born a lone hero, striding forth to walk the path of legends.

BASE.name: Therese
BASE.profile: Her ceremonial finery is torn in the heat of battle, but that only makes her cut a more dashing figure. Her blue blade dances through the air, igniting the firey passion of the audience.

EVENT.name: Therese
EVENT.profile: Therese is a refined dueler caught up in a wave of enthusiasm from spectators who admire her clear victories. However, few recognize the poor, average nobodies who are no match for her.

SR.name: Therese
SR.profile: Manipulated by devious intentions, the blue duelist dons the costume of a bunny rabbit. As her cheeks grow red with embarrassment, the desire to work out her frustrations by hitting something—hard—grows ever stronger. When she sniffs out the possibility of battle, this mild mannered rabbit transforms into a snarling beast.

BASE.name: Threo
BASE.profile: One of the Eternals—they who stand astride the skies and across the path of any would-be calamity. This fierce warrior understands the laws of nature far better than any other, and survival of the fittest has become her creed. She fights tooth and claw to remain at the top of the food chain, so that she'll never have to lose anything again.

BASE_4.name: Threo
BASE_4.profile: One of the Eternals—they who stand astride the skies and across the path of any would-be calamity. This fierce warrior understands the laws of nature far better than any other, and survival of the fittest has become her creed. She fights tooth and claw to remain at the top of the food chain, so that she'll never have to lose anything again.

BASE_5.name: Threo
BASE_5.profile: One of the Eternals—they who stand astride the skies and across the path of any would-be calamity. This fierce warrior understands the laws of nature far better than any other, and survival of the fittest has become her creed. She fights tooth and claw to remain at the top of the food chain, so that she'll never have to lose anything again.

BASE.name: Tiamat
BASE.profile: This purveyor of protective winds has assumed a skydweller-like form. Her breath has blessed Port Breeze with prosperity for hundreds of years and will continue to do so in perpetuity. Nothing can stop her gales from blowing through every corner of the limitless sky.

BASE_4.name: Tiamat
BASE_4.profile: This purveyor of protective winds has assumed a skydweller-like form. Her breath has blessed Port Breeze with prosperity for hundreds of years and will continue to do so in perpetuity. Nothing can stop her gales from blowing through every corner of the limitless sky.

BASE.name: Tien
BASE.profile: One of the Eternals—they who stand astride the skies and across the path of any would-be calamity. Tien leads Stardust Town with her twin brother. Determined to find a way to end the cycle of hatred, she stepped forward to take sole responsibility for all the fighting in the reaches. She cherishes her family, and will fight hard to protect them.

BASE_4.name: Tien
BASE_4.profile: One of the Eternals—they who stand astride the skies and across the path of any would-be calamity. Tien leads Stardust Town with her twin brother. Determined to find a way to end the cycle of hatred, she stepped forward to take sole responsibility for all the fighting in the reaches. She cherishes her family, and will fight hard to protect them.

BASE.name: Tsubasa
BASE.profile: A delinquent from the Mysteria Academy of Magic who's following in his late father's tire tracks by rolling through the world authentically. On the back of his beast, his baby, he's seeking the other side of the sky. His only weapons are two fists and a heart sincere.

BASE.name: Tsubasa Kashiwagi
BASE.profile: Summoned to this world by a powerful light, Tsubasa is a knight clad in green who keeps the scent of a gentle breeze about him. With his heart to the wind and his eye on the sky, his performance on the battlefield dazzles with just a pull of the trigger.
BASE.recruitment: SideM Fantasy: To the Sky Realm for Some Reasons

BASE.name: Tweyen
BASE.profile: One of the Eternals—they who stand astride the skies and across the path of any would-be calamity. This naturally talented huntress's skills with the bow are peerless; her eagle eyes can track prey far beyond the horizon. She destroys those that wrong her in a hail of shining arrows.

BASE_4.name: Tweyen
BASE_4.profile: One of the Eternals—they who stand astride the skies and across the path of any would-be calamity. This naturally talented huntress's skills with the bow are peerless; her eagle eyes can track prey far beyond the horizon. She destroys those that wrong her in a hail of shining arrows.

BASE_5.name: Tweyen
BASE_5.profile: One of the Eternals—they who stand astride the skies and across the path of any would-be calamity. This naturally talented huntress's skills with the bow are peerless; her eagle eyes can track prey far beyond the horizon. She destroys those that wrong her in a hail of shining arrows.

BASE.name: Tyre
BASE.profile: The knight he long adored left Albion, but not before he stole one final glimpse of her. But there was something amiss. Something about the sparkle in her eyes had changed. Vowing to understand what had brought about this transformation, he leaves his hometown in search of her, hoping that he can one day see the world as she does.

YUKATA.name: Tyre
YUKATA.profile: A much-too-serious knight-in-training goes on vacation, intent on enjoying every moment of his time off. Surrounded by the people he loves and respects, the memories he makes will prove to be a valuable experience.

BASE.name: Tōru Amuro
BASE.profile: A private detective who works at a local cafe, but in truth he is an investigator with the Public Security Bureau. When he gets that sharp glint in his eyes, he's sure to solve anything that comes before him.

BASE.name: Ulamnuran
BASE.profile: One young man went on a journey to heal the sorrow scattered across the world. His tricks and clumsiness causes trouble for people, but even so, he still puts a smile on everyone's faces.

BASE_4.name: Ulamnuran
BASE_4.profile: One young man went on a journey to heal the sorrow scattered across the world. His tricks and clumsiness causes trouble for people, but even so, he still puts a smile on everyone's faces.

BASE.name: Uzuki Shimamura
BASE.profile: Uzuki is a young girl who landed in a sky far away, guided by a dazzling light. Despite arriving in a world where she does not belong, her positivity is unbending as she continues searching for the light, with a ready smile on her face.
BASE.recruitment: Cinderella Fantasy ~Girls on a Quest~,Cinderella Fantasy ~Girls Keep on Dreaming~Cinderella Fantasy ~Piña Hazard~

BASE_4.name: Uzuki Shimamura
BASE_4.profile: Uzuki is a young girl who landed in a sky far away, guided by a dazzling light. Despite arriving in a world where she does not belong, her positivity is unbending as she continues searching for the light, with a ready smile on her face.
BASE_4.recruitment: Cinderella Fantasy ~Girls on a Quest~,Cinderella Fantasy ~Girls Keep on Dreaming~Cinderella Fantasy ~Piña Hazard~

BASE.name: Vajra
BASE.profile: Guardian of the West-Northwest and one of the Twelve Divine Generals. Revered as a deity of war along with her canine partner Garjana, she is steadfast and determined in her pursuit of strength. Her purity of heart allows her to hear the voices of the natural world, making her an invaluable asset to the crew.

BASE_4.name: Vajra
BASE_4.profile: Guardian of the West-Northwest and one of the Twelve Divine Generals. Revered as a deity of war along with her canine partner Garjana, she is steadfast and determined in her pursuit of strength. Her purity of heart allows her to hear the voices of the natural world, making her an invaluable asset to the crew.

BASE.name: Vane
BASE.profile: On a fine spring day and with his closest companion, Vane takes a mountain journey that he'd once started but never completed. Unexpected calamity befalls them, but together they rise above the ordeal. They now know that no matter what may come to pass, united they shall abide.

BASE_4.name: Vane
BASE_4.profile: On a fine spring day and with his closest companion, Vane takes a mountain journey that he'd once started but never completed. Unexpected calamity befalls them, but together they rise above the ordeal. They now know that no matter what may come to pass, united they shall abide.

DUO.jpname: 白竜の双騎士 ランスロット＆ヴェイン
DUO.name: Lancelot and Vane
DUO.profile: The captain that everyone wants to be and the vice-captain who supports him have a relationship that extends beyond friendship. As knights, they stride to become more powerful with each day.

EVENT.name: Vane
EVENT.profile: This White Dragon knight is homeward bound, anxious over his dearest friend—he'll climb any mountain or fight any enemy for the guy. Naturally outgoing and cheerful, he buoys the spirits of his fellow travelers.

SR.name: Vane
SR.profile: Vane seeks to gain new companions. With that desire in mind and purity in his heart, he serves as first officer in the Order of the White Dragons. Serving alongside his beloved comrades, Vane would do anything he can to protect his country.

BASE.jpname: 白竜の双騎士 ランスロット＆ヴェイン
BASE.name: Lancelot and Vane
BASE.profile: As the two knights enjoy their vacation and look out at the ocean they had once dreamed of, memories of their childhood come flooding back. Even if time passes and circumstances change, their friendship and respect for each other will always remain in their hearts.

BASE.name: Vania
BASE.profile: This young princess of the night now dances freely through the bright blue sky, a broad grin plastered on her face. Her capriciousness causes a lot of trouble for those around her. Still, her innocence warms the hearts of her comrades, unraveling the ancient chains that bind her people.

BASE_4.name: Vania
BASE_4.profile: This young princess of the night now dances freely through the bright blue sky, a broad grin plastered on her face. Her capriciousness causes a lot of trouble for those around her. Still, her innocence warms the hearts of her comrades, unraveling the ancient chains that bind her people.

DUO.jpname: 飛竜と吸血姫 ヴァンピィ＆ベス
DUO.name: Vania and Malinda
DUO.profile: A vampire princess and her dragon friend embark on a journey across the skies despite cries of disapproval. As they step into a new world together, their experiences and encounters make them braver and their relationship stronger.

SR.name: Vania
SR.profile: A virtuous girl of noble birth with a fascination for festivals of the outside world takes to the dance. Her toothy grin and stylish steps welcome people and beasts alike, breaking barriers that serve only to divide. The pureness of her heart has released many from the chains that bind them.

BASE.name: Vanzza
BASE.profile: This one-horned warrior left home after swearing an oath to rouse his beloved from her coma. His eyes quickly fill with tears during emotional moments, but he always turns away to hide them.

SR.name: Vanzza
SR.profile: In the wake of a painful defeat, Vanzza sets out to relearn how to use his chosen weapons from the ground up. His new mastery comes just in time, as the ghosts of his past reach out for him once

BASE.name: Vaseraga
BASE.profile: He was unable to banish the shadows clinging to him, dyeing him the color of the abyss. As he struggled, he committed sin after sin until everything he cared about was taken from him. Finally forced to acknowledge his fall, he picked up a great scythe and donned ominous armor. The day of this wounded lion's redemption is still far off.

BASE_4.name: Vaseraga
BASE_4.profile: He was unable to banish the shadows clinging to him, dyeing him the color of the abyss. As he struggled, he committed sin after sin until everything he cared about was taken from him. Finally forced to acknowledge his fall, he picked up a great scythe and donned ominous armor. The day of this wounded lion's redemption is still far off.

EARTH.name: Vaseraga
EARTH.profile: A man who has lost everything but finds he has yet more to suffer. The reward for surviving unyielding regret is knowing that he has tarnished his once unbroken vow. Despair consumes him; he welcomes darkness. Beneath those bandages, who is to say what color his eyes burn?

FIRE.name: Vaseraga
FIRE.profile: A deep resentment within his heart, he curses the moon. His very existence is but a step away from vanishing, yet he is eager to endure any hardship to aid his trusted comrades on their journey into the unknown.

BASE.jpname: 真紅と冥闇 ゼタ＆バザラガ
BASE.name: Zeta and Vaseraga
BASE.profile: The crimson lancer and ebony reaper adorn themselves for a night of festivities. The sun drops from the sky; the dark falls like a hush, shot through by beacons that beckon to the dead and the lost. A pair of eyes long grown accustomed to shadows and a flame that forges a crimson path—what can they discover within the gathering dusk of deception?

BASE.name: Veight
BASE.profile: This proud youth has the blood of legends flowing through his veins. He ventures into the vast, unknown world for the future of the vampires. Through his many adventures, he develops a deep understanding of humans.

BASE.name: Vermeil
BASE.profile: For the sins of the past, he was born with an eye that will not stop crying. His fate seems intertwined with the memory of a woman, long since forgotten. Could she be the key to stopping the flow of his tears?

SR.name: Vermeil
SR.profile: Ah, the final figments of her memory, locked beyond fickle far-off remembrances. An endless ebb and flow, like the tide upon the shoals. Fear the possibility that comes from knowing... For my sadness lingers upon you always.

BASE.name: Viceroy
BASE.profile: A young man seeking to surpass even the greatest of blacksmiths, Viceroy researches day and night to find the ultimate super alloy. He is called the Alloy Artisan.

BASE.name: Vikala
BASE.profile: One of the Twelve Divine Generals and guardian of the north. Her "yang" side is determined to bring hope, dreams, and wonderment to the world. Her "yin" side wants nothing more than to hide away from it. Caught between two extremes, the divine rat pins her hopes on the wide-open skies and chooses to trust in her new friends.

EVENT.name: Vikala
EVENT.profile: One of the Twelve Divine Generals, this particular girl relies on her trusty rat-ear headband to overcome mental hurdles that would otherwise render her paralyzed. Yangtopia, it seems, is still a long ways away.

BASE.name: Vira
BASE.profile: The knight of the primal beasts has returned to Vira's side to grant her even greater power, drawn as it was to her dark, burning passions. Crazed by her obsession, she uses her primal energies to cut down all who dare approach the object of her affection.

BASE_4.name: Vira
BASE_4.profile: The knight of the primal beasts has returned to Vira's side to grant her even greater power, drawn as it was to her dark, burning passions. Crazed by her obsession, she uses her primal energies to cut down all who dare approach the object of her affection.

DUO.jpname: キャタピラとヴィーラ
DUO.name: Lady Katapillar and Vira
DUO.profile: Vira transforms Katalina into Lady Katapillar, an ancient and magnificent tool of destruction. A slave to Vira's will, she has been sent on a path to extinguish all life from the sky.*This is a work of fiction. All names, characters, and referenced incidents are products of the collective imaginations of Lowain and Bros. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.

GRAND.name: Vira
GRAND.profile: The nightmares won't stop; her mind can't take much more. Honor incarnate takes charge to save its master. No matter the cost. No matter how foolish it may seem.

PROMO.name: Vira
PROMO.profile: Tonight, the red threads of fate spin a girl's dream into reality. Oblivious to the dazzling lights and music of the dance hall, she only sees one thing—an unworldly beauty clad in blue. Together they dance away, their shadows melting into one.
PROMO.recruitment: Granblue Fantasy: The Animation BD/DVD Season 2 - Vol. 1

SR.name: Vira
SR.profile: This self-centered knight journeyed to Knights' Island. There her devotion to one woman turned into a dark obsession.

SUMMER.name: Vira
SUMMER.profile: Vira finds an unexpected experience awaiting her on an already unexpected journey. Through it, she discovers a new emotion deep inside her, an emotion that every young person experiences at some point in their lives. Bathed in the warm light of the summer sun, it slowly grows stronger.

WIND.name: Vira
WIND.profile: Vira has a nightmare. Three playboys vying for her dearest Katalina's affections are being attacked by an avatar of malice, hell-bent on wiping any and all playboys from the skies. Is Vira capable of bringing this single-minded murder machine to terms?

BASE.name: Volenna
BASE.profile: Only a strictly regimented mind, free of emotion, could protect her homeland—or so she thought. Little by little, old friends have softened her hardened heart. Now, the gentle knight wields her sword for those she truly wishes to protect. Her strength will rescue a priestess bound by a cruel fate.

R.name: Volenna
R.profile: A devoted knight of the path provided by the sand god. Good patriotic knights push despair to the fore, and don't even think about their childish desires; for this reason Volenna has suppressed her usually warm nature.

BASE.name: Walder
BASE.profile: A brave warrior crosses the sky, gaining valuable experience and wisdom on his various adventures. Everything he does is for the forest's protection and to bring joy to his dear friend. The bonds in his heart cannot be cut; not even by the blade of fate.

BASE_4.name: Walder
BASE_4.profile: A brave warrior crosses the sky, gaining valuable experience and wisdom on his various adventures. Everything he does is for the forest's protection and to bring joy to his dear friend. The bonds in his heart cannot be cut; not even by the blade of fate.

HOLIDAY.name: Walder
HOLIDAY.profile: The smiles of children are what inspires this courageous warrior in his fight against the forces of evil. Donning new garb, he descends upon snowy towns across the land. Even on this, the most silent of nights, he has but one mission—to protect those he loves.

R.name: Walder
R.profile: This courageous warrior is the pride of his family, and protects the forest from the wicked. It will be some time before his friend--who slumbers in forest--awakes. Until such a time as they will be reunited, this young man follows the story of the world.

SUMMER.name: Walder
SUMMER.profile: A courageous warrior strips down and heads into the glittering blue sea. He clutches his swim tube close, for he is helpless without it. Buoyant, he carves a new legend through the waves, and hopes to one day share the tale with a sleeping friend.

BASE.name: Will
BASE.profile: A two-faced preacher who won't accept compromise—good or bad. This is a threat to those who stand to have their misdeeds judged by him. As for the creatures who would receive his affection? It's still a threat.

SR.name: Will
SR.profile: The two-faced preacher's research has advanced by leaps and bounds over the course of his travels. His lust for knowledge knows no limits; it pushes him ever forward to seek greater discoveries. Any who dare stand in the path of his studies will regret it.

SR_4.name: Will
SR_4.profile: The two-faced preacher's research has advanced by leaps and bounds over the course of his travels. His lust for knowledge knows no limits; it pushes him ever forward to seek greater discoveries. Any who dare stand in the path of his studies will regret it.

BASE.name: Wulf and Renie
BASE.profile: The world has much to show to a lone werewolf and a little girl on their journey through a boundless sky. As the girl's narrow perspective broadens, her proud lupine guardian will always be there to protect her.

BASE.name: Yaia
BASE.profile: To become Santa Claus and deliver a gift to ailing Dad—this is the girl's desire, as pure as it is clear. When the real Saint Nick catches word of her wish, he lends the girl the requisite red outfit. Dressed as Santa Claus, her every action is meant to make Dad happy and healthy...

SR.name: Yaia
SR.profile: An innocent girl raised with love, Yaia knows nothing of misfortune. She departs for adventure in the sky and just goes on believing. Though she is but a small girl, she will surely fulfill her big dreams someday.

SR_4.name: Yaia
SR_4.profile: An innocent girl raised with love, Yaia knows nothing of misfortune. She departs for adventure in the sky and just goes on believing. Though she is but a small girl, she will surely fulfill her big dreams someday.

BASE.name: Yamanbagiri Kunihiro
BASE.profile: A thin veil of cloth conceals the complicated blend of inferiority and pride he feels, distancing all who might approach him. But peer into his beautiful jade eyes and you will see the raging passion he harbors within, shimmering off each sweep of his blade.

BASE.name: Yggdrasil
BASE.profile: For ages she has been a silent witness to all around her, unmoving from her place in the forest. Now she longs to journey out from her home and see the world. But without the ability to speak, there is only one who can hear the innermost desires of her heart.

BASE.name: Yngwie
BASE.profile: A legendary skyfarer who once took the world by storm returns for a final adventure. He fights for his whims... and for romance.

BASE_4.name: Yngwie
BASE_4.profile: A legendary skyfarer who once took the world by storm returns for a final adventure. He fights for his whims... and for romance.

BASE.name: Yodarha
BASE.profile: Betrayed by his dear apprentice, this bladesman renounced the mortal world. His faith would only be restored when a certain young person came to lead him back to civilization. He finally cast off his angler's disguise when his apprentice's long-lost sword reappeared.

R.name: Yodarha
R.profile: With a snap of the rod, this expert angler lands another big catch. He makes it look easy—too easy. To the few who sense the power lurking below the surface, he smiles. "The rod is no different from the sword, you know."

WIND.name: Yodarha
WIND.profile: Regret weighs heavily on the shoulders of this swordsman—if only he had followed his instincts, thrown away his emotional attachment, and cut down his disciple long ago. He dons his white robes once more in a silent vow, determined to fulfill his duties as the disciple's former master, even if such an act costs him his life.

BASE.name: You
BASE.profile: A hollow girl turned mad by a thousand years of lost history regains her peaceful self through genuine companionship. Taking to heart all the love she has been shown, she sets out to make up for the sins of her past.

BASE.name: Young Cat
BASE.profile: Inspired by one furless friend's example, this young cat takes to the skies in purrsuit of freedom.

BASE.name: Yuel
BASE.profile: She set out on a journey in search of a treasure with a thousand years of history, all to revive the royal family she serves. She's plenty curious about this world, full of surprises as it is, and today she presses on down the road once more.

BASE_4.name: Yuel
BASE_4.profile: She set out on a journey in search of a treasure with a thousand years of history, all to revive the royal family she serves. She's plenty curious about this world, full of surprises as it is, and today she presses on down the road once more.

EVENT.name: Yuel
EVENT.profile: Yuel journeys long and hard with her loved ones to make up for the one thousand years of lost lineage. When she crosses paths with another successor and unravels a shred of the truth, this tale stretching over the past millennium kicks into high-gear.

SUMMER.name: Yuel
SUMMER.profile: The enchanting view of Yuel in this swimsuit is proof of her companionship with her greatest friend in the whole wide world. Relishing in their intimate bond that is stronger than a thousand years of karma, this Erune takes a well-deserved vacation by a serene lake.

WATER.name: Yuel
WATER.profile: This foxy lass puts her life on the line to acquire a power she will need to save a dear friend. Her undying conviction in the face of any obstacle will be what ultimately brings an end to the thousand-year curse.

BASE.name: Yuisis
BASE.profile: With a strong sense of dignity and respect, this young girl ventures out on her mission across the sky. Bearing the mark of a leader, she wields a sacred weapon passed down for generations. Her only desires are to seek revenge on those who wronged her and reclaim her rightful position as leader. The road before her is treacherous. But as long as she keeps true to herself and focuses on the goal before her, she may be able to carve the path she so desires.

FIRE.name: Yuisis
FIRE.profile: This girl with a chivalrous heart visits her parents' graves, vowing to right past wrongs and to restore the former glory of her gang—no matter the cost. It is a promise not only to her parents, but also to herself. It will not be an easy path she treads, but she nonetheless takes a step forward, ready to brave whatever perils await.

YUKATA.name: Yuisis
YUKATA.profile: This girl, her heart full of generosity, dons a yukata to spend a fun-filled day with her new family at a festival. There she finds a simple happiness, one she thought she would never experience again. Amid the bliss, she makes a vow, swearing to forever walk beside those who've come to accept her as one of their own.

BASE.name: Yuri Lowell
BASE.profile: The righteous youth hunts for a lost cat, and ends up awakening in the sky. After learning that people there deal with the same inner conflicts, he gains faith in his own rectitude and is able to march forth with confidence.

BASE.name: Yurius
BASE.profile: A researcher who once fell prey to evil. He strives to never walk that path again as he works to rebuild his homeland. When he stares into the ominous clouds that cover Levin, his eyes reflect an even deeper shade of darkened resolution.

BASE.name: Zahlhamelina
BASE.profile: Convinced that her powers of flame come from the sun itself, she uses her powers for the good of all, constantly striving to brighten the lives of others. While urging caution against the threat of the stars even in peaceful times, she watches warmly over the blue-haired girl and skyfarers reaching for the ends of the skies. "Always be just," she prays.

BASE.name: Zaja
BASE.profile: This Draph warrior with a gentle heart spares no effort in making his Halloween costume, hoping that it will bring smiles to children. However, what he does not yet realize is that—despite his good intentions—his overly intense costume design will only send the peaceful village into a frenzied panic.

SR.name: Zaja
SR.profile: Beset by delusions, this warrior walks the line between truth and lies, searching for his lost friends. Their deaths were his fault—all his fault! He wandered, unable to forgive himself, until he met a traveler. The traveler's unshakeable resolve struck a chord with him, and he hefted his axes once more. This time, he would protect his friends—till the last.

BASE.name: Zehek
BASE.profile: A sudden misfortune befalls this young man, threatening to derail his way of life. Although he intends to make a clean break with his friends to keep them safe, they remain at his side, supporting him all the way as he overcomes this latest obstacle.

EVENT.name: Zehek
EVENT.profile: Consumed by an ancient and violent magic, the youth tried to push away those he cared for. It was the hardest thing he ever did, but it was for their protection; he was a danger to all around him. But when his dark secret came to light, they refused to give up on him. Shedding unseen tears, he accepted their help.

R.name: Zehek
R.profile: The magic power coursing through his body occasionally glimmers, like the light of a firefly. This is, however, a sickness caused by a particular type of magic. He scours the skies for a technique that can conquer the magic eating away at him.

BASE.name: Zeta
BASE.profile: Eyes glittering sharp and blue, she proves her strength by pursuing only the most dangerous of prey. No wall nor enemy can stand up to her steely will and burning spear. Although her form may be fair, her words bite deeper than the tip of her spear—sharp words are the mark of a hardened warrior.

BASE_4.name: Zeta
BASE_4.profile: Eyes glittering sharp and blue, she proves her strength by pursuing only the most dangerous of prey. No wall nor enemy can stand up to her steely will and burning spear. Although her form may be fair, her words bite deeper than the tip of her spear—sharp words are the mark of a hardened warrior.

DARK.name: Zeta
DARK.profile: Going undercover to discover her partner's secret, she sheds her crimson armor in favor of ordinary street clothes. At first she is caught up in the excitement of the chase, but what unfolds is a darker truth that she never saw coming.

DUO.jpname: 真紅と冥闇 ゼタ＆バザラガ
DUO.name: Zeta and Vaseraga
DUO.profile: The crimson lancer and ebony reaper adorn themselves for a night of festivities. The sun drops from the sky; the dark falls like a hush, shot through by beacons that beckon to the dead and the lost. A pair of eyes long grown accustomed to shadows and a flame that forges a crimson path—what can they discover within the gathering dusk of deception?

EVENT.name: Zeta
EVENT.profile: A knight who continued to fight alongside her comrades to the bitter end despite falling to a never-before-seen power. She eventually stands up once more, propped by her natural fortitude and tough-as-steel pride. Unable to cope with personal failures, she embarks on the path to victory against an old enemy.

SUMMER.name: Zeta
SUMMER.profile: Even a hunter of the primal beasts must rest. The gleam in her eyes, as sharp as the tip of a spear, softens when she gazes out at the glittering sea. She slips into her favorite swimsuit and frolics in the surf, her laughter and happy shouts echoing in the salty air. Sometimes even she must rest her spear-arm to ready herself for the next battle.

WATER.name: Zeta
WATER.profile: A spear and its wielder have overcome many trials and hardships together, though their true potential has yet to be drawn out. At a long-forgotten place, the brave fighter looks at her reflection in the mirror, her spirit within burning brighter and stronger than ever.

BASE.name: Zooey
BASE.profile: The world is in the midst of impending jeopardy—a disaster that only this arbitrator's true form can stop. But will her excessive empathy for the people interfere with her duty?

EVENT.name: Zooey
EVENT.profile: When negative emotions threatened to disturb the balance of the world, Zooey returned. Entrusted with the Divine Generals' power to act as a priestess, she now fights to protect the world and her friends who live there.

GRAND.name: Zooey
GRAND.profile: This young girl who keeps the balance in the skies descends upon the cerulean seas in a lovely swimsuit. She sets her responsibilities aside for a brief respite with dear friends.

PROMO.name: Zooey
PROMO.profile: The fragments of consciousness all hoping to protect this world enveloped in stars and skies gathered together to give birth to this young girl as the arbitrator of the skies. With a legion of dragons by her side, she brandishes an azure sword ready to destroy any foe who dares to disturb the balance of the world.
PROMO.recruitment: VISA PromotionSiero's Special Pick TicketLinks Pick Ticket

BASE.jpname: 星空 凛＆小泉花陽＆西木野真姫
BASE.name: μ's First-Years
BASE.profile: Originally from another world, the girls of μ's ended up here somehow—but that didn't stop them from putting on a concert to convey the emotions hidden within themselves. Their feelings move the hearts of the people and bring smiles to their faces.
BASE.recruitment: Love Live! Door to the Skies

BASE.jpname: 園田海未＆高坂穂乃果＆南ことり
BASE.name: μ's Second-Years
BASE.profile: Originally from another world, the girls of μ's ended up here somehow—but that didn't stop them from putting on a concert to make their dream come true. Soon the day will come when their wish is granted and smiles light the faces of the people.
BASE.recruitment: Love Live! Door to the Skies

BASE.jpname: 絢瀬絵里＆矢澤にこ＆東條 希
BASE.name: μ's Third-Years
BASE.profile: Originally from another world, the girls of μ's ended up here somehow—but that didn't stop them from putting on a concert to move toward an even brighter tomorrow. They take off running at full speed, their eyes fixed on a future where everyone is smiling.
BASE.recruitment: Love Live! Door to the Skies

BASE_4.jpname: 絢瀬絵里＆矢澤にこ＆東條 希
BASE_4.name: μ's Third-Years
BASE_4.profile: Originally from another world, the girls of μ's ended up here somehow—but that didn't stop them from putting on a concert to move toward an even brighter tomorrow. They take off running at full speed, their eyes fixed on a future where everyone is smiling.
BASE_4.recruitment: Love Live! Door to the Skies
